anya-e0102n:275_3: Tasmā tassā vitthāraṃ bhāvanānayañca dassetuṃ idaṃ pañhākammaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:277_3: Taṃ sabbaṃ vibhāvayituṃ ārabbhamānaṃ vissajjanaṃ adhippetañceva atthaṃ na sādheyya,
anya-e0102n:278_9: Ussakkitvā pana maggapātubhāvaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0102n:279_0: Yathā hi heraññikaphalake ṭhapitaṃ kahāpaṇarāsiṃ eko ajātabuddhidārako,
anya-e0102n:279_2: eko heraññikoti tīsu janesu passamānesu ajātabuddhidārako kahāpaṇānaṃ cittavicittadīghacaturassaparimaṇḍalabhāvamattameva jānāti,
anya-e0102n:279_8: ayaṃ addhasāro”ti imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ na jānāti.
anya-e0102n:279_15: asukasmiṃ nāma gāme vā nigame vā nagare vā pabbate vā nadītīre vā katotipi,
anya-e0102n:280_0: Saññā hi ajātabuddhino dārakassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya hoti,
anya-e0102n:280_11: Idaṃ sandhāya hi etaṃ vuttaṃ “pajānanaṭṭhena paññā”ti.
anya-e0102n:281_5: ayaṃ paññā”ti vinibbhujjitvā alabbhaneyyanānattā sukhumā duddasā.
anya-e0102n:281_10: bhagavatā kataṃ yaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ akkhātaṃ ayaṃ phasso,
anya-e0102n:282_1: Kānassā lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānīti ettha pana dhammasabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā paññā,
anya-e0102n:282_4: “Samāhito yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passatī”ti vacanato pana samādhi tassā padaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:284_11: Catubbidhā catūsu saccesu ñāṇavasena catupaṭisambhidāvasena cāti.
anya-e0102n:287_0: Tatiyaduke yā vipassanaṃ ārabhitukāmassa catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ vavatthāpane paññā,
anya-e0102n:288_0: Catutthaduke dvīsu kāmāvacarakusalacittesu soḷasasu ca pañcakanayena catukkajjhānikesu maggacittesu paññā somanassasahagatā.
anya-e0102n:288_1: Dvīsu kāmāvacarakusalacittesu catūsu ca pañcamajjhānikesu maggacittesu paññā upekkhāsahagatāti evaṃ somanassupekkhāsahagatavasena duvidhā.
anya-e0102n:290_1: Tikesu paṭhamattike parato assutvā paṭiladdhapaññā attano cintāvasena nipphannattā cintāmayā.
anya-e0102n:290_2: Parato sutvā paṭiladdhapaññā sutavasena nipphannattā sutamayā.
anya-e0102n:290_3: Yathā tathā vā bhāvanāvasena nipphannā appanāppattā paññā bhāvanāmayā.
anya-e0102n:291_1: Yogavihitesu vā kammāyatanesu yogavihitesu vā sippāyatanesu yogavihitesu vā vijjāṭṭhānesu kammassakataṃ
anya-e0102n:291_2: vā saccānulomikaṃ vā rūpaṃ aniccanti vā vedanā…pe… saññā… saṅkhārā…
anya-e0102n:291_4: yaṃ evarūpiṃ anulomikaṃ khantiṃ diṭṭhiṃ ruciṃ mutiṃ pekkhaṃ dhammanijjhānakhantiṃ parato assutvā paṭilabhati,
anya-e0102n:293_0: Dutiyattike kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattā paññā parittārammaṇā.
anya-e0102n:295_1: Ime me dhamme manasikaroto anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā na uppajjanti,
anya-e0102n:295_3: ime vā panime dhamme manasikaroto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n:295_4: Uppannā ca kusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattantīti,
anya-e0102n:296_1: sāpi duvidhā atthahānito ca anatthuppattito ca.
anya-e0102n:296_4: Ime dhamme manasikaroto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā na uppajjantī”tiādi.
anya-e0102n:297_0: Sabbattha pana tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ upāyesu nibbattikāraṇesu taṃkhaṇappavattaṃ ṭhānuppattikaṃ kosallaṃ upāyakosallaṃ nāma. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:298_0: Catutthattike attano khandhe gahetvā āraddhā vipassanā paññā ajjhattābhinivesā.
anya-e0102n:298_1: Parassa khandhe bāhiraṃ vā anindriyabaddharūpaṃ gahetvā āraddhā bahiddhābhinivesā.
anya-e0102n:298_2: Ubhayaṃ gahetvā āraddhā ajjhattabahiddhābhinivesāti evaṃ ajjhattābhinivesādivasena tividhā.
anya-e0102n:299_1: Catukkesu paṭhamacatukke dukkhasaccaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhe ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:299_2: Dukkhasamudayaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:299_3: Dukkhanirodhaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:299_4: Dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇanti evaṃ catūsu saccesu ñāṇavasena catubbidhā.
anya-e0102n:300_0: Dutiyacatukke catasso paṭisambhidā nāma atthādīsu pabhedagatāni cattāri ñāṇāni.
anya-e0102n:301_1: Hetuphalaṃ hi yasmā hetuanusārena ariyati adhigamiyati sampāpuṇiyati,
anya-e0102n:301_3: Pabhedato pana yaṃ kiñci paccayasambhūtaṃ, nibbānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:301_5: kiriyāti ime pañca dhammā atthoti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:301_6: Taṃ atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā.
anya-e0102n:301_8: Paccayo hi yasmā taṃ taṃ dahati pavatteti vā sampāpuṇituṃ vā deti,
anya-e0102n:301_10: Pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattako hetu,
anya-e0102n:301_12: akusalanti ime pañca dhammā dhammoti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:301_13: Taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
anya-e0102n:303_4: Ye dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā.
anya-e0102n:303_6: Yamhā dhammā te dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā,
anya-e0102n:303_12: Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ.
anya-e0102n:303_14: So tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti ‘ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho,
anya-e0102n:303_18: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti…pe…
anya-e0102n:303_21: Tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”tiādinā nayena vibhajitvā dassito.
anya-e0102n:304_0: Tatradhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca yā sabhāvanirutti abyabhicārī vohāro.
anya-e0102n:304_1: Tadabhilāpe tassa bhāsane udīraṇe taṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ udīritaṃ sutvāva ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti,
anya-e0102n:304_2: ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttīti evaṃ tassā dhammaniruttisaññitāya sabhāvaniruttiyā māgadhikāya sabbasattānaṃ
anya-e0102n:304_4: Niruttipaṭisambhidāppatto hi phasso vedanāti evamādivacanaṃ sutvāva ayaṃ sabhāvaniruttīti jānāti.
anya-e0102n:304_5: Phassā vedanoti evamādikaṃ pana ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttīti.
anya-e0102n:305_0: Ñāṇesu ñāṇanti sabbattha ñāṇamārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa ñāṇārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:305_1: yathāvuttesu vā tesu ñāṇesu sagocarakiccādivasena vitthārato ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti attho.
anya-e0102n:306_1: Catassopi cetā paṭisambhidā dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṃ gacchanti sekkhabhūmiyañca asekkhabhūmiyañca.
anya-e0102n:307_2: Evaṃ dvīsu bhūmīsu pabhedaṃ gacchantiyopi cetā adhigamena pariyattiyā savanena paripucchāya pubbayogena cāti imehi pañcahākārehi visadā honti.
anya-e0102n:308_2: Savanaṃ nāma sakkaccaṃ atthiṃ katvā dhammassavanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:308_4: pubbayogo nāma pubbabuddhānaṃ sāsane gatapaccāgatikabhāvena yāva anulomaṃ gotrabhusamīpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:313_1: Bāhusaccaṃ nāma tesu tesu satthesu ca sippāyatanesu ca kusalatā.
anya-e0102n:313_4: Āgamo nāma antamaso opammavaggamattassapi buddhavacanassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:313_8: Garusannissayo nāma sutapaṭibhānabahulānaṃ garūnaṃ santike vāso.
anya-e0102n:314_0: Tattha buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca pubbayogañceva adhigamañca nissāya paṭisambhidā pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0102n:314_2: Paṭisambhidāppattiyā ca pāṭiyekko kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogo nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:314_5: Tathāgatānaṃ hi dasabalāni viya ariyānaṃ ariyaphaleneva paṭisambhidā ijjhantīti imā paṭisambhidā sandhāya vuttaṃ catupaṭisambhidāvasena catubbidhāti.
anya-e0102n:316_1: Kathaṃ bhāvetabbāti ettha pana yasmā imāya paññāya khandhāyatanadhātuindriyasaccapaṭiccasamuppādādibhedā dhammā bhūmi.
anya-e0102n:316_2: Sīlavisuddhi ceva cittavisuddhi cāti imā dve visuddhiyo mūlaṃ.
anya-e0102n:316_8: Tasmā tesu bhūmibhūtesu dhammesu uggahaparipucchāvasena ñāṇaparicayaṃ katvā mūlabhūtā dve visuddhiyo
anya-e0102n:316_9: sampādetvā sarīrabhūtā pañca visuddhiyo sampādentena bhāvetabbā.
anya-e0102n:317_3: ettha khandhāti pañca khandhā rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandhoti.
anya-e0102n:319_1: Tattha yaṃ kiñci sītādīhi ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ dhammajātaṃ,
anya-e0102n:319_2: sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā rūpakkhandhoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:322_0: Upādārūpaṃ catuvīsatividhaṃ – cakkhu, sotaṃ, ghānaṃ, jivhā, kāyo, rūpaṃ, saddo, gandho, raso,
anya-e0102n:328_8: Keci panettha “tejādīnaṃ guṇehi rūpādīhi anugayhabhāvato”ti kāraṇaṃ dassenti.
anya-e0102n:328_10: Avinibbhogavuttīsu hi bhūtesu ayaṃ imassa guṇo ayaṃ imassa guṇoti na labbhā vattu”nti.
anya-e0102n:328_11: Athāpi vadeyyuṃ “yathā tesu tesu sambhāresu tassa tassa bhūtassa adhikatāya pathavīādīnaṃ sandhāraṇādīni kiccāni icchatha,
anya-e0102n:328_12: evaṃ tejādiadhikesu sambhāresu rūpādīnaṃ adhikabhāvadassanato icchitabbametaṃ rūpādayo tesaṃ guṇā”ti.
anya-e0102n:328_14: yadi āpādhikassa āsavassa gandhato pathavīadhike kappāse gandho adhikataro siyā,
anya-e0102n:328_15: tejādhikassa ca uṇhodakassa vaṇṇato sītudakassa vaṇṇo parihāyetha”.
anya-e0102n:328_18: “yathā avisesepi ekakalāpe bhūtānaṃ rūparasādayo aññamaññaṃ visadisā honti,
anya-e0102n:328_19: evaṃ cakkhupasādādayo avijjamānepi aññasmiṃ visesakāraṇe”ti gahetabbametaṃ.
anya-e0102n:329_0: Kiṃ pana taṃ yaṃ aññamaññassa asādhāraṇaṃ?
anya-e0102n:329_4: Bhūtavisese hi sati pasādova na uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:330_1: Evaṃ kammavisesato visesavantesu ca etesu cakkhusotāni asampattavisayagāhakāni,
anya-e0102n:330_2: attano nissayaṃ anallīnanissaye eva visaye viññāṇahetuttā.
anya-e0102n:331_1: Cakkhu cettha yadetaṃ loke nīlapakhumasamākiṇṇakaṇhasukkamaṇḍalavicittaṃ nīluppaladalasannibhaṃ cakkhūti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:331_2: Tassa sasambhāracakkhuno setamaṇḍalaparikkhittassa kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe abhimukhe ṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattipadese
anya-e0102n:331_3: sattasu picupaṭalesu āsittatelaṃ picupaṭalāni viya satta akkhipaṭalānibyāpetvā dhāraṇanhāpanamaṇḍanabījanakiccāhi
anya-e0102n:331_4: catūhi dhātīhi khattiyakumāro viya sandhāraṇabandhanaparipācanasamudīraṇakiccāhi catūhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ
anya-e0102n:331_5: utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ āyunā anupāliyamānaṃ vaṇṇagandharasādīhi parivutaṃ pamāṇato ūkāsiramattaṃ
anya-e0102n:334_0: Sasambhārasotabilassa anto tanutambalomācite aṅgulivedhakasaṇṭhāne padese sotaṃ vuttappakārāhi dhātūhi
anya-e0102n:334_1: katūpakāraṃ utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ āyunā anupāliyamānaṃ vaṇṇādīhi parivutaṃ sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:337_0: Yāvatā pana imasmiṃ kāye upādiṇṇarūpaṃ nāma atthi.
anya-e0102n:337_1: Sabbattha kāyo kappāsapaṭale sneho viya vuttappakārupakārupatthambhanānupālanaparivārova hutvā kāyaviññāṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0102n:339_1: Tato paresu pana rūpādīsu cakkhupaṭihananalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:343_8: na ca kāyapasādena ṭhitokāse ṭhitanti vā aṭṭhitokāse ṭhitanti vāti vattabbataṃ āpajjati,
anya-e0102n:344_5: Santepi ca anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ sahajarūpāni anupāleti udakaṃ viya uppalādīni.
anya-e0102n:344_6: Yathāsakaṃ paccayuppannepi ca dhamme pāleti dhāti viya kumāraṃ.
anya-e0102n:344_7: Sayaṃ pavattitadhammasambandheneva ca pavattati niyāmako viya.
anya-e0102n:345_4: Hadayassa anto kāyagatāsatikathāyaṃ vuttappakāraṃ lohitaṃ nissāya sandhāraṇādikiccehi bhūtehi katūpakāraṃ
anya-e0102n:345_5: utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ āyunā anupāliyamānaṃ manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnañceva taṃsampayuttadhammānañca
anya-e0102n:346_6: sayañca tena kāyavipphandanasaṅkhātena kāyena viññeyyattā “kāyaviññattī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:346_7: Tāya ca pana calitehi cittajarūpehi abhisambandhānaṃ utujādīnampi calanato abhikkamādayo pavattantīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:347_5: sayañca tāya vacīghosasaṅkhātāya vācāya viññeyyattā “vacīviññattī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:347_6: Yathā hi araññe ussāpetvā bandhagosīsādiudakanimittaṃ disvā udakamettha atthīti viññāyati,
anya-e0102n:347_7: evaṃ kāyavipphandanañceva vacīghosañca gahetvā kāyavacīviññattiyopi viññāyanti.
anya-e0102n:348_6: Yāya paricchinnesu rūpesu idamito uddhamadho tiriyanti ca hoti.
anya-e0102n:350_0: Etā pana tisso na aññamaññaṃ vijahanti,
anya-e0102n:350_1: evaṃ santepi yo arogino viya rūpānaṃ lahubhāvo adandhatā lahuparivattippakāro rūpadandhattakaradhātukkhobhapaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhāno,
anya-e0102n:350_3: Yo pana suparimadditacammasseva rūpānaṃ mudubhāvo sabbakiriyāvisesesu vasavattanabhāvamaddavappakāro
anya-e0102n:350_6: Yo pana sudantasuvaṇṇasseva rūpānaṃ kammaññabhāvo sarīrakiriyānukūlabhāvappakāro sarīrakiriyānaṃ ananukūlakaradhātukkhobhapaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhāno,
anya-e0102n:350_7: so rūpavikāro rūpassa kammaññatāti evametāsaṃ viseso veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:351_11: ākāranānattato pana veneyyavasena ca “upacayo santatī”ti uddesadesanā katā.
anya-e0102n:351_13: tasmā imesaṃ padānaṃ niddese “yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo,
anya-e0102n:351_19: santati nāma pavattī”ti vatvā “nadītīre khatakūpakamhi udakuggamanakālo viya ācayo nibbatti,
anya-e0102n:351_21: ajjhottharitvā gamanakālo viya santati pavattī”ti upamā katā.
anya-e0102n:352_3: Tasmā yā rūpānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbatti, sā ācayo.
anya-e0102n:352_4: Yā tesaṃ upari aññesampi nibbattamānānaṃ nibbatti,
anya-e0102n:352_6: Yā tesampi upari punappunaṃ aññesaṃ nibbattamānānaṃ nibbatti,
anya-e0102n:352_7: sā anupabandhākārena upaṭṭhānato santatīti ca pavuccatīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:353_4: Khaṇḍiccādibhāvena dantādīsu vikāradassanato idaṃ pākaṭajaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:353_7: yā ca pathavī udakapabbatacandimasūriyādīsu avīcijarā nāma.
anya-e0102n:356_2: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana balarūpaṃ sambhavarūpaṃ jātirūpaṃ rogarūpaṃ ekaccānaṃ matena middharūpanti evaṃ aññānipi rūpāni āharitvā “addhā munīsi sambuddho,
anya-e0102n:356_3: natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”tiādīni vatvā middharūpaṃ tāva natthiyevāti paṭikkhittaṃ.
anya-e0102n:356_8: Tasmā tesu ekampi visuṃ natthīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0102n:357_0: Iti idaṃ catuvīsatividhaṃ upādārūpaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ bhūtarūpañcāti aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ hoti anūnamanadhikaṃ.
anya-e0102n:358_1: Taṃ sabbampi na hetu ahetukaṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ sappaccayaṃ lokiyaṃ sāsavamevātiādinā nayena ekavidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:360_0: Tattha cakkhādipañcavidhaṃ attabhāvaṃ adhikicca pavattattā ajjhattikaṃ,
anya-e0102n:360_2: Cakkhādīni nava āpodhātuvajjitā tisso dhātuyo cāti dvādasavidhaṃ ghaṭṭanavasena gahetabbato oḷārikaṃ,
anya-e0102n:360_8: kabaḷīkārāhāro cāti aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ paricchedavikāralakkhaṇabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā sabhāveneva pariggahetabbato nipphannaṃ,
anya-e0102n:360_10: Cakkhādipañcavidhaṃ rūpādīnaṃ gahaṇapaccayabhāvena ādāsatalaṃ viya vippasannattā pasādarūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:361_1: Puna sabbameva rūpaṃ sanidassanakammajādīnaṃ tikānaṃ vasena tividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:361_17: nakutocijātaṃ neva utujaṃ naanutujanti evaṃ kammajādittikavasena tividhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:362_5: sesaṃ viññātaṃ nāma viññāṇasseva visayattāti evaṃ tāva diṭṭhādicatukkavasena catubbidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:363_3: jātijarābhaṅgaṃ lakkhaṇarūpaṃ nāmāti evaṃ rūparūpādicatukkavasena catubbidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:364_4: Sesaṃ neva vatthu na dvāranti evaṃ vatthādicatukkavasena catubbidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:365_3: Tattha kammajameva cittajameva ca ekajaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:365_6: Yaṃ pana cittato ca ututo ca jātaṃ,
anya-e0102n:365_18: Yampi “rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ ākāsadhātu āpodhātu rūpassa lahutā,
anya-e0102n:365_24: ime dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānā”tiādīsu jātiyā kutocijātattaṃ anuññātaṃ,
anya-e0102n:365_25: taṃ pana rūpajanakapaccayānaṃ kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe diṭṭhattāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:368_8: sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā viññāṇakkhandho veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:368_9: Tattha yasmā viññāṇakkhandhe viññāte itare suviññeyyā honti,
anya-e0102n:368_10: tasmā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ ādiṃ katvā vaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
anya-e0102n:369_1: sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā viññāṇakkhandho veditabboti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:369_6: Tadetaṃ vijānanalakkhaṇena sabhāvato ekavidhampi jātivasena tividhaṃ kusalaṃ, akusalaṃ,
anya-e0102n:370_1: Tattha kusalaṃ bhūmibhedato catubbidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttarañca.
anya-e0102n:371_0: Yadā hi deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakādisampattiṃ aññaṃ vā somanassahetuṃ āgamma haṭṭhapahaṭṭho “atthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattaṃ
anya-e0102n:371_1: sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā asaṃsīdanto anussāhito parehi dānādīni puññāni karoti,
anya-e0102n:371_2: tadāssa somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:371_3: Yadā pana vuttanayena haṭṭhatuṭṭho sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā amuttacāgatādivasena saṃsīdamāno vā parehi vā ussāhito karoti,
anya-e0102n:371_5: Imasmiñhi atthe saṅkhāroti etaṃ attano vā paresaṃ vā vasena pavattassa pubbapayogassādhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:371_6: Yadā pana ñātijanassa paṭipattidassanena jātaparicayā bāladārakā bhikkhū disvā somanassajātā sahasā kiñcideva hatthagataṃ dadanti vā vandanti vā,
anya-e0102n:371_8: Yadā pana “detha vandathāti” ñātīhi ussāhitā evaṃ paṭipajjanti,
anya-e0102n:371_10: Yadā pana deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakādīnaṃ asampattiṃ aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgamma catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti,
anya-e0102n:373_3: Lokuttaraṃ catumaggasampayogato catubbidhanti evaṃ tāva kusalaviññāṇameva ekavīsatividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:376_0: Yadā hi “natthi kāmesu ādīnavo”ti ādinā nayena micchādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho kāme vā paribhuñjati,
anya-e0102n:376_1: diṭṭhamaṅgalādīni vā sārato pacceti sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena,
anya-e0102n:376_5: Yadā micchādiṭṭhiṃ apurakkhatvā kevalaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭho methunaṃ vā sevati,
anya-e0102n:376_7: parabhaṇḍaṃ vā harati sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena,
anya-e0102n:376_11: Yadā pana kāmānaṃ vā asampattiṃ āgamma aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvena catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti,
anya-e0102n:376_12: tadā sesāni cattāri upekkhāsahagatāni uppajjantīti evaṃ somanassupekkhādiṭṭhigatasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ lobhamūlaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:377_0: Dosamūlaṃ pana domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhāranti duvidhameva hoti,
anya-e0102n:378_1: Tassa sanniṭṭhānavikkhepakāle pavatti veditabbāti evaṃ akusalaviññāṇaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:379_2: Tattha vipākaṃ bhūmito catubbidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttarañca.
anya-e0102n:383_4: Somanassupekkhāyogato pana dvipañcaṭṭhānabhedato ca tassā bhedo.
anya-e0102n:383_5: Etāsu hi ekā ekantamiṭṭhārammaṇe pavattisabbhāvato somanassasampayuttā hutvā santīraṇatadārammaṇavasena
anya-e0102n:383_6: pañcadvāre ceva javanāvasāne ca pavattanato dviṭṭhānā hoti.
anya-e0102n:383_7: Ekā iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe pavattisabbhāvato upekkhāsampayuttā hutvā santīraṇatadārammaṇapaṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattanato pañcaṭṭhānā hoti.
anya-e0102n:384_2: Viññāṇapañcakaṃ hettha niyatārammaṇaṃ yathākkamaṃ rūpādīsuyeva pavattito,
anya-e0102n:384_4: Tatra hi manodhātu pañcasupi rūpādīsu pavattati,
anya-e0102n:385_1: taṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya somanassādi bhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:385_2: Yathā pana kusalaṃ dānādivasena chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati,
anya-e0102n:385_4: Idañhi paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇavasena parittadhammapariyāpannesuyeva chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati.
anya-e0102n:385_6: Sampayuttadhammānañca visese asatipi ādāsatalādīsu mukhanimittaṃ viya nirussāhaṃ vipākaṃ,
anya-e0102n:387_6: Sā ca tesu upekkhā hīnā dukkhaṃ viya nātitikhiṇā,
anya-e0102n:387_7: itaresu upekkhā paṇītā sukhaṃ viya nātitikhiṇā.
anya-e0102n:387_8: Iti imesaṃ sattannaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ purimānañca soḷasannaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ vasena kāmāvacaraṃ vipākaviññāṇaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:388_7: taṃ maggavīthivasena ceva samāpattivasena ca dvidhā pavattati.
anya-e0102n:388_8: Evaṃ sabbampi catūsu bhūmīsu chattiṃsavidhaṃ vipākaviññāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:389_0: Kiriyaṃ pana bhūmibhedato tividhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacarañca.
anya-e0102n:391_0: Manoviññāṇadhātu pana duvidhā sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇā ca.
anya-e0102n:393_0: Sahetukaṃ pana somanassādibhedato kusalaṃ viya aṭṭhavidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:394_0: Rūpāvacaraṃ pana arūpāvacarañca kusalaṃ viya pañcavidhaṃ catubbidhañca hoti.
anya-e0102n:394_1: Arahataṃ uppattivaseneva cassa kusalato viseso veditabboti.
anya-e0102n:394_2: Evaṃ sabbampi tīsu bhūmīsu vīsatividhaṃ kiriyaviññāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:395_1: Iti ekavīsati kusalāni dvādasākusalāni chattiṃsa vipākāni vīsati kiriyānīti sabbānipi ekūnanavuti viññāṇāni honti.
anya-e0102n:396_1: Yadā hi aṭṭhannaṃ kāmāvacarakusalānaṃ ānubhāvena devamanussesu sattā nibbattanti,
anya-e0102n:396_2: tadā nesaṃ maraṇakāle paccupaṭṭhitaṃ kammakammanimittagatinimittānaṃ aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā aṭṭha sahetukakāmāvacaravipākāni,
anya-e0102n:396_6: tadā nesaṃ maraṇakāle paccupaṭṭhitaṃ kammanimittameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā nava rūpārūpāvacaravipākāni paṭisandhivasena pavattanti.
anya-e0102n:397_1: tadā nesaṃ maraṇakāle paccupaṭṭhitaṃ kammakammanimittagatinimittānaṃ aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekā akusalavipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0102n:397_2: paṭisandhivasena pavattatīti evaṃ tāvettha ekūnavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ paṭisandhivasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:398_0: Paṭisandhiviññāṇe pana niruddhe taṃ taṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇamanubandhamānaṃ tassa tasseva kammassa vipākabhūtaṃ
anya-e0102n:398_1: tasmiññeva ārammaṇe tādisameva bhavaṅgaviññāṇaṃ nāma pavattati,
anya-e0102n:398_2: punapi tādisanti evaṃ asati santānavinivattake aññasmiṃ cittuppāde nadīsotaṃ viya supinaṃ apassato niddokkamanakālādīsu
anya-e0102n:398_3: aparimāṇasaṅkhyampi pavattatiyevāti evaṃ tesaññeva viññāṇānaṃ bhavaṅgavasenāpi pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:399_0: Evaṃ pavatte pana bhavaṅgasantāne yadā sattānaṃ indriyāni ārammaṇagahaṇakkhamāni honti,
anya-e0102n:399_1: tadā cakkhussāpāthagate rūpe rūpaṃ paṭicca cakkhupasādassa ghaṭṭanā hoti,
anya-e0102n:399_3: atha niruddhe bhavaṅge tadeva rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā bhavaṅgaṃ vicchindamānā viya āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā kiriyamanodhātu uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:399_5: Manodvāre pana chabbidhepi ārammaṇe āpāthagate bhavaṅgacalanānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ vicchindamānā viya āvajjanakiccaṃ
anya-e0102n:399_6: sādhayamānā ahetukakiriyamanoviññāṇadhātu uppajjati upekkhāsahagatāti evaṃ dvinnaṃ kiriyaviññāṇānaṃ āvajjanavasena
anya-e0102n:400_0: Āvajjanānantaraṃ pana cakkhudvāre tāva dassanakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ cakkhupasādavatthukaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:400_3: aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattesu visayesu akusalavipākānīti evaṃ dasannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ dassanasavanaghāyanasāyanaphusanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:401_0: “Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā uppajjitvā niruddhasamanantarā uppajjati cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ tajjā manodhātū”tiādivacanato
anya-e0102n:401_1: pana cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ anantarā tesaññeva visayaṃ sampaṭicchamānā kusalavipākānantaraṃ kusalavipākā,
anya-e0102n:401_3: Evaṃ dvinnaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ sampaṭicchanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:402_0: “Manodhātuyāpi uppajjitvā niruddhasamanantarā uppajjati cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātū”ti
anya-e0102n:402_1: vacanato pana manodhātuyā sampaṭicchitameva visayaṃ santīrayamānā akusalavipākamanodhātuyā anantarā akusalavipākā,
anya-e0102n:402_3: iṭṭhamajjhatte upekkhāsahagatā uppajjati vipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātūti evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ santīraṇavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:403_0: Santīraṇānantaraṃ pana tameva visayaṃ vavatthāpayamānā uppajjati kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu upekkhāsahagatāti
anya-e0102n:403_1: evaṃ ekasseva kiriyaviññāṇassa voṭṭhabbanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:404_0: Voṭṭhabbanānantaraṃ pana sace mahantaṃ hoti rūpādiārammaṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:404_1: atha yathāvavatthāpite visaye aṭṭhannaṃ vā kāmāvacarakusalānaṃ dvādasannaṃ vā akusalānaṃ navannaṃ vā
anya-e0102n:404_2: avasesakāmāvacarakiriyānaṃ aññataravasena cha satta vā javanāni javanti,
anya-e0102n:405_1: Gotrabhuto uddhaṃ rūpāvacarato pañca kusalāni pañca kiriyāni,
anya-e0102n:405_3: lokuttarato cattāri maggacittāni cattāri phalacittānīti imesu yaṃ yaṃ laddhapaccayaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:405_4: taṃ taṃ javatīti evaṃ pañcapaññāsāya kusalākusalakiriyavipākaviññāṇānaṃ javanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:406_2: atha kāmāvacarasattānaṃ kāmāvacarajavanāvasāne iṭṭhārammaṇādīnaṃ purimakammajavanacittādīnañca vasena yo yo paccayo laddho hoti,
anya-e0102n:406_3: tassa tassa vasena aṭṭhasu sahetukakāmāvacaravipākesu tīsu vipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātūsu ca aññataraṃ
anya-e0102n:406_4: paṭisotagataṃ nāvaṃ anubandhamānaṃ kiñci antaraṃ udakamiva bhavaṅgassārammaṇato aññasmiṃ ārammaṇe javitaṃ
anya-e0102n:406_5: javanamanubandhaṃ dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃ vā vipākaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:406_6: Tadetaṃ javanāvasāne bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇe pavattanārahaṃ samānaṃ tassa javanassa ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattattā tadārammaṇanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:406_7: Evaṃ ekādasannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tadārammaṇavasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:407_1: bhavaṅge vicchinne puna āvajjanādīnīti evaṃ laddhapaccayacittasantānaṃ bhavaṅgānantaraṃ āvajjanaṃ āvajjanānantaraṃ
anya-e0102n:407_4: Ekasmiṃ hi bhave yaṃ sabbapacchimaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ,
anya-e0102n:407_7: Evaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ cutivasena pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:408_1: paṭisandhito puna bhavaṅganti evaṃ bhavagatiṭhitinivāsesu saṃsaramānānaṃ sattānaṃ avicchinnaṃ cittasantānaṃ pavattatiyeva.
anya-e0102n:411_2: sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā vedanākkhandho veditabbo”ti,
anya-e0102n:411_6: Sā pana vedayitalakkhaṇena sabhāvato ekavidhāpi jātivasena tividhā hoti kusalā, akusalā,
anya-e0102n:412_0: Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ somanassupekkhāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhavidhantiādinā nayena vuttena kusalaviññāṇena sampayuttā kusalā,
anya-e0102n:413_11: lokuttaraṃ pana yasmā ajhānikaṃ nāma natthi,
anya-e0102n:413_12: tasmā aṭṭha lokuttarāni pañcannaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena cattālīsaṃ honti.
anya-e0102n:413_13: Tesu ṭhapetvā aṭṭha pañcamajjhānikāni sesehi dvattiṃsāya kusalavipākehīti evaṃ somanassaṃ dvāsaṭṭhiyā viññāṇehi sampayuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:421_2: sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā saññākkhandho veditabbo”ti,
anya-e0102n:421_6: Sā panesā sañjānanalakkhaṇena sabhāvato ekavidhāpi jātivasena tividhā hoti kusalā, akusalā,
anya-e0102n:423_0: Sā panesā evaṃ viññāṇena samappabhedāpi lakkhaṇādito sabbāva sañjānanalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n:423_1: tadevetanti puna sañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā dāruādīsu tacchakādayo viya,
anya-e0102n:423_3: yathāupaṭṭhitavisayapadaṭṭhānā tiṇapurisakesu migapotakānaṃ purisāti uppannasaññā viyāti.
anya-e0102n:426_2: sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvā saṅkhārakkhandho veditabbo”ti,
anya-e0102n:427_0: Evaṃ lakkhaṇādito ekavidhāpi ca jātivasena tividhā kusalā, akusalā,
anya-e0102n:428_0: Tattha kāmāvacarapaṭhamakusalaviññāṇasampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpena āgatā sattavīsati,
anya-e0102n:428_3: Tattha phasso, cetanā, vitakko, vicāro, pīti, vīriyaṃ, jīvitaṃ, samādhi, saddhā, sati, hirī, ottappaṃ, alobho, adoso, amoho,
anya-e0102n:428_15: cittujukatāti ime sarūpena āgatā sattavīsati. Chando,
anya-e0102n:428_18: tatramajjhattatāti ime yevāpanakā cattāro. Karuṇā, muditā,
anya-e0102n:429_6: Ayañhi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattati.
anya-e0102n:429_7: Ekadesena ca analliyamānopi rūpaṃ viya cakkhu,
anya-e0102n:429_8: saddo viya ca sotaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇañca saṅghaṭṭeti,
anya-e0102n:429_9: tikasannipātasaṅkhātassa attano kāraṇassa vasena paveditattā sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0102n:429_10: Tajjāsamannāhārena ceva indriyena ca parikkhate visaye anantarāyeneva uppajjanato āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhānoti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:430_6: Accāyikakammānussaraṇādīsu ca panāyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ ussahanabhāvena pavattamānā pākaṭā hoti.
anya-e0102n:432_7: sammā āraddhaṃ sabbasampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:434_9: nivāte dīpaccīnaṃ ṭhiti viya cetaso ṭhitīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:436_2: sayaṃ vā sarati saraṇamattameva vā esāti sati.
anya-e0102n:437_11: Attānaṃ garuṃ katvā hiriyā pāpaṃ jahāti kulavadhū viya.
anya-e0102n:437_12: Paraṃ garuṃ katvā ottappena pāpaṃ jahāti vesiyā viya.
anya-e0102n:437_13: Ime ca pana dve dhammā lokapālakāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:441_4: Ubhopi panetā ekato katvā kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā kāyacittapassaddhiyo,
anya-e0102n:447_6: Ārammaṇaggahaṇe ayaṃ cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:451_6: cittacetasikānaṃ ajjhupekkhanabhāvena samappavattānaṃ ājānīyānaṃ ajjhupekkhakasārathi viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:455_1: Iti imeva chattiṃsa saṅkhārā paṭhamena kāmāvacarakusalaviññāṇena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:456_0: Tatiyena pana ṭhapetvā amohaṃ avasesā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:457_0: Paṭhame vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā pītiṃ avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0102n:457_4: Sattamena ca pana ṭhapetvā amohaṃ avasesā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:458_0: Paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā viratittayaṃ sesā rūpāvacarakusalesu paṭhamena sampayogaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0102n:459_0: Lokuttaresu paṭhamajjhānike tāva maggaviññāṇe paṭhamarūpāvacaraviññāṇe vuttanayena,
anya-e0102n:460_1: Akusalesu lobhamūle paṭhamākusalasampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpena āgatā terasa,
anya-e0102n:460_3: Tattha phasso, cetanā, vitakko, vicāro, pīti, vīriyaṃ, jīvitaṃ, samādhi, ahirikaṃ,
anya-e0102n:460_5: micchādiṭṭhīti ime sarūpena āgatā terasa. Chando,
anya-e0102n:462_11: Taṇhānadībhāvena vaḍḍhamāno sīghasotā nadī iva mahāsamuddaṃ apāyameva gahetvā gacchatīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:465_8: Akusalabhāvoyeva hi akusalabhāvena ca lāmakattaṃ etesaṃ tehi viseso.
anya-e0102n:466_1: Iti ime sattarasa saṅkhārā paṭhamena akusalaviññāṇena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:466_4: Sasaṅkhāratā panettha thinamiddhassa ca aniyatatā viseso.
anya-e0102n:468_0: Tatiyena paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:469_0: Catutthena dutiye vuttesu ṭhapetvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:469_2: Paṭhame vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā pītiṃ avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0102n:469_5: Sasaṅkhāratā panettha thinamiddhassa ca aniyatabhāvo viseso.
anya-e0102n:469_6: Sattamena pañcame vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:469_8: Aṭṭhamena chaṭṭhe vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:470_1: Dosamūlesu pana dvīsu paṭhamasampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpena āgatā ekādasa,
anya-e0102n:470_4: Tattha phasso, cetanā, vitakko, vicāro, vīriyaṃ, jīvitaṃ, samādhi, ahirikaṃ,
anya-e0102n:470_6: mohoti ime sarūpena āgatā ekādasa. Chando,
anya-e0102n:473_2: Taṃ laddhānaṃ vā labhitabbānaṃ vā attano sampattīnaṃ nigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:475_0: Iti ime aṭṭhārasa saṅkhārā paṭhamena dosamūlena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:475_3: Sasaṅkhāratā pana aniyatesu ca thinamiddhasambhavova viseso.
anya-e0102n:476_1: Mohamūlesu dvīsu vicikicchāsampayuttena tāva phasso, cetanā, vitakko, vicāro, vīriyaṃ, jīvitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:478_0: Uddhaccasampayuttena vicikicchāsampayutte vuttesu ṭhapetvā vicikicchaṃ sesā dvādasa.
anya-e0102n:479_3: Tattha kusalākusalavipākacakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā tāva phasso, cetanā, jīvitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:479_7: Ubhayavipākamanodhātuyā ete ceva vitakkavicārādhimokkhā cāti aṭṭha,
anya-e0102n:479_10: tāya saddhiṃ pīti adhikā hotīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:480_1: Tesu aṭṭhakāmāvacaravipākasampayuttā tāva aṭṭhahi kāmāvacarakusalehi sampayuttasaṅkhārasadisāyeva.
anya-e0102n:483_1: Tesu aṭṭhakāmāvacarakiriyaviññāṇasampayuttā tāva ṭhapetvā viratiyo aṭṭhahi kāmāvacarakusalehi sampayuttasaṅkhārasadisā.
anya-e0102n:483_2: Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakiriyasampayuttā pana sabbākārenapi tesaṃ kusalaviññāṇasampayuttasadisāyevāti evaṃ abyākatāpi saṅkhārā veditabbāti.
anya-e0102n:485_0: Idaṃ tāva abhidhamme padabhājanīyanayena khandhesu vitthārakathāmukhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:488_0: “Yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā,
anya-e0102n:488_1: tadekajjhaṃ abhisaṃyūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā ayaṃ vuccati rūpakkhandho.
anya-e0102n:490_2: Evaṃ padadvayenāpi rūpassa anavasesapariggaho kato hoti.
anya-e0102n:491_1: Tattha rūpaṃ tāva addhāsantatisamayakhaṇavasena catudhā atītaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n:492_0: Tattha addhāvasena tāva ekassa ekasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhito pubbe atītaṃ,
anya-e0102n:493_0: Santativasena sabhāgaekautusamuṭṭhānaṃ ekāhārasamuṭṭhānañca pubbāpariyavasena vattamānampi paccuppannaṃ,
anya-e0102n:493_7: tesaññeva pana utuāhāracittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ upatthambhakavasena tassa atītādibhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:494_0: Samayavasena ekamuhuttapubbaṇhasāyanharattindivādīsu samayesu santānavasena pavattamānaṃ taṃ taṃ samayaṃ paccuppannaṃ nāma,
anya-e0102n:496_2: Apica idha niyakajjhattampi ajjhattaṃ parapuggalikampi ca bahiddhāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:497_2: Tattha akaniṭṭhānaṃ rūpato sudassīnaṃ rūpaṃ hīnaṃ.
anya-e0102n:498_0: Dūre santiketi idampi vuttanayameva. Apica okāsatopettha upādāyupādāya dūrasantikatā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:499_1: Tadekajjhaṃ abhisaṃyūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvāti taṃ atītādīhi padehi visuṃ visuṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0102n:499_2: ruppanalakkhaṇasaṅkhāte ekavidhabhāve paññāya rāsiṃ katvā rūpakkhandhoti vuccatīti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0102n:499_3: Etena sabbampi rūpaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇe rāsibhāvūpagamanena rūpakkhandhoti dassitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:499_4: Na hi rūpato añño rūpakkhandho nāma atthi.
anya-e0102n:500_3: Na hi vedanādīhi aññe vedanākkhandhādayo nāma atthi.
anya-e0102n:501_0: Atītādivibhāge panettha santativasena khaṇādivasena ca vedanāya atītānāgatapaccuppannabhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:501_1: Tattha santativasena ekavīthiekajavanaekasamāpattipariyāpannā ekavīthivisayasamāyogappavattā ca paccuppannā,
anya-e0102n:501_4: Khaṇādivasena khaṇattayapariyāpannā pubbantāparantamajjhattagatā sakiccañca kurumānā vedanā paccuppannā,
anya-e0102n:502_2: kusalābyākatā vedanā sukhumā”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge vuttena jātisabhāvapuggalalokiyalokuttaravasena veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:502_17: savipākato ca yathāyogaṃ duvidhāyapi abyākatāya oḷārikā,
anya-e0102n:503_6: itarā pana dve sātato, santato, paṇītato, manāpato,
anya-e0102n:504_1: Puggalavasena pana asamāpannassa vedanā nānārammaṇe vikkhittabhāvato samāpannassa vedanāya oḷārikā,
anya-e0102n:506_2: Akusalavipākakaāyaviññāṇasampayuttā hi vedanā jātivasena abyākatattā sukhumāpi samānā sabhāvādivasena oḷārikā hoti.
anya-e0102n:506_10: evaṃ sukhādayopi jātivasena oḷārikā sabhāvādivasena sukhumā honti.
anya-e0102n:506_11: Tasmā yathā jātiādivasena sambhedo na hoti,
anya-e0102n:507_0: Apica taṃ taṃ vā pana vedanaṃ upādāyupādāya vedanā oḷārikasukhumā daṭṭhabbāti vacanato akusalādīsupi
anya-e0102n:507_1: lobhasahagatāya dosasahagatā vedanā aggi viya attano nissayadahanato oḷārikā,
anya-e0102n:508_17: Esa nayo taṃ taṃ bhūmivipākakiriyavedanāsu ca dukkhādiasamāpannādisāsavādivasena vuttavedanāsu ca.
anya-e0102n:509_5: Vatthuvasena cāpi hīnavatthukā yā kāci vedanā oḷārikā,
anya-e0102n:510_0: Hīnapaṇītabhede yā oḷārikā, sā hīnā. Yā ca sukhumā, sā paṇītāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:511_1: Dūrapadaṃ pana “akusalā vedanā kusalābyākatāhi vedanāhi dūre”.
anya-e0102n:511_2: Santikepadaṃ “akusalā vedanā akusalāya vedanāya santike”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge vibhattaṃ.
anya-e0102n:519_12: Tesu idha uppattikkamo tāva na yujjati,
anya-e0102n:520_0: Abhedena hi pañcasu khandhesu attagāhapatitaṃ veneyyajanaṃ samūhaghanavinibbhogadassanena attagāhato
anya-e0102n:520_1: mocetukāmo bhagavā hitakāmo tassa tassa janassa sukhagahaṇatthaṃ cakkhuādīnampi visayabhūtaṃ oḷārikaṃ
anya-e0102n:520_5: taṃ sañjānātī”ti evaṃ vedanāvisayassa ākāragāhikaṃ saññaṃ.
anya-e0102n:520_7: Tesaṃ vedanādīnaṃ nissayaṃ adhipatibhūtañca nesaṃ viññāṇanti evaṃ tāva kamato vinicchayanayo viññātabbo.
anya-e0102n:523_0: Ettha ca yathā vedanādayo anāsavāpi atthi,
anya-e0102n:523_4: Yasmā rāsaṭṭhena ca sāsavaṭṭhena ca upādānakkhandhabhāvo yujjati,
anya-e0102n:523_8: Upādānakkhandhāti cettha upādānagocarā khandhā upādānakkhandhāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:523_9: Idha pana sabbepete ekajjhaṃ katvā khandhāti adhippetā.
anya-e0102n:524_1: Anūnādhikatoti kasmā pana bhagavatā pañceva khandhā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti.
anya-e0102n:524_3: Anekappabhedesu hi saṅkhatadhammesu sabhāgavasena saṅgayhamānesu rūpampi rūpasabhāgekasaṅgahavasena eko khandho hoti.
anya-e0102n:524_10: sati rūpaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati ‘etaṃ mama,
anya-e0102n:524_14: viññāṇe sati viññāṇaṃ upādāya viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati ‘etaṃ mama,
anya-e0102n:524_18: Yepi caññe sīlādayo pañca dhammakkhandhā vuttā,
anya-e0102n:524_19: tepi saṅkhārakkhandhe pariyāpannattā ettheva avarodhaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0102n:524_20: Tasmā aññesaṃ tadavarodhatopi pañceva vuttāti evaṃ anūnādhikato vinicchayanayo viññātabbo.
anya-e0102n:525_10: Tathā “akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti dukkhasahagata”nti.
anya-e0102n:525_13: Apica cārakakāraṇaaparādhakāraṇakārakaaparādhikupamā ete bhājanabhojanabyañjanaparivesakabhuñjakūpamā cāti evaṃ upamāto vinicchayanayo viññātabbo.
anya-e0102n:526_1: Daṭṭhabbato dvidhāti saṅkhepato vitthārato cāti evaṃ dvidhā daṭṭhabbatopettha vinicchayanayo viññātabbo.
anya-e0102n:526_2: Saṅkhepato hi pañcupādānakkhandhā āsīvisūpame vuttanayena ukkhittāsikapaccatthikato,
anya-e0102n:526_6: Vitthārato panettha pheṇapiṇḍo viya rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0102n:526_16: Visesato ca suḷārampi ajjhattikaṃ rūpaṃ asubhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:527_1: Evaṃ passantassatthasiddhitoti evañca saṅkhepavitthāravasena dvidhā passato yā atthasiddhi hoti,
anya-e0102n:527_4: saṅkhepato tāva pañcupādānakkhandhe ukkhittāsikapaccatthikādibhāvena passanto khandhehi na vihaññati.
anya-e0102n:527_5: Vitthārato pana rūpādīni pheṇapiṇḍādisadisabhāvena passanto na asāresu sāradassī hoti.
anya-e0102n:528_0: Visesato ca ajjhattikarūpaṃ asubhato passanto kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ parijānāti,
anya-e0102n:530_0: Saññaṃ saṅkhāre ca anattato passanto manosañcetanāhāraṃ parijānāti,
anya-e0102n:541_0: Attha lakkhaṇa tāvatva, kama saṅkhepa vitthārā;
anya-e0102n:544_4: Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādinā kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti,
anya-e0102n:544_6: Te ca āyabhūte dhamme etāni tanonti,
anya-e0102n:544_8: idañca anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ atīva āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati,
anya-e0102n:544_13: āyatassa ca nayanato āyatanaṃ āyatananti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n:545_1: Apica nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhena ca āyatanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:545_2: Tathā hi loke “issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ āyatananti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:545_4: Sāsane pana “manoramme āyatane sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:545_6: “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:546_0: Cakkhuādīsu cāpi te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:546_1: Cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā tannissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti cakkhādayo nesaṃ ākaro.
anya-e0102n:546_12: kāraṇaṭṭhenacāti imehipi kāraṇehi ete dhammā āyatanaṃ āyatananti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n:547_0: Tasmā yathāvuttena atthena cakkhu ca taṃ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:547_1: dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti dhammāyatananti evaṃ tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:548_2: Tāni ca pana tesaṃ lakkhaṇāni khandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:549_3: evaṃ sati dhammāyatanamicceva avatvā kasmā dvādasāyatanānīti vuttānīti ce.
anya-e0102n:549_5: ca vavatthānato ayametesaṃ bhedo hotīti dvādasa vuttāni,
anya-e0102n:549_11: Iti channaṃ viññāṇakāyānaṃ uppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato dvādasa vuttānīti evamettha tāvatvato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:550_1: Kamatoti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati.
anya-e0102n:550_2: Ajjhattikesu hi āyatanesu sanidassanasappaṭighavisayattā cakkhāyatanaṃ pākaṭanti paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:550_4: Atha vā dassanānuttariyasavanānuttariyahetubhāvena bahūpakārattā ajjhattikesu cakkhāyatanasotāyatanāni paṭhamaṃ desitāni,
anya-e0102n:550_7: cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pana gocarattā tassa tassa antarantarāni bāhiresu rūpāyatanādīni.
anya-e0102n:550_9: Vuttañhetaṃ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:550_10: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n:551_1: Saṅkhepavitthārāti saṅkhepato hi manāyatanassa ceva dhammāyatanekadesassa ca nāmena tadavasesānañca āyatanānaṃ
anya-e0102n:551_2: rūpena saṅgahitattā dvādasāpi āyatanāni nāmarūpamattameva honti.
anya-e0102n:551_3: Vitthārato pana ajjhattikesu tāva cakkhāyatanaṃ jātivasena cakkhupasādamattameva,
anya-e0102n:552_1: Daṭṭhabbatoti ettha pana sabbāneva saṅkhatāni āyatanāni anāgamanato aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0102n:552_2: Na hi tāni pubbe udayā kutoci āgacchanti,
anya-e0102n:552_9: Na hi cakkhurūpādīnaṃ evaṃ hoti “aho vata amhākaṃ sāmaggiyaṃ viññāṇaṃ nāma uppajjeyyā”ti,
anya-e0102n:552_10: na ca tāni viññāṇuppādanatthaṃ dvārabhāvena vatthubhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena vā īhanti,
anya-e0102n:552_22: Apica ajjhattikāni cha pāṇakā viya daṭṭhabbāni,
anya-e0102n:558_2: Cakkhussa viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇanti evamādinā tāva nayena cakkhādīnaṃ visesatthato veditabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:558_6: Lokiyā hi dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viya suvaṇṇarajatādiṃ,
anya-e0102n:558_13: Etāhi ca karaṇabhūtāhi saṃsāradukkhaṃ sattehi anuvidhīyati.
anya-e0102n:558_16: Iti cakkhādīsu ekeko dhammo yathāsambhavaṃ vidahati,
anya-e0102n:559_1: Apica yathā titthiyānaṃ attā nāma sabhāvato natthi,
anya-e0102n:559_3: etā pana attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo.
anya-e0102n:559_4: Yathā loke vicittā haritālamanosilādayo selāvayavā dhātuyoti vuccanti,
anya-e0102n:559_7: Yathā vā sarīrasaṅkhātassa samudāyassa avayavabhūtesu rasasoṇitādīsu aññamaññavisabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnesu dhātusamaññā,
anya-e0102n:559_8: evametesupi pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa attabhāvassa avayavesu dhātusamaññā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:559_11: Tathā hi bhagavā “cha dhāturo ayaṃ bhikkhu puriso”tiādīsu jīvasaññāsamūhananatthaṃ dhātudesanaṃ akāsīti.
anya-e0102n:560_0: Tasmā yathāvuttena atthena cakkhu ca taṃ dhātu ca cakkhudhātu…pe…
anya-e0102n:561_2: Tāni ca pana nesaṃ lakkhaṇādīni khandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:562_0: Kamatoti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati.
anya-e0102n:563_35: “anekadhātu nānādhātu loko”ti evamādayo aññāpi dhātuyo dissanti.
anya-e0102n:563_36: Evaṃ sati sabbāsaṃ vasena paricchedaṃ akatvā kasmā aṭṭhārasāti ayameva paricchedo katoti ce.
anya-e0102n:564_5: Kusalavipākārammaṇā vā rūpādayo eva subhadhātūti rūpādimattamevesā.
anya-e0102n:565_4: “heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito paranimmitavasavattī deve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare
anya-e0102n:565_5: etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā rūpā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:566_1: “sabbepi kusalā dhammā nekkhammadhātū”ti vacanato manoviññāṇadhātupi hotiyeva.
anya-e0102n:567_4: lokiyā kusalābyākatā ubhopi cakkhudhātuādayo ca majjhimadhātu,
anya-e0102n:569_3: Iti sabhāvato vijjamānānaṃ sabbadhātūnaṃ tadantogadhattā aṭṭhāraseva vuttāti.
anya-e0102n:570_1: Apica vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññīnaṃ saññāsamūhananatthampi aṭṭhāraseva vuttā.
anya-e0102n:570_2: Santi hi sattā vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññino,
anya-e0102n:570_4: aniccatañca pakāsetvā dīgharattānusayitaṃ jīvasaññaṃ samūhanitukāmena bhagavatā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pakāsitā.
anya-e0102n:570_6: Ye ca imāya anatisaṅkhepavitthārāya desanāya veneyyasattā,
anya-e0102n:576_1: Saṅkhatoti cakkhudhātu tāva jātito eko dhammotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati cakkhupasādavasena,
anya-e0102n:576_3: phoṭṭhabbadhātu pana pathavītejovāyovasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:576_4: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātu kusalākusalavipākavasena dve dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0102n:576_6: Manodhātu pana pañcadvārāvajjanakusalākusalavipākasampaṭicchanavasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:576_7: Dhammadhātu tiṇṇaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ soḷasannaṃ sukhumarūpānaṃ asaṅkhatāya ca dhātuyā vasena vīsati dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:576_8: Manoviññāṇadhātu sesakusalākusalābyākataviññāṇavasena chasattati dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:577_1: Paccayāti ettha ca cakkhudhātu tāva cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā vippayuttapurejātaatthiavigatanissayindriyapaccayānaṃ vasena chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:577_2: rūpadhātu purejātaatthiavigatārammaṇapaccayānaṃ vasena catūhi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:577_4: Pañcannaṃ pana nesaṃ āvajjanamanodhātu anantarasamanantaranatthivigatānantarūpanissayavasena pañcahi paccayehi paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:577_9: Javanamanoviññāṇadhātu pana anantarāya javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā tehi ceva pañcahi āsevanapaccayena cāti chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:578_1: Āvajjanamanoviññāṇadhātu ca javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā purimehi pañcahi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:578_2: Dhammadhātu pana sattannampi viññāṇadhātūnaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatādīhi bahudhā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:578_3: Cakkhudhātuādayo pana ekaccā ca dhammadhātu ekaccāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇapaccayādīhipi paccayā honti.
anya-e0102n:578_4: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnañca na kevalaṃ cakkhurūpādayo paccayā honti,
anya-e0102n:580_1: Vitthārato pana paccayappabhedo paṭiccasamuppādaniddese āvibhavissatīti evamettha paccayatopi veditabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:581_2: Sabbā eva hi saṅkhatadhātuyo pubbantāparantavivittato dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvasuññato paccayāyattavuttito ca daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:582_0: Visesato panettha bheritalaṃ viya cakkhudhātu daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0102n:583_0: Manodhātu pana yathāsambhavato cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:584_0: Dhammadhātuyā vedanākkhandho sallamiva sūlamiva ca daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:584_2: puthujjanānaṃ vā saññā āsādukkhajananato rittamuṭṭhi viya.
anya-e0102n:584_4: Saṅkhārā paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanato aṅgārakāsuyaṃ khipanakapurisā viya.
anya-e0102n:584_8: Asaṅkhatā pana dhātu amatato santato khemato ca daṭṭhabbā. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:592_1: Dhātūnaṃ anantaraṃ uddiṭṭhāni pana indriyānīti bāvīsatindriyāni –
anya-e0102n:592_2: cakkhundriyaṃ sotindriyaṃ ghānindriyaṃ jivhindriyaṃ kāyindriyaṃ manindriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ
anya-e0102n:592_3: jīvitindriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ domanassindriyaṃ upekkhindriyaṃ saddhindriyaṃ
anya-e0102n:592_4: vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ aññātāvindriyanti.  Tattha –
anya-e0102n:594_0: Bhedābhedā tathā kiccā, bhūmito ca vinicchayaṃ.
anya-e0102n:595_0: Tattha cakkhādīnaṃ tāva cakkhatīti cakkhūtiādinā nayena attho pakāsito.
anya-e0102n:595_1: Pacchimesu pana tīsu paṭhamaṃ pubbabhāge anaññātaṃ amataṃ padaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ vā jānissāmīti evaṃ
anya-e0102n:595_2: paṭipannassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:595_4: Tatiyaṃ aññātāvino catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitaññāṇakiccassa khīṇāsavassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññātāvindriyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:596_10: Tenevettha kammasañjanitāni tāva indriyāni kusalākusalakammaṃ ulliṅgenti.
anya-e0102n:596_11: Tena ca siṭṭhānīti indaliṅgaṭṭhena indasiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni.
anya-e0102n:596_12: Sabbāneva panetāni bhagavatā yathābhūtato pakāsitāni abhisambuddhāni cāti indadesitaṭṭhena indadiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni.
anya-e0102n:596_13: Teneva bhagavatā munindena kānici gocarāsevanāya kānici bhāvanāsevanāya sevitānīti indajuṭṭhaṭṭhenāpi indriyāni.
anya-e0102n:597_2: tasmiṃ tikkhe tikkhattā mande ca mandattāti.
anya-e0102n:598_0: Lakkhaṇādīhīti lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānehipi cakkhādīnaṃ vinicchayaṃ vijāniyāti attho.
anya-e0102n:598_1: Tāni ca nesaṃ lakkhaṇādīni khandhaniddese vuttāneva.
anya-e0102n:599_2: Tattha ajjhattadhamme pariññāya ariyabhūmipaṭilābho hotīti attabhāvapariyāpannāni cakkhundriyādīni paṭhamaṃ desitāni.
anya-e0102n:599_3: So pana attabhāvo yaṃ dhammaṃ upādāya itthīti vā purisoti vā saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0102n:599_4: ayaṃ soti nidassanatthaṃ tato itthindriyaṃ purisindriyañca.
anya-e0102n:599_5: So duvidhopi jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhavuttīti ñāpanatthaṃ tato jīvitindriyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:599_9: sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhanti ñāpanatthaṃ tato sukhindriyādīni.
anya-e0102n:599_10: Taṃnirodhatthaṃ pana ete dhammā bhāvetabbāti paṭipattidassanatthaṃ tato saddhādīni.
anya-e0102n:599_11: Imāya paṭipattiyā esa dhammo paṭhamaṃ attani pātubhavatīti paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanatthaṃ tato anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:599_12: Tasseva phalattā tato anantaraṃ bhāvetabbato ca tato aññindriyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:599_14: adhigate ca pana imasmiṃ natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti ñāpanatthaṃ ante paramassāsabhūtaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ desitanti ayamettha kamo.
anya-e0102n:600_2: Sesānaṃ abhedoti evamettha bhedābhedato vinicchayaṃ vijāniyā.
anya-e0102n:601_2: Cakkhundriyassa tāva “cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ indriyapaccayena
anya-e0102n:601_3: paccayo”ti vacanato yaṃ taṃ indriyapaccayabhāvena sādhetabbaṃ attano tikkhamandādibhāvena cakkhuviññāṇādidhammānaṃ
anya-e0102n:601_15: Aññātāvindriyassa sabbakiccesu ussukkappahānañceva amatābhimukhabhāvapaccayatā ca sampayuttānanti evamettha kiccato vinicchayaṃ vijāniyā.
anya-e0102n:602_4: Avasāne tīṇi lokuttarānevāti evamettha bhūmitopi vinicchayaṃ vijāneyya.
anya-e0102n:614_0: Tattha vibhāgatoti dukkhādīnaṃ hi cattāro cattāro atthā vibhattā tathā avitathā anaññathā,
anya-e0102n:614_3: ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
anya-e0102n:614_7: Ime cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā”ti.
anya-e0102n:614_8: Tathā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”ti evamādi.
anya-e0102n:614_9: Iti evaṃ vibhattānaṃ catunnaṃ catunnaṃ atthānaṃ vasena dukkhādīni veditabbānīti.
anya-e0102n:615_1: Nibbacanalakkhaṇādippabhedatoti ettha pana nibbacanato tāva idha du-
anya-e0102n:615_3: Kucchitaṃ hi puttaṃ dupputtoti vadanti. Khaṃ-
anya-e0102n:615_8: Tasmā kucchitattā tucchattā ca dukkhanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:616_1: iti ca ayaṃ saddo “samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu saṃyogaṃ dīpeti. U-
anya-e0102n:616_5: Iti dukkhassa saṃyoge uppattikāraṇattā dukkhasamudayanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:617_3: Tasmā abhāvo ettha saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā,
anya-e0102n:617_4: samadhigate vā tasmiṃ saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti,
anya-e0102n:618_0: Catutthasaccaṃ pana yasmā etaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati ārammaṇavasena tadabhimukhabhūtattā,
anya-e0102n:619_17: Atha vā etesaṃ abhisambuddhattā ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:619_20: catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho ariyoti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:619_21: Apica kho pana ariyāni saccānītipi ariyasaccāni.
anya-e0102n:619_22: Ariyānīti tathāni avitathāni avisaṃvādakānīti attho. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:619_26: tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti evamettha nibbacanato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:620_15: Tathā saṅkhatataṇhā asaṅkhatadassanalakkhaṇāni cāti evamettha lakkhaṇādippabhedato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:621_1: Atthatthuddhārato cevāti ettha pana atthato tāva ko saccaṭṭhoti ce?
anya-e0102n:621_4: titthiyānaṃ attāva anupalabbhasabhāvo ca na hoti,
anya-e0102n:621_5: atha kho bādhanappabhavasantiniyyānappakārena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvena ariyañāṇassa gocaro hotiyeva.
anya-e0102n:621_7: lokapakati viya ca tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo saccaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:622_0: Nābādhakaṃ yato dukkhaṃ, dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhakaṃ;
anya-e0102n:624_0: Taṃ vinā nāññato dukkhaṃ, na hoti na ca taṃ tato;
anya-e0102n:626_0: Nāññā nibbānato santi, santaṃ na ca na taṃ yato;
anya-e0102n:628_0: Maggā aññaṃ na niyyānaṃ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
anya-e0102n:633_7: “Kasmā nu saccāni vadanti nānā pavādiyāse kusalāvadānā”tiādīsu diṭṭhisacce.
anya-e0102n:633_8: “Ekaṃ hi saccaṃ na dutiya”ntiādīsu paramatthasacce nibbāne ceva magge ca.
anya-e0102n:633_10: Svāyamidhāpi ariyasacce vattatīti evamettha atthuddhāratopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:634_1: Anūnādhikatoti kasmā pana cattāreva ariyasaccāni vuttāni anūnāni anadhikānīti ce?
anya-e0102n:634_3: Na hi etehi aññaṃ adhikaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:634_4: etesaṃ vā ekampi apanetabbaṃ sambhoti. Yathāha – “idha,
anya-e0102n:634_6: āgaccheyya samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ‘netaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:634_8: Ahametaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paññapessāmī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”tiādi.
anya-e0102n:634_12: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃ vadeyya ‘netaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yaṃ samaṇena gotamena desitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:634_13: ahametaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paccakkhāya aññaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paññapessāmī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”tiādi.
anya-e0102n:635_5: ālayaālayārāmatāālayasamugghātaālayasamugghātupāyānañca vasenāpi cattāreva vuttānīti evamettha anūnādhikato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:636_3: sabbasattasādhāraṇattā ca suviññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:636_7: Bhavasukhassādagadhitānaṃ vā sattānaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ dukkhamāha.
anya-e0102n:636_10: ito pana hotīti ñāpanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ samudayaṃ.
anya-e0102n:636_11: Tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhūtattā saṃviggamānasānaṃ dukkhanissaraṇagavesīnaṃ nissaraṇadassanena assāsajananatthaṃ nirodhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:636_12: Tato nirodhādhigamatthaṃ nirodhasampāpakaṃ magganti evamettha kamato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:637_1: Jātiādīnaṃ nicchayāti ye te ariyasaccāni niddisantena bhagavatā “jātipi dukkhā,
anya-e0102n:637_8: saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti dukkhaniddese dvādasa dhammā,
anya-e0102n:637_14: “yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo”ti evaṃ nirodhaniddese atthato ekameva nibbānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:637_19: sammāsamādhī”ti evaṃ magganiddese aṭṭha dhammāti iti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ niddese jātiādayo dhammā vuttā,
anya-e0102n:637_20: tesaṃ jātiādīnaṃ nicchayāpi ettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:640_3: Tathā hesa “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”ti ettha bhave āgato. “Atthi, visākhe,
anya-e0102n:641_1: Svāyamidha gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva mātukucchimhā nikkhamanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:641_5: Nippariyāyato pana tattha tattha nibbattamānānaṃ sattānaṃ ye ye khandhā pātubhavanti,
anya-e0102n:642_0: Sā panesā tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattilakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n:644_0: Tattha kāyikacetasikā dukkhā vedanāsabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā dukkhadukkhanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:646_0: Upekkhā vedanā ceva avasesā ca tebhūmakā saṅkhārā udayabbayappaṭipīḷitattā saṅkhāradukkhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:646_1: Kaṇṇasūladantasūlarāgajapariḷāhadosajapariḷāhādi kāyikacetasiko ābādho pucchitvā jānitabbato upakkamassa ca apākaṭabhāvato paṭicchannadukkhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:647_0: Dvattiṃsakammakāraṇādisamuṭṭhāno ābādho apucchitvāva jānitabbato upakkamassa ca pākaṭabhāvato appaṭicchannadukkhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:648_0: Ṭhapetvā dukkhadukkhaṃ sesaṃ dukkhasaccavibhaṅge āgataṃ jātiādi sabbampi tassa tassa dukkhassa vatthubhāvato pariyāyadukkhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:649_0: Tatrāyaṃ jāti yaṃ taṃ bālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu bhagavatāpi upamāvasena pakāsitaṃ āpāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:649_1: yañca sugatiyampi manussaloke gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:650_2: ayaṃ hi satto mātukucchimhi nibbattamāno na uppalapadumapuṇḍarīkādīsu nibbattati,
anya-e0102n:650_3: atha kho heṭṭhā āmāsayassa upari pakkāsayassa udarapaṭalapiṭṭhikaṇṭakānaṃ vemajjhe paramasambādhe tibbandhakārenānākuṇapagandhaparibhāvitaparamaduggandhapavanavicarite
anya-e0102n:650_4: adhimattajegucche kucchipadese pūtimacchapūtikummāsacandanikādīsu kimi viya nibbattati.
anya-e0102n:650_5: So tattha nibbatto dasa māse mātukucchisambhavena usmanā puṭapākaṃ viya paccamāno piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya sediyamāno
anya-e0102n:651_0: Yaṃ pana so mātu sahasā upakkhalanagamananisīdanavuṭṭhānaparivattanādīsu surādhuttahatthagato eḷako viya
anya-e0102n:651_1: ahituṇḍikahatthagato sappapotako viya ca ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaodhūnananiddhūnanādinā upakkamena adhimattaṃ
anya-e0102n:652_0: Yaṃ panassa mūḷhagabbhāya mātuyā mittāmaccasuhajjādīhipi adassanārahe dukkhuppattiṭṭhāne chedanaphālanādīhi dukkhaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:653_0: Yaṃ vijāyamānāya mātuyā kammajehi vātehi parivattetvā narakapapātaṃ viya atibhayānakaṃ yonimaggaṃ paṭipātiyamānassa
anya-e0102n:653_1: paramasambādhena yonimukhena tāḷacchiggaḷena viya nikkaḍḍhiyamānassa mahānāgassa narakasattassa viya
anya-e0102n:655_0: Yaṃ tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ attanāva attānaṃ vadhentassa acelakavatādivasena ātāpanaparitāpanānuyogamanuyuttassa,
anya-e0102n:655_4: Yaṃ pana parato vadhabandhanādīni anubhavantassa uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:656_0: Iti imassa sabbassāpi dukkhassa ayaṃ jāti vatthumeva hoti.
anya-e0102n:664_0: Yaṃ taṃ kathaṃ tattha bhaveyya jātiṃ,
anya-e0102n:672_0: Na taṃ bhave tattha na cassa jāti,
anya-e0102n:677_0: Jātiṃ vinā itipi jāti ayañhi dukkhā.
anya-e0102n:678_0: Kiṃ bhāsitena bahunā nanu yaṃ kuhiñci,
anya-e0102n:684_1: Jarāpi dukkhāti ettha duvidhā jarā saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca,
anya-e0102n:689_0: “Pappoti dukkhaṃ yaṃ macco, kāyikaṃ mānasaṃ tathā;
anya-e0102n:690_0: Sabbametaṃ jarāhetu, yasmā tasmā jarā dukhā”ti.
anya-e0102n:693_1: Maraṇampi dukkhanti etthāpi duvidhaṃ maraṇaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca,
anya-e0102n:693_2: yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “jarāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti.
anya-e0102n:693_6: Jātipaccayā maraṇaṃ upakkamamaraṇaṃ sarasamaraṇaṃ āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ puññakkhayamaraṇantipi tasseva nāmaṃ.
anya-e0102n:703_1: Sokādīsu soko nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa cittasantāpo.
anya-e0102n:707_0: Dukkhampi vividhaṃ yasmā, tasmā dukkhoti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:719_0: Janayati yasmā tasmā, dukkhanti visesato vutta”nti.
anya-e0102n:723_0: “Pīḷeti yato cittaṃ, kāyassa ca pīḷanaṃ samāvahati;
anya-e0102n:727_1: Upāyāso nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa adhimattacetodukkhappabhāvito dosoyeva.
anya-e0102n:727_6: Dukkho pana saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato cittaparidahanato kāyavisādanato ca.
anya-e0102n:728_0: “Cittassa ca paridahanā, kāyassa visādanā ca adhimattaṃ;
anya-e0102n:729_0: Yaṃ dukkhamupāyāso, janeti dukkho tato vutto”ti.
anya-e0102n:731_0: Ettha ca mandagginā antobhājane pāko viya soko.
anya-e0102n:731_1: Tikkhagginā paccamānassa bhājanato bahinikkhamanaṃ viya paridevo.
anya-e0102n:731_2: Bahinikkhantāvasesassa nikkhamituṃ appahontassa antobhājaneyeva yāva parikkhayā pāko viya upāyāso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n:747_1: Yampicchaṃ na labhatīti ettha “aho vata mayaṃ na jātidhammā assāmā”tiādīsu alabbhaneyyavatthūsu icchāva yampicchaṃ na labhati,
anya-e0102n:749_0: Yaṃ vighātamayaṃ dukkhaṃ, sattānaṃ idha jāyati.
anya-e0102n:756_0: Avuttaṃ yañca taṃ sabbaṃ, vinā ete na vijjati.
anya-e0102n:759_4: gāmaṃ viya gāmaghātakā upādānakkhandhapañcakameva jātiādayo nānappakārehi vibādhentā tiṇalatādīni viya bhūmiyaṃ,
anya-e0102n:759_12: tena bādhiyamānānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ tattha paṭighuppattito cetobādhanadukkhaṃ domanassaṃ,
anya-e0102n:759_14: manorathavighātappattānaṃ icchāvighātadukkhaṃ icchitālābhoti evaṃ nānappakārato upaparikkhiyamānā upādānakkhandhāva dukkhāti.
anya-e0102n:759_15: Yadetaṃ ekamekaṃ dassetvā vuccamānaṃ anekehipi kappehi na sakkā asesato vattuṃ,
anya-e0102n:759_16: tasmā taṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ ekajalabindumhi sakalasamuddajalarasaṃ viya yesu kesuci pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu
anya-e0102n:759_17: saṃkhipitvā dassetuṃ “saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti bhagavā avocāti.
anya-e0102n:762_1: Samudayaniddese pana yāyaṃ taṇhāti yā ayaṃ taṇhā.
anya-e0102n:762_5: nandīrāgena saddhiṃ atthato ekattameva gatāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:762_6: Tatra tatrābhinandinīti yatra yatra attabhāvo nibbattati,
anya-e0102n:762_10: Kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhāti imā paṭiccasamuppādaniddese āvibhavissanti.
anya-e0102n:762_11: Idha panāyaṃ tividhāpi dukkhasaccassa nibbattakaṭṭhena ekattaṃ upanetvā dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccanti vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:765_1: Dukkhanirodhaniddese yo tassāyeva taṇhāyātiādinā nayena samudayanirodho vutto,
anya-e0102n:770_1: tasmā bhagavā dukkhanirodhaṃ desento samudayanirodheneva desesi.
anya-e0102n:770_3: Te dukkhaṃ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca desentā hetumhi paṭipajjanti, na phale.
anya-e0102n:770_5: Te dukkhaṃ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca desentā attakilamathānuyogadesanādīhi phale paṭipajjanti,
anya-e0102n:770_7: Evaṃ tāva dukkhanirodhassa samudayanirodhavasena desanāya payojanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:771_2: tassāyeva taṇhāyāti tassā “ponobbhavikā”ti vatvā kāmataṇhādivasena vibhattataṇhāya.
anya-e0102n:771_8: tasmā aseso virāgo aseso nirodhoti evampettha yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n:771_9: Atthato pana sabbāneva etāni nibbānassa vevacanāni.
anya-e0102n:771_10: Paramatthato hi dukkhanirodho ariyasaccanti nibbānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0102n:771_11: Yasmā pana taṃ āgamma taṇhā virajjati ceva nirujjhati ca,
anya-e0102n:771_12: tasmā virāgoti ca nirodhoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0102n:771_13: Yasmā ca tadeva āgamma tassā cāgādayo honti,
anya-e0102n:775_1: Apica nibbānaṃ natthīti na vattabbaṃ, kasmā?
anya-e0102n:775_3: Asati hi nibbāne sammādiṭṭhipurejavāya sīlādikhandhattayasaṅgahāya sammāpaṭipattiyā vañjhabhāvo āpajjati.
anya-e0102n:775_13: Tadā kilesānaṃ avattamānattā na dosoti ce. Na,
anya-e0102n:775_15: Evañhi sati ariyamaggakkhaṇato pubbepi kilesā na santīti ariyamaggassa niratthakabhāvo āpajjati.
anya-e0102n:776_12: Yasmā khayā paṭṭhāya na bhiyyo pavatti nāma hoti,
anya-e0102n:776_13: tassa nibbānabhāvato na dosoti ce. Na,
anya-e0102n:776_19: Tato ca paṭṭhāya na bhiyyo dosānaṃ pavattīti.
anya-e0102n:778_3: Maggabhāve bhāvato na appabhavanti ce. Na,
anya-e0102n:779_2: Nibbānassa niccattā te niccāti ce. Na,
anya-e0102n:779_4: Niccā uppādādīnaṃ abhāvato nibbānaṃ viyāti ce. Na,
anya-e0102n:780_6: upādisesañca upādāya paññāpanīyattā saha upādisesena paññāpiyatīti saupādisesaṃ.
anya-e0102n:780_7: Yo cassa samudayappahānena upahatāyatikammaphalassa carimacittato ca uddhaṃ pavattikhandhānaṃ anuppādanato,
anya-e0102n:780_9: taṃ upādāya paññāpanīyato natthi ettha upādisesoti anupādisesaṃ.
anya-e0102n:781_1: sabbaññuvacanato ca paramatthena sabhāvato nibbānaṃ nāvijjamānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:784_1: Dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāniddese vuttā pana aṭṭha dhammā kāmaṃ khandhaniddesepi atthato pakāsitāyeva,
anya-e0102n:784_2: idha pana nesaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavattamānānaṃ visesāvabodhanatthaṃ vadāma.
anya-e0102n:784_3: Saṅkhepato hi catusaccapaṭivedhāya paṭipannassa yogino nibbānārammaṇaṃ avijjānusayasamugghātakaṃ paññācakkhu sammādiṭṭhi.
anya-e0102n:784_7: Tathā sampannadiṭṭhino taṃsampayuttaṃ micchāsaṅkappanighātakaṃ cetaso nibbānapadābhiniropanaṃ sammāsaṅkappo.
anya-e0102n:785_0: Tathā passato vitakkayato ca taṃsampayuttāva vacīduccaritasamugghātikā micchāvācāya virati sammāvācā nāma.
anya-e0102n:785_4: Tathā viramato taṃsampayuttāva micchākammantasamucchedikā pāṇātipātādivirati sammākammanto nāma.
anya-e0102n:785_8: Yā panassa tesaṃ sammāvācākammantānaṃ visuddhibhūtā taṃsampayuttāva kuhanādiupacchedikā micchājīvavirati,
anya-e0102n:786_0: Athassa yo tassā sammāvācākammantājīvasaṅkhātāya sīlabhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitassa tadanurūpo taṃsampayuttova kosajjasamucchedako vīriyārambho,
anya-e0102n:786_5: Tassevaṃ vāyamato taṃsampayuttova micchāsativiniddhunano cetaso asammoso sammāsati nāma.
anya-e0102n:786_9: Evaṃ anuttarāya satiyā saṃrakkhiyamānacittassa taṃsampayuttāva micchāsamādhividdhaṃsikā cittekaggatā sammāsamādhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:787_4: Tattha anubodhañāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ anussavādivasena nirodhe magge ca pavattati.
anya-e0102n:787_5: Paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ nirodhamārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccato cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhati. Yathāha – “yo,
anya-e0102n:788_1: tattha dukkhañāṇaṃ pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavavasena pavattamānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0102n:788_5: Dukkhañāṇaṃ vā dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitesu khandhesu dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvasaññāsaṅkhātaṃ phale vippaṭipattiṃ.
anya-e0102n:788_6: Samudayañāṇaṃ issarapadhānakālasabhāvādīhi loko pavattatīti akāraṇe kāraṇābhimānappavattaṃ hetumhi vippaṭipattiṃ.
anya-e0102n:788_8: Maggañāṇaṃ kāmasukhallikaattakilamathānuyogappabhede avisuddhimagge visuddhimaggagāhavasena pavattaṃ upāye vippaṭipattiṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0102n:790_0: Sammuyhati tāva naro, na vijānāti yāva saccānī”ti.
anya-e0102n:792_1: Antogadhānaṃ pabhedāti dukkhasaccasmiṃ hi ṭhapetvā taṇhañceva anāsavadhamme ca sesā sabbadhammā antogadhā.
anya-e0102n:792_9: Sabbesaṃyeva vā etesaṃ sammāvācākammantājīvānaṃ ariyakantasīlattā ariyakantasīlassa ca saddhāhatthena
anya-e0102n:792_14: antogadhānīti evamettha antogadhānaṃ pabhedatopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:793_1: Upamātoti bhāro viya hi dukkhasaccaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0102n:793_24: taṃsampāpakavāyāmehi ca yojetvāpetāni upamāto veditabbānīti evamettha upamāto vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:794_1: Catukkatoti atthi cettha dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:794_6: Tattha maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:794_10: Itaraṃ pana ariyasaccadvayaṃ siyā dukkhaṃ aniccato,
anya-e0102n:794_11: na pana yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena.
anya-e0102n:794_12: Sabbākārena pana upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca aññatra taṇhāya.
anya-e0102n:794_13: Maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pariññatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena neva dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ.
anya-e0102n:794_14: Evaṃ samudayādīsupi yathāyogaṃ yojetvā catukkatopettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:795_1: Suññatekavidhādīhītiettha suññato tāva paramatthena hi sabbāneva saccāni vedakakārakanibbutagamakābhāvato suññānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:803_2: Phalasuñño vā ettha hetu samudaye dukkhassābhāvato,
anya-e0102n:803_4: na phalena sagabbho pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya.
anya-e0102n:803_6: na hetusamavetaṃ hetuphalaṃ samavāyavādīnaṃ dviaṇukādi viya.
anya-e0102n:805_0: Suñño phalena hetu, phalampi taṃhetunā suñña”nti.
anya-e0102n:808_1: Ekavidhādīhīti sabbameva cettha dukkhaṃ ekavidhaṃ pavattibhāvato.
anya-e0102n:811_4: Ayañhi sappadesattā nagaraṃ viya rajjena nippadesehi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahito. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:812_2: ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā,
anya-e0102n:813_2: Kiñcāpi hi pāḷiyaṃ sīlakkhandheti bhummena niddeso kato,
anya-e0102n:813_4: Sammāvāyāmādīsu pana tīsu samādhi attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:813_5: vīriye pana paggahakiccaṃ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ sādhentiyā laddhupakāro hutvā sakkoti.
anya-e0102n:814_1: yathā hi nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmāti uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhesu tīsu sahāyesu eko supupphitaṃ campakarukkhaṃ disvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvā gahetumpi na sakkuṇeyya.
anya-e0102n:814_3: so tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvāpi kampamāno gahetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
anya-e0102n:814_5: So ekassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā ekassa aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha yathāruci pupphāni ocinitvā piḷandhitvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷeyya.
anya-e0102n:815_0: Ekato uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhā tayo sahāyā viya hi ekato jātā sammāvāyāmādayo tayo dhammā.
anya-e0102n:815_2: Hatthaṃ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṃ asakkonto viya attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ asakkonto samādhi.
anya-e0102n:815_5: Yathā tesu ekassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā ekassa aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha itaro yathāruci pupphaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:815_6: evameva vīriye paggahakiccaṃ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ sādhentiyā laddhupakāro samādhi sakkoti ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ.
anya-e0102n:816_0: Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappesupi paññā attano dhammatāya aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0102n:816_1: Vitakke pana ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā dente sakkoti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:816_2: Yathā hi heraññiko kahāpaṇaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā sabbabhāgesu oloketukāmo samānopi na cakkhutaleneva parivattetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0102n:816_3: Aṅgulipabbehi pana parivattetvā parivattetvā ito cito ca oloketuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:816_4: evameva na paññā attano dhammatāya aniccādivasena ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0102n:816_5: Abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana āhananapariyāhananarasena vitakkena ākoṭentena viya parivattentena viya ca ādāyādāya dinnameva nicchetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0102n:816_6: Tasmā idhāpi sammādiṭṭhiyeva sajātito paññākkhandhena saṅgahitā,
anya-e0102n:817_0: Iti imehi tīhi khandhehi maggo saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:818_7: Catubbidhāni pariññeyyādibhedatoti evamettha ekavidhādīhi vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:819_1: Sabhāgavisabhāgatoti sabbāneva saccāni aññamaññaṃ sabhāgāni avitathato attasuññato dukkarapaṭivedhato ca. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:820_1: katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:820_2: yo vā dūratova sukhumena tāḷacchiggaḷena asanaṃ atipāteyya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ avirādhitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:820_3: yo vā satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyyāti? Etadeva, bhante,
anya-e0102n:820_5: yo vā satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyyāti.
anya-e0102n:821_1: Purimāni ca dve sabhāgāni duravagāhatthena gambhīrattā lokiyattā sāsavattā ca.
anya-e0102n:821_3: Pacchimānipi dve sabhāgāni gambhīrattena duravagāhattā lokuttarattā anāsavattā ca.
anya-e0102n:822_0: Iti evaṃ pakārehi, nayehi ca vicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0102n:830_1: Idāni “khandhāyatanadhātuindriyasaccapaṭiccasamuppādādibhedā dhammā bhūmī”ti evaṃ vuttesu imissā paññāya
anya-e0102n:830_3: ādisaddena saṅgahitā paṭiccasamuppannā dhammā ca avasesā honti,
anya-e0102n:831_0: Tattha avijjādayo tāva dhammā paṭiccasamuppādoti veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0102n:833_0: Jarāmaraṇādayo pana paṭiccasamuppannā dhammāti veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0102n:834_5: aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ. Jāti,
anya-e0102n:834_6: bhikkhave…pe… bhavo… upādānaṃ… taṇhā… vedanā… phasso…
anya-e0102n:834_10: aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā.
anya-e0102n:835_3: Paṭiccasamuppannā dhammāti tehi tehi paccayehi nibbattadhammā.
anya-e0102n:836_6: uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā idappaccayatā.
anya-e0102n:836_8: abhisambujjhitvā abhisametvā ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti,
anya-e0102n:836_22: yā tatra tathatā avitathatā anaññathatā idappaccayatā.
anya-e0102n:837_1: Evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ desentena tathatādīhi vevacanehi paccayadhammāva paṭiccasamuppādoti vuttā.
anya-e0102n:838_0: So panāyaṃ tehi tehi paccayehi anūnādhikeheva tassa tassa dhammassa sambhavato tathatāti,
anya-e0102n:838_1: sāmaggiṃ upagatesu paccayesu muhuttampi tato nibbattadhammānaṃ asambhavābhāvato avitathatāti,
anya-e0102n:838_3: yathāvuttānaṃ etesaṃ jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ paccayato vā paccayasamūhato vā idappaccayatāti vutto.
anya-e0102n:840_1: Keci pana paṭicca sammā ca titthiyaparikappitapakatipurisādikāraṇanirapekkho uppādo paṭiccasamuppādoti evaṃ uppādamattaṃ paṭiccasamuppādoti vadanti,
anya-e0102n:840_8: Taṃ “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti ca vadantassa padesavihārasuttavirodho āpajjati. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:840_9: Bhagavato hi “atha kho bhagavā rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasākāsī”ti
anya-e0102n:840_18: Yathāha “so evaṃ pajānāmi micchādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayitaṃ sammādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayitaṃ micchāsaṅkappapaccayāpi vedayita”nti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:841_1: yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā,
anya-e0102n:841_2: sā na hotī”ti anulomapaṭiccasamuppādo lokapaccayato “lokasamudayo”ti ucchedadiṭṭhisamugghātatthaṃ pakāsito,
anya-e0102n:841_4: Na hi uppādamattadassanena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā samugghāto hoti.
anya-e0102n:842_0: Gambhīranayāsambhavatoti vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatā “gambhīro cāyaṃ, ānanda,
anya-e0102n:842_6: tampi nayacatukkaṃ uppādamatte natthīti gambhīranayāsambhavatopi na uppādamattaṃ paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0102n:843_1: Saddabhedatoti paṭiccasaddo ca panāyaṃ samāne kattari pubbakāle payujjamāno atthasiddhikaro hoti.
anya-e0102n:843_4: Idha pana bhāvasādhanena uppādasaddena saddhiṃ payujjamāno samānassa kattu abhāvato saddabhedaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0102n:843_5: na ca kiñci atthaṃ sādhetīti saddabhedatopi na uppādamattaṃ paṭiccasamuppādoti.
anya-e0102n:844_14: Imesu hi padesu ekenapi saddhiṃ hoti-
anya-e0102n:845_2: bhāvo ca nāma yo ākāro avijjādīnaṃ saṅkhārādipātubhāve hetu, so.
anya-e0102n:845_12: yadidaṃ avijjā”ti evaṃ avijjādayova hetūti vuttā,
anya-e0102n:845_14: Tasmā “paṭiccasamuppādoti paccayadhammā veditabbā”ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0102n:846_1: Yā panettha “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti imāya byañjanacchāyāya uppādoyevāyaṃ vuttoti saññā uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:846_2: sā imassa padassa evamatthaṃ gahetvā vūpasametabbā.
anya-e0102n:847_0: Dvedhā tato pavatte, dhammasamūhe yato idaṃ vacanaṃ;
anya-e0102n:849_0: Yo hi ayaṃ paccayatāya pavatto dhammasamūho,
anya-e0102n:849_1: tattha paṭiccasamuppādoti idaṃ vacanaṃ dvidhā icchanti.
anya-e0102n:849_2: So hi yasmā patīyamāno hitāya sukhāya ca saṃvattati,
anya-e0102n:849_4: Uppajjamāno ca saha sammā ca uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:849_7: Evaṃ paṭicco ca so samuppādo cāti paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0102n:849_9: paccayasāmaggiṃ pana paṭicca apaccakkhāyāti evampi paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0102n:849_10: Tassa cāyaṃ hetusamūho paccayoti tappaccayattā ayampi,
anya-e0102n:849_11: yathā loke semhassa paccayo guḷo semho guḷoti vuccati,
anya-e0102n:849_12: yathā ca sāsane sukhappaccayo buddhānaṃ uppādo “sukho buddhānaṃ uppādo”ti vuccati,
anya-e0102n:849_13: tathā paṭiccasamuppādo icceva phalavohārena vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:852_0: Sahite uppādeti ca, iti vutto so samuppādo.
anya-e0102n:853_0: Yo hi esa saṅkhārādīnaṃ pātubhāvāya avijjādiekekahetusīsena niddiṭṭho hetusamūho,
anya-e0102n:853_1: so sādhāraṇaphalanipphādakaṭṭhena avekallaṭṭhena ca sāmaggiaṅgānaṃ aññamaññena paṭimukhaṃ ito gatoti katvā paṭiccoti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:853_2: Svāyaṃ sahiteyeva aññamaññaṃ avinibbhogavuttidhamme uppādetīti samuppādotipi vutto.
anya-e0102n:853_3: Evampi paṭicco ca so samuppādo cāti paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0102n:855_0: Paccayatā aññoññaṃ, paṭicca yasmā samaṃ saha ca dhamme;
anya-e0102n:857_0: Avijjādisīsena niddiṭṭhapaccayesu hi ye paccayā yaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ dhammaṃ uppādenti,
anya-e0102n:857_1: na te aññamaññaṃ apaṭicca aññamaññavekalle sati uppādetuṃ samatthāti.
anya-e0102n:857_2: Tasmā paṭicca samaṃ saha ca na ekekadesaṃ,
anya-e0102n:857_3: nāpi pubbāparabhāvena ayaṃ paccayatā dhamme uppādetīti atthānusāravohārakusalena muninā evamidha bhāsitā,
anya-e0102n:859_0: Purimena sassatādīna, mabhāvo pacchimena ca padena;
anya-e0102n:861_0: Purimenāti paccayasāmaggiparidīpakena paṭiccapadena pavattidhammānaṃ paccayasāmaggiyaṃ āyattavuttittā
anya-e0102n:861_4: Pacchimena ca padenāti dhammānaṃ uppādaparidīpakena samuppādapadena paccayasāmaggiyaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattito
anya-e0102n:861_6: Purimapurimapaccayavasena hi punappunaṃ uppajjamānesu dhammesu kuto ucchedo,
anya-e0102n:861_8: Dvayenāti sakalena paṭiccasamuppādavacanena tassā tassā paccayasāmaggiyā santatiṃ avicchinditvā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sambhavato majjhimā paṭipadā,
anya-e0102n:861_12: samaññāya anatidhāvananti ayaṃ ñāyo paridīpito hotīti ayaṃ tāva paṭiccasamuppādoti vacanamattassa attho.
anya-e0102n:862_1: Yā panāyaṃ bhagavatā paṭiccasamuppādaṃ desentena “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena nikkhittā tanti,
anya-e0102n:862_2: tassā atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ karontena vibhajjavādimaṇḍalaṃ otaritvā ācariye anabbhācikkhantena sakasamayaṃ
anya-e0102n:862_3: avokkamantena parasamayaṃ anāyūhantena suttaṃ appaṭibāhantena vinayaṃ anulomentena mahāpadese olokentena
anya-e0102n:862_4: dhammaṃ dīpentena atthaṃ saṅgāhentena tamevatthaṃ punarāvattetvā aparehipi pariyāyantarehi niddisantena
anya-e0102n:864_0: Duddasā caturo dhammā, desetuṃ ca sudukkarā”ti.
anya-e0102n:865_0: Tasmā aññatra āgamādhigamappattehi na sukarā paṭiccasamuppādassatthavaṇṇanāti paritulayitvā,
anya-e0102n:877_0: 582. Iti avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādīsu hi āditoyeva tāva,
anya-e0102n:878_0: Desanābhedato attha, lakkhaṇekavidhādito. Aṅgānañca vavatthānā, viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:879_0: Tattha desanābhedatoti bhagavato hi vallihārakānaṃ catunnaṃ purisānaṃ valligahaṇaṃ viya ādito vā majjhato vā paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:879_1: tathā pariyosānato vā majjhato vā paṭṭhāya yāva ādīti catubbidhā paṭiccasamuppādadesanā.
anya-e0102n:880_0: Yathā hi vallihārakesu catūsu purisesu eko valliyā mūlameva paṭhamaṃ passati,
anya-e0102n:880_1: so taṃ mūle chetvā sabbaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā ādāya kamme upaneti,
anya-e0102n:880_5: jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānāpi paṭiccasamuppādaṃ deseti.
anya-e0102n:881_0: Yathā pana tesu purisesu eko valliyā majjhaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati,
anya-e0102n:881_1: so majjhe chinditvā uparibhāgaññeva ākaḍḍhitvā ādāya kamme upaneti,
anya-e0102n:881_2: evaṃ bhagavā “tassa taṃ vedanaṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
anya-e0102n:881_6: bhavapaccayā jātī”ti majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānāpi deseti.
anya-e0102n:882_0: Yathā ca tesu purisesu eko valliyā aggaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati,
anya-e0102n:882_1: so agge gahetvā aggānusārena yāva mūlā sabbaṃ ādāya kamme upaneti,
anya-e0102n:882_2: evaṃ bhagavā “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0102n:882_5: jarāmaraṇaṃ no vā kathaṃ vo ettha hotīti?
anya-e0102n:882_8: Evaṃ no ettha hoti jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti.
anya-e0102n:882_10: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0102n:882_13: saṅkhārā no vā kathaṃ vo ettha hotī”ti pariyosānato paṭṭhāya yāva āditopi paṭiccasamuppādaṃ deseti.
anya-e0102n:883_0: Yathā panetesu purisesu eko valliyā majjhameva paṭhamaṃ passati,
anya-e0102n:883_1: so majjhe chinditvā heṭṭhā otaranto yāva mūlā ādāya kamme upaneti,
anya-e0102n:883_17: avijjāpabhavā”ti majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva ādito deseti.
anya-e0102n:884_5: Desanāvilāsappatto ca bhagavā catuvesārajjapaṭisambhidāyogena catubbidhagambhīrabhāvappattiyā ca.
anya-e0102n:885_0: Visesato panassa yā ādito paṭṭhāya anulomadesanā,
anya-e0102n:885_1: sā pavattikāraṇavibhāgasaṃmūḷhaṃ veneyyajanaṃ samanupassato yathāsakehi kāraṇehi pavattisandassanatthaṃ
anya-e0102n:885_4: sā “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati cā”tiādinā nayena
anya-e0102n:885_5: kicchāpannaṃ lokaṃ anuvilokayato pubbabhāgapaṭivedhānusārena tassa tassa jarāmaraṇādikassa dukkhassa
anya-e0102n:885_7: Yā majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva ādi pavattā,
anya-e0102n:885_8: sā āhāranidānavavatthāpanānusārena yāva atītaṃ addhānaṃ atiharitvā puna atītaddhato pabhuti hetuphalapaṭipāṭisandassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0102n:885_9: Yā pana majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānaṃ pavattā,
anya-e0102n:885_10: sā paccuppanne addhāne anāgataddhahetusamuṭṭhānato pabhuti anāgataddhasandassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0102n:885_11: Tāsu yā pavattikāraṇasammūḷhassa veneyyajanassa yathāsakehi kāraṇehi pavattisandassanatthaṃ uppattikkamasandassanatthañca
anya-e0102n:886_2: kiṃ pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya avijjāpi akāraṇaṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ lokassāti?
anya-e0102n:886_5: Atthi pana pariyāyo yena mūlakāraṇaṃ siyā,
anya-e0102n:887_0: Bhagavā hi vaṭṭakathaṃ kathento dve dhamme sīsaṃ katvā katheti,
anya-e0102n:887_3: koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya ‘ito pubbe avijjā nāhosi,
anya-e0102n:887_7: atha ca pana paññāyati idappaccayā avijjā”ti.
anya-e0102n:887_10: koṭi na paññāyati bhavataṇhāya ‘ito pubbe bhavataṇhā nāhosi,
anya-e0102n:887_14: atha ca pana paññāyati idappaccayā bhavataṇhā”ti.
anya-e0102n:888_1: Kasmā pana bhagavā vaṭṭakathaṃ kathento ime dve dhamme sīsaṃ katvā kathetīti?
anya-e0102n:888_3: Duggatigāmino hi kammassa visesahetu avijjā. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:888_4: Yasmā avijjābhibhūto puthujjano aggisantāpalaguḷābhighātaparissamābhibhūtā vajjhagāvī tāya parissamāturatāya
anya-e0102n:888_5: nirassādampi attano anatthāvahampi ca uṇhodakapānaṃ viya kilesasantāpato nirassādampi duggatinipātanato
anya-e0102n:888_6: ca attano anatthāvahampi pāṇātipātādiṃ anekappakāraṃ duggatigāmikammaṃ ārabhati.
anya-e0102n:888_7: Sugatigāmino pana kammassa visesahetu bhavataṇhā. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:888_8: Yasmā bhavataṇhābhibhūto puthujjano sā vuttappakārā gāvī sītūdakataṇhāya saassādaṃ attano parissamavinodanañca
anya-e0102n:888_9: sītūdakapānaṃ viya kilesasantāpavirahato saassādaṃ sugatisampāpanena attano duggatidukkhaparissamavinodanañca
anya-e0102n:889_1: Etesu pana vaṭṭakathāya sīsabhūtesu dhammesu katthaci bhagavā ekadhammamūlikaṃ desanaṃ deseti.
anya-e0102n:889_14: bālassa taṇhāya sampayuttassa evamayaṃ kāyo samudāgato.
anya-e0102n:889_15: Iti ayañceva kāyo bahiddhā ca nāmarūpaṃ itthetaṃ dvayaṃ.
anya-e0102n:889_18: Tāsu desanāsu “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ayamidha avijjāvasena ekadhammamūlikā desanāti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:890_13: Dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotītipi avijjā.
anya-e0102n:890_17: Apica cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādapaṭiccasamuppannānañca dhammānaṃ chādanatopi avijjā.
anya-e0102n:891_3: Etīti uppajjati ceva pavattati cāti attho.
anya-e0102n:891_5: Avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo.
anya-e0102n:892_4: kāyavacīcittasaṅkhārā tayoti ime cha avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā.
anya-e0102n:893_5: Tattha “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”tiādīsu vuttā sabbepi sappaccayā dhammā saṅkhatasaṅkhārā nāma.
anya-e0102n:893_6: Kammanibbattā tebhūmakā rūpārūpadhammā abhisaṅkhatasaṅkhārāti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttā,
anya-e0102n:893_7: tepi “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”ti ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e0102n:893_8: Visuṃ pana nesaṃ āgataṭṭhānaṃ na paññāyati.
anya-e0102n:893_12: purisapuggalo puññañceva saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotī”tiādīsu āgataṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati.
anya-e0102n:893_15: tāvatikā gantvā akkhāhataṃ maññe aṭṭhāsī”tiādīsu āgato.
anya-e0102n:894_9: ito paraṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇantiādīsu vuttaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:896_4: Itarathā hi “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti vutte kiṃ karontīti na paññāyeyya,
