anya-e0102n:896_5: sambhavantīti pana yojanāya sati avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo.
anya-e0102n:896_6: Tasmā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantīti paccayapaccayuppannavavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:899_7: Dvārārammaṇato pana sabbesupi arūpadhammesu chabbidhatā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:903_3: Yonigatipariyāpannato catubbidhaṃ pañcavidhañcāti iminā nayena phassādīnampi ekavidhādibhāvo veditabboti
anya-e0102n:904_1: Aṅgānañca vavatthānāti sokādayo cettha bhavacakkassa avicchedadassanatthaṃ vuttā.
anya-e0102n:904_2: Jarāmaraṇabbhāhatassa hi bālassa te sambhavanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:904_5: puthujjano sārīrikāya dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṃ kandati sammohamāpajjatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:904_7: tāva avijjāyāti punapi avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti sambandhameva hoti bhavacakkaṃ.
anya-e0102n:904_8: Tasmā tesaṃ jarāmaraṇeneva ekasaṅkhepaṃ katvā dvādaseva paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:907_2: avijjāti suttantapariyāyena dukkhādīsu catūsu ṭhānesu aññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:907_10: Tattha kiñcāpi ṭhapetvā lokuttaraṃ saccadvayaṃ sesaṭṭhānesu ārammaṇavasena avijjā uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:907_12: Sā hi uppannā dukkhasaccaṃ paṭicchādetvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0102n:907_20: ime saṅkhārā”ti evaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇamettha paṭivijjhituṃ na deti.
anya-e0102n:908_1: Saṅkhārāti puññādayo tayo kāyasaṅkhārādayo tayoti evaṃ pubbe saṅkhepato vuttā cha,
anya-e0102n:908_2: vitthārato panettha puññābhisaṅkhāro dānasīlādivasena pavattā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā ceva bhāvanāvasena
anya-e0102n:908_3: pavattā pañca rūpāvacarakusalacetanā cāti terasa cetanā honti.
anya-e0102n:908_5: Āneñjābhisaṅkhāro bhāvanāvaseneva pavattā catasso arūpāvacarakusalacetanā cāti tayopi saṅkhārā ekūnatiṃsa cetanā honti.
anya-e0102n:909_3: Ayaṃ tiko kammāyūhanakkhaṇe puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ dvārato pavattidassanatthaṃ vutto.
anya-e0102n:909_4: Kāyaviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā hi kāyadvārato pavattā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā,
anya-e0102n:909_5: dvādasa akusalacetanāti samavīsati cetanā kāyasaṅkhāro nāma.
anya-e0102n:909_6: Tā eva vacīviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā vacīdvārato pavattā vacīsaṅkhāro nāma.
anya-e0102n:909_7: Abhiññācetanā panettha parato viññāṇassa paccayo na hotīti na gahitā.
anya-e0102n:909_12: Ubhopi viññattiyo asamuṭṭhāpetvā manodvāre uppannā pana sabbāpi ekūnatiṃsati cetanā cittasaṅkhāroti.
anya-e0102n:909_13: Iti ayaṃ tiko purimattikameva pavisatīti atthato puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃyeva vasena avijjāya paccayabhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:910_2: kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “ime saṅkhārā avijjā paccayā hontī”ti?
anya-e0102n:910_4: Yassa hi dukkhādīsu avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ aññāṇaṃ appahīnaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:910_5: so dukkhe tāva pubbantādīsu ca aññāṇena saṃsāradukkhaṃ sukhasaññāya gahetvā tasseva hetubhūte tividhepi saṅkhāre ārabhati.
anya-e0102n:910_6: Samudaye aññāṇena dukkhahetubhūtepi taṇhāparikkhāre saṅkhāre sukhahetuto maññamāno ārabhati.
anya-e0102n:910_7: Nirodhe pana magge ca aññāṇena dukkhassa anirodhabhūtepi gativisese dukkhanirodhasaññī hutvā nirodhassa
anya-e0102n:910_8: ca amaggabhūtesupi yaññāmaratapādīsu nirodhamaggasaññī hutvā dukkhanirodhaṃ patthayamāno yaññāmaratapādimukhena
anya-e0102n:911_0: Apica so tāya catūsu saccesu appahīnāvijjatāya visesato jātijarārogamaraṇādianekādīnavavokiṇṇampi puññaphalasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0102n:911_1: dukkhaṃ dukkhato ajānanto tassa adhigamāya kāyavacīcittasaṅkhārabhedaṃ puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati devaccharakāmako
anya-e0102n:911_3: Sukhasammatassāpi ca tassa puññaphalassa ante mahāpariḷāhajanikaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhataṃ appassādatañca
anya-e0102n:911_4: apassantopi tappaccayaṃ vuttappakārameva puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati salabho viya dīpasikhābhinipātaṃ,
anya-e0102n:911_6: Kāmupasevanādīsu ca savipākesu ādīnavaṃ apassanto sukhasaññāya ceva kilesābhibhūtatāya ca dvārattayappavattampi apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati,
anya-e0102n:911_9: Āruppavipākesu cāpi saṅkhāravipariṇāmadukkhataṃ anavabujjhamāno sassatādivipallāsena cittasaṅkhārabhūtaṃ āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati,
anya-e0102n:912_12: so avijjāvirāgā vijjuppādā neva puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotī”ti.
anya-e0102n:914_1: gaṇhāma tāva etaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayoti,
anya-e0102n:914_2: idaṃ pana vattabbaṃ katamesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ kathaṃ paccayo hotīti?
anya-e0102n:915_0: Tattha hetu ca so paccayo cāti hetupaccayo,
anya-e0102n:916_2: hetū”tiādīsu hi loke vacanāvayavo hetūti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:916_10: Yo hi dhammo yaṃ dhammaṃ apaccakkhāya tiṭṭhati vā uppajjati vā,
anya-e0102n:916_13: Yo hi dhammo yassa dhammassa ṭhitiyā vā uppattiyā vā upakārako hoti,
anya-e0102n:916_14: so tassa paccayoti vuccati. Paccayo, hetu, kāraṇaṃ, nidānaṃ, sambhavo,
anya-e0102n:916_18: upakārakaṭṭhena paccayoti saṅkhepato mūlaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo hetupaccayo.
anya-e0102n:917_1: maṇipabhādīnaṃ viya ca maṇivaṇṇādayo kusalādīnaṃ kusalādibhāvasādhakoti ācariyānaṃ adhippāyo.
anya-e0102n:917_2: Evaṃ sante pana taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpesu hetupaccayatā na sampajjati.
anya-e0102n:917_3: Na hi so tesaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ sādheti,
anya-e0102n:917_5: Vuttañhetaṃ “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:917_9: Yadi ca sampayuttahetūsu sabhāvatova kusalādibhāvo siyā,
anya-e0102n:917_10: sampayuttesu hetupaṭibaddho alobho kusalo vā siyā abyākato vā.
anya-e0102n:918_0: Kusalādibhāvasādhanavasena pana hetūnaṃ mūlaṭṭhaṃ agahetvā suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanavasena gayhamāne na kiñci virujjhati.
anya-e0102n:918_1: Laddhahetupaccayā hi dhammā virūḷhamūlā viya pādapā thirā honti suppatiṭṭhitā,
anya-e0102n:918_3: Iti mūlaṭṭhena upakārakoti suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanena upakārako dhammo hetupaccayoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:919_1: Tato paresu ārammaṇabhāvena upakārako dhammo ārammaṇapaccayo.
anya-e0102n:919_2: So “rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā”ti ārabhitvāpi “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā,
anya-e0102n:919_3: te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti osāpitattā na koci dhammo na hoti.
anya-e0102n:919_4: Yathā hi dubbalo puriso daṇḍaṃ vā rajjuṃ vā ālambitvāva uṭṭhahati ceva tiṭṭhati ca,
anya-e0102n:919_5: evaṃ cittacetasikā dhammā rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ārabbheva uppajjanti ceva tiṭṭhanti ca.
anya-e0102n:919_6: Tasmā sabbepi cittacetasikānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā dhammā ārammaṇapaccayoti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:920_3: Tattha “chandādhipati chandasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanato
anya-e0102n:920_6: Yadā hi chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā cittaṃ pavattati,
anya-e0102n:921_0: Yaṃ pana dhammaṃ garuṃ katvā arūpadhammā pavattanti,
anya-e0102n:921_2: Tena vuttaṃ “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ garuṃ katvā ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā,
anya-e0102n:921_3: te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:922_9: tasmā attano attano anantaraṃ anurūpassa cittuppādassa uppādanasamattho dhammo anantarapaccayo.
anya-e0102n:922_11: “anantarapaccayoti cakkhuviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādi.
anya-e0102n:923_2: taṃ “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalaṃ phalasamāpattiyā samanantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādīhi virujjhati.
anya-e0102n:923_3: Yampi tattha vadanti “dhammānaṃ samuṭṭhāpanasamatthatā na parihāyati,
anya-e0102n:923_4: bhāvanābalena pana vāritattā dhammā samanantarā nuppajjantī”ti,
anya-e0102n:923_10: Kālānantaratāya hi tesaṃ samanantarapaccayo hotīti laddhi.
anya-e0102n:923_11: Tasmā abhinivesaṃ akatvā byañjanamattatovettha nānākaraṇaṃ paccetabbaṃ,
anya-e0102n:924_1: Uppajjamānova saha uppādanabhāvena upakārako dhammo sahajātapaccayo pakāsassa padīpo viya.
anya-e0102n:924_8: rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kiñcikāle sahajātapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0102n:925_1: Aññamaññaṃ uppādanupatthambhanabhāvena upakārako dhammo aññamaññapaccayo aññamaññūpatthambhakaṃ tidaṇḍakaṃ viya.
anya-e0102n:925_4: Cattāro mahābhūtā okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṃ aññamaññapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:926_1: Adhiṭṭhānākārena nissayākārena ca upakārako dhammo nissayapaccayo tarucittakammādīnaṃ pathavīpaṭādayo viya.
anya-e0102n:926_2: So “cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo”ti evaṃ sahajāte vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:926_3: Chaṭṭho panettha koṭṭhāso “cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā…pe… sota… ghāna… jivhā…
anya-e0102n:926_4: kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:926_5: Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti,
anya-e0102n:926_6: taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo”ti evaṃ vibhatto.
anya-e0102n:927_1: Upanissayapaccayoti ettha pana ayaṃ tāva vacanattho,
anya-e0102n:927_2: tadadhīnavuttitāya attano phalena nissito na paṭikkhittoti nissayo.
anya-e0102n:927_6: Tasmā balavakāraṇabhāvena upakārako dhammo upanissayapaccayoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:928_0: So ārammaṇūpanissayo anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayoti tividho hoti.
anya-e0102n:928_1: Tattha “dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃkatvā paccavekkhati,
anya-e0102n:928_6: Sekkhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃkatvā paccavekkhantī”ti evamādinā nayena ārammaṇūpanissayo tāva
anya-e0102n:928_8: Tattha yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ garuṃkatvā cittacetasikā uppajjanti,
anya-e0102n:928_9: taṃ niyamato tesu ārammaṇesu balavārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:929_0: Anantarūpanissayopi “purimā purimā kusalā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena
anya-e0102n:929_1: paccayo”tiādinā nayena anantarapaccayena saddhiṃ nānattaṃ akatvāva vibhatto.
anya-e0102n:929_2: Mātikānikkhepe pana nesaṃ “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca
anya-e0102n:929_4: “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā
anya-e0102n:929_5: nayena upanissayassa āgatattā nikkhepe viseso atthi.
anya-e0102n:929_7: Evaṃ santepi attano attano anantarā anurūpassa cittuppādassa pavattanasamatthatāya anantaratā,
anya-e0102n:929_9: Yathā hi hetupaccayādīsu kiñci dhammaṃ vināpi cittaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:929_10: na evaṃ anantaracittaṃ vinā cittassa uppatti nāma atthi.
anya-e0102n:929_12: Iti attano attano anantarā anurūpacittuppādanavasena anantarapaccayo,
anya-e0102n:930_1: Pakato nāma attano santāne nipphādito vā saddhāsīlādi upasevito vā utubhojanādi.
anya-e0102n:930_13: samāpattiṃ uppādeti. Saddhā, sīlaṃ, sutaṃ, cāgo,
anya-e0102n:930_14: paññā saddhāya, sīlassa, sutassa, cāgassa, paññāya,
anya-e0102n:930_15: upanissayapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā nayena anekappakārato pabhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:930_16: Iti ime saddhādayo pakatā ceva balavakāraṇaṭṭhena upanissayā cāti pakatūpanissayoti.
anya-e0102n:931_1: Paṭhamataraṃ uppajjitvā vattamānabhāvena upakārako dhammo purejātapaccayo.
anya-e0102n:931_2: So pañcadvāre vatthārammaṇahadayavatthuvasena ekādasavidho hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:931_3: “cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. Sota…pe… ghāna, jivhā,
anya-e0102n:931_5: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. Rūpa, sadda, gandha, rasa,
anya-e0102n:931_7: Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti,
anya-e0102n:931_8: taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:931_9: Manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ kiñcikāle purejātapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:932_1: Purejātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ upatthambhakattena upakārako arūpadhammo pacchājātapaccayo gijjhapotakasarīrānaṃ āhārāsācetanā viya.
anya-e0102n:932_2: Tena vuttaṃ “pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:933_1: Āsevanaṭṭhena anantarānaṃ paguṇabalavabhāvāya upakārako dhammo āsevanapaccayo ganthādīsu purimapurimābhiyogo viya.
anya-e0102n:933_3: “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:933_5: kiriyābyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kiriyābyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:934_2: So nānakkhaṇikāya ceva kusalākusalacetanāya sahajātāya ca sabbāyapi cetanāya vasena duvidho hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:934_3: “kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:934_4: Cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:935_5: Yathāha –“vipākābyākato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo…pe…
anya-e0102n:935_6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:935_8: Dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:936_1: Rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakaṭṭhena upakārakā cattāro āhārā āhārapaccayo.
anya-e0102n:936_2: Yathāha –“kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:936_3: Arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:936_4: Pañhāvāre pana “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”tipi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:937_5: kāyindriyaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:937_7: Arūpino indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:937_8: Pañhāvāre pana “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo”tipi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:938_1: Upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena upakārakāni ṭhapetvā dvipañcaviññāṇe sukhadukkhavedanādvayaṃ sabbānipi kusalādibhedāni satta jhānaṅgāni jhānapaccayo.
anya-e0102n:938_2: Yathāha –“jhānaṅgāni jhānasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:938_3: Pañhāvāre pana “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatāni jhānaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayo”tipi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:939_1: Yato tato vā niyyānaṭṭhena upakārakāni kusalādibhedāni dvādasa maggaṅgāni maggapaccayo. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:939_2: “maggaṅgāni maggasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:939_3: Pañhāvāre pana “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatāni maggaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo”tipi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:939_4: Ete pana dvepi jhānamaggapaccayā dvipañcaviññāṇāhetukacittesu na labbhantīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:941_1: Ekavatthukādibhāvānupagamena upakārakā rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:941_4: Vuttañhetaṃ “sahajātā kusalā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:941_5: Pacchājātā kusalā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:941_6: Abyākatapadassa pana sahajātavibhaṅge “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:942_1: Paccuppannalakkhaṇena atthibhāvena tādisasseva dhammassa upatthambhakattena upakārako dhammo atthipaccayo.
anya-e0102n:942_3: Yathāha –“cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0102n:942_11: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:942_14: Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti,
anya-e0102n:942_15: taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:943_0: Pañhāvāre pana sahajātaṃ purejātaṃ pacchājātaṃ āhāraṃ indriyantipi nikkhipitvā sahajāte tāva “eko khandho
anya-e0102n:943_1: tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo”tiādinā nayena niddeso kato,
anya-e0102n:943_2: purejāte purejātānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ vasena niddeso kato.
anya-e0102n:943_3: Pacchājāte purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ paccayavasena niddeso kato.
anya-e0102n:943_4: Āhārindriyesu “kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0102n:943_5: Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo”ti evaṃ niddeso katoti.
anya-e0102n:944_1: Attano anantarā uppajjamānānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ pavattiokāsadānena upakārakā samanantaraniruddhā arūpadhammā natthipaccayo.
anya-e0102n:944_2: Yathāha –“samanantaraniruddhā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ natthipaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:945_0: Te eva vigatabhāvena upakārakattā vigatapaccayo. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:945_1: “samanantaravigatā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ vigatapaccayena paccayo”ti.
anya-e0102n:946_0: Atthi paccayadhammā eva ca avigatabhāvena upakārakattā avigatapaccayoti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:946_1: Desanāvilāsena pana tathā vinetabbaveneyyavasena vā ayaṃ duko vutto,
anya-e0102n:950_0: Paresaṃ pacchimānaṃ sā, ekadhā paccayo matāti.
anya-e0102n:951_0: Tattha puññānaṃ duvidhāti ārammaṇapaccayena ca upanissayapaccayena cāti dvedhā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:951_1: Sā hi avijjaṃ khayato vayato sammasanakāle kāmāvacarānaṃ puññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:951_3: Avijjāsamatikkamatthāya pana dānādīni ceva kāmāvacarapuññakiriyavatthūni pūrentassa,
anya-e0102n:951_4: rūpāvacarajjhānāni ca uppādentassa dvinnampi tesaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:951_5: Tathā avijjāsammūḷhattā kāmabhavarūpabhavasampattiyo patthetvā tāneva puññāni karontassa.
anya-e0102n:952_0: Anekadhā pana paresanti apuññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ anekadhā paccayo hoti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:952_1: Esā hi avijjaṃ ārabbha rāgādīnaṃ uppajjanakāle ārammaṇapaccayena,
anya-e0102n:952_5: yaṃkiñci akusalaṃ karontassa hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigatapaccayehīti anekadhā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:953_0: Pacchimānaṃ sā ekadhā paccayo matāti āneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṃ upanissayapaccayeneva ekadhā paccayo matā.
anya-e0102n:953_1: So panassā upanissayabhāvo puññābhisaṅkhāre vuttanayeneva veditabboti.
anya-e0102n:955_0: Ekaṃ na ekato idha, nānekamanekatopi no ekaṃ;
anya-e0102n:957_0: Ekato hi kāraṇato na idha kiñci ekaṃ phalamatthi,
anya-e0102n:957_4: Tathā hi anekehi utupathavībījasalilasaṅkhātehi kāraṇehi anekameva rūpagandharasādikaṃ aṅkurasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ uppajjamānaṃ dissati.
anya-e0102n:958_2: katthaci asādhāraṇattā desanāvilāsassa ca veneyyānañca anurūpato ekameva hetuṃ vā phalaṃ vā dīpeti.
anya-e0102n:958_4: Phasso hi vedanāya padhānahetu yathāphassaṃ vedanā vavatthānato.
anya-e0102n:958_5: Vedanā ca phassassa padhānaphalaṃ yathāvedanaṃ phassavavatthānato.
anya-e0102n:958_11: sabbe te ayonisomanasikāramūlakā”ti asādhāraṇattā ekaṃ hetumāha.
anya-e0102n:958_14: Tasmā ayamidha avijjā vijjamānesupi aññesu vatthārammaṇasahajātadhammādīsu saṅkhārakāraṇesu “assādānupassino
anya-e0102n:958_15: taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti ca “avijjāsamudayā āsavasamudayo”ti ca vacanato aññesampi taṇhādīnaṃ saṅkhārahetūnaṃ
anya-e0102n:958_19: asādhāraṇattā ca saṅkhārānaṃ hetubhāvena dīpitāti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:958_20: Eteneva ca ekekahetuphaladīpanaparihāravacanena sabbattha ekekahetuphaladīpane payojanaṃ veditabbanti.
anya-e0102n:959_1: evaṃ santepi ekantāniṭṭhaphalāya sāvajjāya avijjāya kathaṃ puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārapaccayattaṃ yujjati?
anya-e0102n:961_0: Dhammānaṃ paccayo siddho, vipākā eva te ca na.
anya-e0102n:962_0: Dhammānaṃ hi ṭhānasabhāvakiccādiviruddho cāviruddho ca paccayo loke siddho.
anya-e0102n:963_2: Sadisameva hi utuāhārasaṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ rūpassa paccayo,
anya-e0102n:963_10: na te dhammā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākā eva.
anya-e0102n:964_1: sabhāvavasena ca sāvajjāpi samānā sabbesampi etesaṃ puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ yathānurūpaṃ ṭhānakiccasabhāvaviruddhāviruddhapaccayavasena,
anya-e0102n:964_3: So cassā paccayabhāvo “yassa hi dukkhādīsu avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ aññāṇaṃ appahīnaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:964_4: so dukkhe tāva pubbantādīsu ca aññāṇena saṃsāradukkhaṃ sukhasaññāya gahetvā tassa hetubhūte tividhepi saṅkhāre ārabhatī”tiādinā nayena vutto eva.
anya-e0102n:968_0: Abhisaṅkharoti so ete, saṅkhāre tividhe yato;
anya-e0102n:970_2: Cutiyā tāva vimūḷho “sabbattha khandhānaṃ bhedo maraṇa”nti cutiṃ agaṇhanto “satto marati,
anya-e0102n:971_0: Upapāte vimūḷho “sabbattha khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo jātī”ti upapātaṃ agaṇhanto “satto upapajjati,
anya-e0102n:975_1: taṃ evaṃ agaṇhanto “ayaṃ satto asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0102n:975_2: parasmā lokā imaṃ lokaṃ āgacchatī”tiādīni vikappeti.
anya-e0102n:976_0: Saṅkhārānaṃ lakkhaṇe vimūḷho saṅkhārānaṃ sabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇañca agaṇhanto saṅkhāre attato attaniyato dhuvato sukhato subhato vikappeti.
anya-e0102n:977_0: Paṭiccasamuppannadhammesu vimūḷho avijjādīhi saṅkhārādīnaṃ pavattiṃ agaṇhanto “attā jānāti vā na jānāti vā,
anya-e0102n:977_1: so eva karoti ca kāreti ca.
anya-e0102n:977_3: tassa aṇuissarādayo kalalādibhāvena sarīraṃ saṇṭhapento indriyāni sampādenti.
anya-e0102n:978_0: So avijjāya andhīkato evaṃ vikappento yathā nāma andho pathaviyaṃ vicaranto maggampi amaggampi thalampi ninnampi samampi visamampi paṭipajjati,
anya-e0102n:984_0: “Yadā ca ñatvā so dhammaṃ, saccāni abhisamessati;
anya-e0102n:988_3: Tattha cakkhuviññāṇaṃ kusalavipākaṃ akusalavipākanti duvidhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:988_10: Iti imehi chahi viññāṇehi sabbānipi bāttiṃsa lokiyavipākaviññāṇāni saṅgahitāni honti.
anya-e0102n:988_11: Lokuttarāni pana vaṭṭakathāya na yujjantīti na gahitāni.
anya-e0102n:989_0: Tattha siyā “kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā hotī”ti?
anya-e0102n:989_5: na ca uppajjantīti jānitabbametaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā idaṃ viññāṇaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0102n:991_0: “Kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa kaṭattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti… sota… ghāna… jivhā…
anya-e0102n:993_0: “Tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa kaṭattā upacitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:994_2: ekā manoviññāṇadhātūti evaṃ sattavidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:995_0: “Akusalassa kammassa kaṭattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti… sota… ghāna… jivhā…
anya-e0102n:995_2: vipākā manodhātu vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hotī”ti.
anya-e0102n:996_0: Āneñjābhisaṅkhārapaccayā pana cattāri arūpavipākānīti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:997_0: “Tasseva arūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa kaṭattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ…pe…
anya-e0102n:997_3: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasahagataṃ sukhassa ca dukkhassa ca pahānā catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:998_1: Evaṃ yaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā yaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:998_2: taṃ ñatvā idānissa evaṃ pavatti veditabbā –
anya-e0102n:998_3: sabbameva hi idaṃ pavattipaṭisandhivasena dvedhā pavattati.
anya-e0102n:998_6: somanassasahagatā ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātūti imāni terasa pañcavokārabhave pavattiyaññeva pavattanti.
anya-e0102n:998_7: Sesāni ekūnavīsati tīsu bhavesu yathānurūpaṃ pavattiyampi paṭisandhiyampi pavattanti.
anya-e0102n:999_1: Kusalavipākāni tāva cakkhuviññāṇādīni pañca kusalavipākena akusalavipākena vā nibbattassa yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0102n:999_2: paripākaṃ upagatindriyassa cakkhādīnaṃ āpāthagataṃ iṭṭhaṃ iṭṭhamajjhattaṃ vā rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0102n:999_5: Kevalañhi tesaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ aniṭṭhamajjhattaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:999_7: Dasapi cetāni niyatadvārārammaṇavatthuṭṭhānāni niyatakiccāneva ca bhavanti.
anya-e0102n:1000_0: Tato kusalavipākānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ anantarā kusalavipākā manodhātu tesaṃyeva ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha hadayavatthuṃ
anya-e0102n:1000_3: Idañca pana dvayaṃ aniyatadvārārammaṇaṃ niyatavatthuṭṭhānaṃ niyatakiccañca hoti.
anya-e0102n:1001_0: Somanassasahagatā pana ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātu kusalavipākamanodhātuyā anantarā tassā eva ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0102n:1001_1: hadayavatthuṃ nissāya santīraṇakiccaṃ sādhayamānā chasu dvāresu balavārammaṇe kāmāvacarasattānaṃ yebhuyyena
anya-e0102n:1001_2: lobhasampayuttajavanāvasāne bhavaṅgavīthiṃ pacchinditvā javanena gahitārammaṇe tadārammaṇavasena ca sakiṃ
anya-e0102n:1001_3: vā dvikkhattuṃ vā pavattatīti majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1001_4: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tadārammaṇe dve cittavārā āgatā.
anya-e0102n:1001_5: Idaṃ pana cittaṃ tadārammaṇanti ca piṭṭhibhavaṅganti cāti dve nāmāni labhati.
anya-e0102n:1001_7: Evaṃ tāva terasa pañcavokārabhave pavattiyaññeva pavattantīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:1002_0: Sesesu ekūnavīsatiyā na kiñci attano anurūpāya paṭisandhiyā na pavattati.
anya-e0102n:1002_1: Pavattiyaṃ pana kusalākusalavipākā tāva dve ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyo pañcadvāre kusalākusalavipākamanodhātūnaṃ anantarā santīraṇakiccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1002_3: attanā dinnapaṭisandhito uddhaṃ asati bhavaṅgupacchedake cittuppāde bhavaṅgakiccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1002_4: ante cutikiccañcāti cattāri kiccāni sādhayamānā niyatavatthukā aniyatadvārārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccā hutvā pavattanti.
anya-e0102n:1003_0: Aṭṭha kāmāvacarasahetukacittāni vuttanayeneva chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇakiccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1003_1: attanā dinnapaṭisandhito uddhaṃ asati bhavaṅgupacchedake cittuppāde bhavaṅgakiccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1003_2: ante cutikiccañcāti tīṇi kiccāni sādhayamānāni niyatavatthukāni aniyatadvārārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccāni hutvā pavattanti.
anya-e0102n:1004_0: Pañca rūpāvacarāni cattāri ca āruppāni attanā dinnapaṭisandhito uddhaṃ asati bhavaṅgupacchedake cittuppāde bhavaṅgakiccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1004_3: itarāni niyatavatthukāni niyatārammaṇāni aniyataṭṭhānakiccāni hutvā pavattantīti evaṃ tāva bāttiṃsavidhampi
anya-e0102n:1004_5: Tatrāssa te te saṅkhārā kammapaccayena ca upanissayapaccayena ca paccayā honti.
anya-e0102n:1005_1: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “sesesu ekūnavīsatiyā na kiñci attano anurūpāya paṭisandhiyā na pavattatī”ti,
anya-e0102n:1006_2: Tattha akusalavipākāya ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyā apāyesu paṭisandhi hoti.
anya-e0102n:1006_4: Aṭṭhahi sahetukakāmāvacaravipākehi kāmāvacaradevesu ceva manussesu ca puññavantānaṃ paṭisandhi hoti.
anya-e0102n:1006_8: sā eva tassa anurūpā paṭisandhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:1006_9: Saṅkhepato pana paṭisandhiyā tīṇi ārammaṇāni honti atītaṃ paccuppannaṃ navattabbañca.
anya-e0102n:1007_1: Dasannaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ atītaṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā.
anya-e0102n:1007_3: Evaṃ tīsu ārammaṇesu pavattamānā pana paṭisandhi yasmā atītārammaṇassa vā navattabbārammaṇassa vā cuticittassa anantarameva pavattati.
anya-e0102n:1007_5: Tasmā dvīsu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā tīsu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇāya paṭisandhiyā sugatiduggativasena pavattanākāro veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1008_2: kāmāvacarasugatiyaṃ tāva ṭhitassa pāpakammino puggalassa “tānissa tasmiṃ samaye olambantī”tiādivacanato
anya-e0102n:1008_3: maraṇamañce nipannassa yathūpacitaṃ pāpakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati.
anya-e0102n:1008_4: Taṃ ārabbha uppannāya tadārammaṇapariyosānāya javanavīthiyā anantaraṃ bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cuticittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1008_5: Tasmiṃ niruddhe tadeva āpāthagataṃ kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārabbha anupacchinnakilesabalavināmitaṃ duggatipariyāpannaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1008_6: Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā atītārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
anya-e0102n:1009_0: Aparassa maraṇasamaye vuttappakārakammavasena narakādīsu aggijālavaṇṇādikaṃ duggatinimittaṃ manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati,
anya-e0102n:1009_1: tassa dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge uppajjitvā niruddhe taṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha ekaṃ āvajjanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1009_4: Tato bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaṃ cuticittaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1009_6: Athassa avasesapañcacittakkhaṇāyuke tasmiññeva ārammaṇe paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1009_7: Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
anya-e0102n:1010_0: Aparassa maraṇasamaye pañcannaṃ dvārānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ rāgādihetubhūtaṃ hīnamārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati.
anya-e0102n:1010_1: Tassa yathākkamena uppanne voṭṭhabbanāvasāne maraṇassa āsannabhāvena mandībhūtavegattā pañca javanāni,
anya-e0102n:1010_3: Tato bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaṃ cuticittaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1010_11: ekaṃ cuticittanti pañcadasa cittakkhaṇā atītā honti.
anya-e0102n:1010_13: Ayampi atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
anya-e0102n:1010_14: Esa tāva atītārammaṇāya sugaticutiyā anantarā atītapaccuppannārammaṇāya duggatipaṭisandhiyā pavattanākāro.
anya-e0102n:1011_1: Duggatiyaṃ ṭhitassa pana upacitānavajjakammassa vuttanayeneva taṃ anavajjakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā
anya-e0102n:1011_2: manodvāre āpāthamāgacchatīti kaṇhapakkhe sukkapakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1011_3: Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya duggaticutiyā anantarā atītapaccuppannārammaṇāya sugatipaṭisandhiyā pavattanākāro.
anya-e0102n:1012_1: Sugatiyaṃ ṭhitassa pana upacitānavajjakammassa “tānissa tasmiṃ samaye olambantī”tiādivacanato maraṇamañce
anya-e0102n:1012_2: nipannassa yathūpacitaṃ anavajjakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati.
anya-e0102n:1012_5: Taṃ ārabbha uppannāya tadārammaṇapariyosānāya suddhāya vā javanavīthiyā anantaraṃ bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cuticittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1012_6: Tasmiṃ niruddhe tameva āpāthagataṃ kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārabbha anupacchinnakilesabalavināmitaṃ sugatipariyāpannaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1012_7: Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā atītārammaṇā vā navattabbārammaṇā vā paṭisandhi.
anya-e0102n:1013_0: Aparassa maraṇasamaye kāmāvacaraanavajjakammavasena manussaloke mātukucchivaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ vā devaloke
anya-e0102n:1013_2: tassa duggatinimitte dassitānukkameneva cuticittānantaraṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1013_3: Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
anya-e0102n:1014_0: Aparassa maraṇasamaye ñātakā “ayaṃ tāta tavatthāya buddhapūjā karīyati cittaṃ pasādehī”ti vatvā pupphadāmapaṭākādivasena rūpārammaṇaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:1014_3: “idaṃ tāta sāyassu tavatthāya dātabbadeyyadhamma”nti vatvā madhuphāṇitādivasena rasārammaṇaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:1014_4: “idaṃ tāta phusassu tavatthāya dātabbadeyyadhamma”nti vatvā cīnapaṭṭasomārapaṭṭādivasena phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā pañcadvāre upasaṃharanti,
anya-e0102n:1014_5: tassa tasmiṃ āpāthagate rūpādiārammaṇe yathākkamena uppannavoṭṭhabbanāvasāne maraṇassa āsannabhāvena mandībhūtavegattā pañca javanāni,
anya-e0102n:1014_7: Tato bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaṃ cuticittaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1014_8: tadavasāne tasmiññeva ekacittakkhaṇaṭṭhitike ārammaṇe paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1014_9: Ayampi atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
anya-e0102n:1015_1: Aparassa pana pathavīkasiṇajjhānādivasena paṭiladdhamahaggatassa sugatiyaṃ ṭhitassa maraṇasamaye kāmāvacarakusalakamma-
anya-e0102n:1015_6: cakkhusotānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ kusaluppattihetubhūtaṃ paṇītamārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati,
anya-e0102n:1015_7: tassa yathākkamena uppannavoṭṭhabbanāvasāne maraṇassa āsannabhāvena mandībhūtavegattā pañca javanāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n:1015_9: tasmā javanānantaraṃyeva bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaṃ cuticittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1015_10: Tassāvasāne kāmāvacaramahaggatasugatīnaṃ aññatarasugatipariyāpannaṃ yathūpaṭṭhitesu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1015_11: Ayaṃ navattabbārammaṇāya sugaticutiyā anantarā atītapaccuppannanavattabbārammaṇānaṃ aññatarārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
anya-e0102n:1016_1: Ayaṃ atītanavattabbārammaṇāya sugaticutiyā anantarā atītanavattabbapaccuppannārammaṇāya paṭisandhiyā pavattanākāro.
anya-e0102n:1017_1: Duggatiyaṃ ṭhitassa pana pāpakammino vuttanayeneva taṃ kammaṃ kammanimittaṃ gatinimittaṃ vā manodvāre.
anya-e0102n:1017_2: Pañcadvāre vā pana akusaluppatti hetubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati,
anya-e0102n:1017_3: athassa yathākkamena cuticittāvasāne duggatipariyāpannaṃ tesu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1017_4: Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya duggaticutiyā anantarā atītapaccuppannārammaṇāya paṭisandhiyā pavattanākāroti.
anya-e0102n:1017_5: Ettāvatā ekūnavīsatividhassāpi viññāṇassa paṭisandhivasena pavatti dīpitā hoti.
anya-e0102n:1021_0: Idañhi ekūnavīsatividhampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ paṭisandhimhi pavattamānā dvedhā kammena vattati.
anya-e0102n:1021_1: Yathāsakañhi ekassa janakakammaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena ca paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1021_3: Evaṃ vattamānassa panassa missādīhi bhedehi duvidhādikopi bhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1022_1: idañhi paṭisandhivasena ekadhā pavattamānampi rūpena saha missāmissabhedato duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1024_0: Missaṃ dvidhā bhāvabhedā, sabhāvaṃ tattha ca dvidhā;
anya-e0102n:1025_0: Dve vā tayo vā dasakā, omato ādinā saha.
anya-e0102n:1026_0: Missaṃ dvidhā bhāvabhedāti yaṃ hetaṃ ettha aññatra arūpabhavā rūpamissaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:1026_1: taṃ rūpabhave itthindriyapurisindriyasaṅkhātena bhāvena vinā uppattito.
anya-e0102n:1026_2: Kāmabhave aññatra jātipaṇḍakapaṭisandhiyā bhāvena saha uppattito sa- bhāvaṃ, a-
anya-e0102n:1027_0: Sabhāvaṃ tattha ca dvidhāti tatthāpi ca yaṃ sa- bhāvaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1027_1: taṃ itthipurisabhāvānaṃ aññatarena saha uppattito duvidhameva hoti.
anya-e0102n:1028_0: Dve vā tayo vā dasakā omato ādinā sahāti yaṃ hetamettha “missaṃ amissa”nti duke ādibhūtaṃ rūpamissaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1028_2: vatthukāyabhāvadasakavasena tayo vā dasakā omato uppajjanti,
anya-e0102n:1028_4: Taṃ panetaṃ evaṃ omakaparimāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ aṇḍajajalābujanāmikāsu dvīsu yonīsu jātiuṇṇāya ekena aṃsunā
anya-e0102n:1030_0: Niraye bhummavajjesu, devesu ca na yoniyo;
anya-e0102n:1032_0: Tattha devesu cāti casaddena yathā niraye ca bhummavajjesu ca devesu,
anya-e0102n:1032_1: evaṃ nijjhāmataṇhikapetesu ca purimikā tisso yoniyo na santīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1032_3: Sese pana tiracchānapettivisayamanussasaṅkhāte gatittaye pubbe vajjitabhummadevesu ca catassopi yoniyo honti. Tattha,
anya-e0102n:1033_0: Tiṃsa nava ceva rūpīsu, sattati ukkaṃsatotha rūpāni;
anya-e0102n:1035_0: Rūpībrahmesu tāva opapātikayonikesu cakkhusotavatthudasakānaṃ jīvitanavakassa cāti catunnaṃ kalāpānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1035_1: vasena tiṃsa ca nava ca paṭisandhiviññāṇena saha rūpāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n:1035_2: Rūpī brahme pana ṭhapetvā aññesu saṃsedajaopapātikayonikesu ukkaṃsato cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyavatthubhāvadasakānaṃ vasena sattati,
anya-e0102n:1035_4: Tattha vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā catasso cāpi dhātuyo cakkhupasādo jīvitanti ayaṃ dasarūpaparimāṇo rūpapuñjo cakkhudasako nāma.
anya-e0102n:1035_6: Avakaṃsato pana jaccandhabadhiraaghānakanapuṃsakassa jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n:1035_7: Ukkaṃsāvakaṃsānaṃ pana antare anurūpato vikappo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1039_2: tāsaṃ imehi khandhādīhi bhedābhedaviseso ñātabboti attho.
anya-e0102n:1040_1: Kadāci hi catukkhandhāya āruppacutiyā anantarā catukkhandhāva ārammaṇatopi abhinnā paṭisandhi hoti.
anya-e0102n:1040_4: Kadāci pana catukkhandhāya arūpacutiyā anantarā pañcakkhandhā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhi.
anya-e0102n:1040_5: Kadāci pañcakkhandhāya kāmāvacaracutiyā rūpāvacaracutiyā vā anantarā catukkhandhā arūpapaṭisandhi.
anya-e0102n:1040_14: Avitakkāvicāracutiyā savitakkasavicārapaṭisandhīti tassa tassa viparītato ca yathāyogaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1043_0: Nāssa tato saṅkanti, na tato hetuṃ vinā hoti.
anya-e0102n:1044_0: Iti hetaṃ laddhapaccayaṃ rūpārūpadhammamattaṃ uppajjamānaṃ bhavantaramupetīti vuccati, na satto, na jīvo.
anya-e0102n:1044_1: Tassa ca nāpi atītabhavato idha saṅkanti atthi.
anya-e0102n:1044_2: Nāpi tato hetuṃ vinā idha pātubhāvo.
anya-e0102n:1045_0: Atītabhavasmiṃ hi sarasena upakkamena vā samāsannamaraṇassa asayhānaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgasandhibandhanacchedakānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1045_1: māraṇantikavedanāsatthānaṃ sannipātaṃ asahantassa ātape pakkhittaharitatālapaṇṇamiva kamena upasussamāne
anya-e0102n:1045_2: sarīre niruddhesu cakkhādīsu indriyesu hadayavatthumatte patiṭṭhitesu kāyindriyamanindriyajīvitindriyesu
anya-e0102n:1045_3: taṅkhaṇāvasesahadayavatthusannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ garukasamāsevitāsannapubbakatānaṃ aññataraṃ laddhāvasesapaccayasaṅkhārasaṅkhātaṃ kammaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1045_4: tadupaṭṭhāpitaṃ vā kammanimittagatinimittasaṅkhātaṃ visayaṃ ārabbha pavattati.
anya-e0102n:1045_5: Tadevaṃ pavattamānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ appahīnattā avijjāpaṭicchāditādīnave tasmiṃ visaye taṇhā nāmeti,
anya-e0102n:1045_7: Taṃ santativasena taṇhāya nāmiyamānaṃ saṅkhārehi khippamānaṃ orimatīrarukkhavinibaddharajjumālambitvā mātikātikkamako viya purimañca nissayaṃ jahati,
anya-e0102n:1045_8: aparañca kammasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ nissayaṃ assādayamānaṃ vā anassādayamānaṃ vā ārammaṇādīhiyeva paccayehi pavattatīti.
anya-e0102n:1046_3: nāpi tato kammasaṅkhāranativisayādihetuṃ vinā pātubhūtanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1050_0: Ettha cetassa viññāṇassa purimabhavato idha anāgamane,
anya-e0102n:1050_1: atītabhavapariyāpannahetūti ca uppāde paṭighosa- padīpa- muddā-
anya-e0102n:1050_4: chāyā saddādihetukā honti aññatra agantvā evamevaṃ idaṃ cittaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1051_0: Ettha ca santānabandhato natthi ekatā nāpi nānatā.
anya-e0102n:1051_1: Yadi hi santānabandhe sati ekantamekatā bhaveyya,
anya-e0102n:1051_8: Tasmā ettha na ekantamekatā vā nānatā vā upagantabbāti.
anya-e0102n:1052_1: nanu evaṃ asaṅkantipātubhāve sati ye imasmiṃ manussattabhāve khandhā,
anya-e0102n:1052_3: phalapaccayassa ca kammassa tattha agamanato aññassa aññato ca taṃ phalaṃ siyā,
anya-e0102n:1052_4: upabhuñjake ca asati kassa taṃ phalaṃ siyā,
anya-e0102n:1053_0: Santāne yaṃ phalaṃ etaṃ, nāññassa na ca aññato;
anya-e0102n:1055_0: Ekasantānasmiṃ hi phalaṃ uppajjamānaṃ tattha ekantaekattanānattānaṃ paṭisiddhattā aññassāti vā aññatoti vā na hoti.
anya-e0102n:1055_1: Etassa ca panatthassa bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro sādhako.
anya-e0102n:1055_2: Ambabījādīnaṃ hi abhisaṅkhāresu katesu tassa bījassa santāne laddhapaccayo kālantare phalaviseso uppajjamāno na aññabījānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1055_7: Vijjāsipposadhādīhi cāpi bālasarīre upayuttehi kālantare vuḍḍhasarīrādīsu phaladehi ayamattho veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1056_0: Yampi vuttaṃ “upabhuñjake ca asati kassa taṃ phalaṃ siyā”ti, tattha,
anya-e0102n:1059_0: Yathā hi rukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekadesabhūtassa rukkhaphalassa uppattiyā eva rukkho phalatīti vā phalitoti vā vuccati,
anya-e0102n:1059_1: tathā devamanussasaṅkhātānaṃ khandhānaṃ ekadesabhūtassa upabhogasaṅkhātassa sukhadukkhaphalassa uppādeneva devo,
anya-e0102n:1059_4: Tasmā na ettha aññena upabhuñjakena nāma koci attho atthīti.
anya-e0102n:1060_1: Yopi vadeyya “evaṃ santepi ete saṅkhārā vijjamānā vā phalassa paccayā siyuṃ,
anya-e0102n:1060_3: yadi ca vijjamānā pavattikkhaṇeyeva nesaṃ vipākena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1060_4: atha avijjamānā pavattito pubbe pacchā ca niccaṃ phalāvahā siyu”nti,
anya-e0102n:1061_0: Katattā paccayā ete, na ca niccaṃ phalāvahā;
anya-e0102n:1063_0: Katattāyeva hi saṅkhārā attano phalassa paccayā honti,
anya-e0102n:1063_3: “kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādi.
anya-e0102n:1063_4: Yathārahassa ca attano phalassa paccayā hutvā na puna phalāvahā honti vipākattā.
anya-e0102n:1063_5: Etassa catthassa vibhāvane idaṃ pāṭibhogādikaṃ nidassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1063_6: Yathā hi loke yo kassaci atthassa niyyātanatthaṃ pāṭibhogo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1063_9: tassa taṃ kiriyākaraṇamattameva tadatthaniyyātanādimhi paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1063_12: na ca tadatthaniyyātanādito parampi dhārakova hoti. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:1063_14: Evaṃ katattāva saṅkhārāpi attano phalassa paccayā honti,
anya-e0102n:1063_15: na ca yathārahaṃ phaladānato parampi phalāvahā hontīti.
anya-e0102n:1063_16: Ettāvatā missāmissavasena dvedhāpi vattamānassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa saṅkhārapaccayā pavatti dīpitā hoti.
anya-e0102n:1067_5: Etesu bhavādīsu paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca ete yesaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ paccayā,
anya-e0102n:1068_0: Tattha puññābhisaṅkhāre tāva kāmāvacaraaṭṭhacetanābhedo puññābhisaṅkhāro avisesena kāmabhave sugatiyaṃ
anya-e0102n:1068_1: navannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena cāti dvedhā paccayo.
anya-e0102n:1068_2: Rūpāvacarapañcakusalacetanābhedo puññābhisaṅkhāro rūpabhave paṭisandhiyaṃ eva pañcannaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1069_3: Sveva rūpabhave pañcannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte,
anya-e0102n:1069_5: Kāmabhave pana duggatiyaṃ aṭṭhannampi parittavipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte,
anya-e0102n:1069_7: Tattha niraye mahāmoggallānattherassa narakacārikādīsu iṭṭhārammaṇasamāyoge so paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1069_8: tiracchānesu pana petamahiddhikesu ca iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ labbhatiyeva.
anya-e0102n:1070_0: Sveva kāmabhave sugatiyaṃ soḷasannampi kusalavipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte ca paṭisandhiyañca.
anya-e0102n:1070_1: Avisesena pana puññābhisaṅkhāro rūpabhave dasannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte ca paṭisandhiyañca.
anya-e0102n:1071_0: Dvādasākusalacetanābhedo apuññābhisaṅkhāro kāmabhave duggatiyaṃ ekassa viññāṇassa tatheva paccayo paṭisandhiyaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1072_0: Kāmabhave pana sugatiyaṃ tesaṃyeva sattannaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte,
anya-e0102n:1072_2: Rūpabhave catunnaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte,
anya-e0102n:1073_0: Āneñjābhisaṅkhāro arūpabhave catunnaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte ca paṭisandhiyañca.
anya-e0102n:1074_0: Evaṃ tāva bhavesu paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ vasena ete saṅkhārā yesaṃ paccayā,
anya-e0102n:1075_2: imesu hi saṅkhāresu yasmā puññābhisaṅkhāro tāva dvīsu bhavesu paṭisandhiṃ datvā sabbamattano vipākaṃ janeti.
anya-e0102n:1075_8: Asaññasattāvāse panesa rūpamattamevābhisaṅkharotīti catūsuyeva sattāvāsesu ca paṭisandhiṃ datvā sabbamattano vipākaṃ janeti.
anya-e0102n:1075_13: catūsu sattāvāsesu ca ekavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ vuttanayeneva paccayo hoti yathāsambhavaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca.
anya-e0102n:1076_0: Apuññābhisaṅkhāro pana yasmā ekasmiṃyeva kāmabhave catūsu yonīsu,
anya-e0102n:1076_3: tādiseyeva ca ekasmiṃ sattāvāse paṭisandhivasena vipaccati,
anya-e0102n:1076_8: ekamhi ca sattāvāse sattannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ vuttanayeneva paccayo paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca.
anya-e0102n:1077_4: ākāsānañcāyatanādikesu ca catūsu sattāvāsesu paṭisandhivasena vipaccati,
anya-e0102n:1077_9: catūsu sattāvāsesu catunnaṃ viññāṇānaṃ vuttanayeneva paccayo hoti paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte cāti. Evaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1085_0: Vibhāgā nāmarūpānanti ettha hi nāmanti ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato vedanādayo tayo khandhā,
anya-e0102n:1085_1: rūpanti cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1085_3: Evaṃ tāvettha vibhāgā nāmarūpānaṃ viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:1086_0: Bhavādīsu pavattitoti ettha ca nāmaṃ ekaṃ sattāvāsaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisesasattāvāsesu pavattati,
anya-e0102n:1087_0: Evaṃ pavattamāne ca etasmiṃ nāmarūpe yasmā abhāvakagabbhaseyyakānaṃ aṇḍajānañca paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthukāyadasakavasena rūpato dvesantatisīsāni,
anya-e0102n:1087_2: tasmā tesaṃ vitthārena rūparūpato vīsati dhammā,
anya-e0102n:1087_3: tayo ca arūpino khandhāti ete tevīsati dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1087_4: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana ekasantatisīsato nava rūpadhamme apanetvā cuddasa.
anya-e0102n:1087_6: tesampi aggahitaggahaṇena santatisīsadvayato aṭṭhārasa rūpadhamme apanetvā pannarasa.
anya-e0102n:1088_0: Yasmā ca opapātikasattesu brahmakāyikādīnaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe cakkhusotavatthudasakānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1088_1: jīvitindriyanavakassa ca vasena rūpato cattāri santatisīsāni,
anya-e0102n:1088_3: tasmā tesaṃ vitthārena rūparūpato ekūnacattālīsa dhammā,
anya-e0102n:1088_4: tayo ca arūpino khandhāti ete bācattālīsa dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1088_5: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana santatisīsattayato sattavīsati dhamme apanetvā pannarasa.
anya-e0102n:1089_1: saṃsedajānaṃ vā sabhāvakaparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpato satta santatisīsāni,
anya-e0102n:1089_3: tasmā tesaṃ vitthārena rūparūpato sattati dhammā,
anya-e0102n:1089_4: tayo ca arūpino khandhāti ete tesattati dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1089_5: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana rūpasantatisīsachakkato catupaññāsa dhamme apanetvā ekūnavīsati.
anya-e0102n:1089_7: Avakaṃsena pana taṃtaṃrūpasantatisīsavikalānaṃ tassa tassa vasena hāpetvā hāpetvā saṅkhepato vitthārato
anya-e0102n:1091_0: Pavatte pana sabbattha rūpappavattidese paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe paṭisandhicittena saha pavattaututo utusamuṭṭhānaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ pātubhavati.
anya-e0102n:1091_2: Tañhi yathā papāte patitapuriso parassa paccayo hotuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:1091_3: evaṃ vatthudubbalatāya dubbalattā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0102n:1091_4: Paṭisandhicittato pana uddhaṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgato pabhuti cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1091_5: saddapātubhāvakāle paṭisandhikkhaṇato uddhaṃ pavattaututo ceva cittato ca saddanavakaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1093_0: Tena so tattha yāpeti, mātukucchigato naro”ti. –
anya-e0102n:1094_1: opapātikānaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ attano mukhagataṃ kheḷaṃ ajjhoharaṇakāle āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ suddhaṭṭhakanti idaṃ āhārasamuṭṭhānassa suddhaṭṭhakassa,
anya-e0102n:1094_2: utucittasamuṭṭhānānañca ukkaṃsato dvinnaṃ navakānaṃ vasena chabbīsatividhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1094_3: pubbe ekekacittakkhaṇe tikkhattuṃ uppajjamānaṃ vuttaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānañca sattatividhanti channavutividhaṃ rūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1094_4: tayo ca arūpino khandhāti samāsato navanavuti dhammā.
anya-e0102n:1094_5: Yasmā vā saddo aniyato kadācideva pātubhāvato,
anya-e0102n:1094_6: tasmā duvidhampi taṃ apanetvā ime sattanavuti dhammā yathāsambhavaṃ sabbasattānaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1094_7: Tesaṃ hi suttānampi pamattānampi khādantānampi pivantānampi divā ca rattiñca ete viññāṇapaccayā pavattanti.
anya-e0102n:1095_1: taṃ bhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ patiṭṭhahantampi tisamuṭṭhānikarūpena anupatthaddhaṃ na sakkoti saṇṭhātuṃ,
anya-e0102n:1095_3: Atha kho vātabbhāhatāpi catuddisā vavatthāpitā naḷakalāpiyo viya,
anya-e0102n:1095_4: ūmivegabbhāhatāpi mahāsamudde katthaci laddhapatiṭṭhā bhinnavāhanikā viya ca aññamaññupatthaddhānevetāni
anya-e0102n:1095_5: apatamānāni saṇṭhahitvā ekampi vassaṃ dvepi vassāni…pe…
anya-e0102n:1095_6: vassasatampi yāva tesaṃ sattānaṃ āyukkhayo vā puññakkhayo vā,
anya-e0102n:1096_1: Saṅgahāti ettha ca yaṃ āruppe pavattipaṭisandhīsu,
anya-e0102n:1096_6: taṃ sabbaṃ nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca nāmarūpanti evaṃ ekadesasarūpekasesanayena saṅgahetvā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1097_0: Asaññesu viññāṇābhāvā ayuttanti ce, nāyuttaṃ. Idampi,
anya-e0102n:1098_0: Nāmarūpassa yaṃ hetu, viññāṇaṃ taṃ dvidhā mataṃ;
anya-e0102n:1100_2: Idañca asaññasattesu kammasamuṭṭhānattā pañcavokārabhave pavattaabhisaṅkhāraviññāṇapaccayā rūpaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1100_3: Tathā pañcavokāre pavattiyaṃ kusalādicittakkhaṇe kammasamuṭṭhānanti yuttameva idaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1105_0: Tadaññaṃ pana viññāṇaṃ, tassa tassa yathārahaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1106_0: Yañhetaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ pavattiyaṃ vā vipākasaṅkhātaṃ nāmaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1106_1: tassa rūpamissassa vā amissassa vā paṭisandhikaṃ vā aññaṃ vā vipākaviññāṇaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttavipākāhārindriyaatthiavigatapaccayehi
anya-e0102n:1107_1: Ṭhapetvā pana vatthurūpaṃ sesarūpassa imesu navasu aññamaññapaccayaṃ apanetvā sesehi aṭṭhahi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1108_0: Abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ pana asaññasattarūpassa vā pañcavokārabhave vā kammajassa rūpassa suttantikapariyāyato upanissayavasena ekadhāva paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1108_1: Avasesaṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgato pabhuti sabbampi viññāṇaṃ tassa tassa nāmarūpassa yathārahaṃ paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1108_2: Vitthārato pana tassa paccayanaye dassiyamāne sabbāpi paṭṭhānakathā vitthāretabbā hotīti na naṃ ārabhāma.
anya-e0102n:1109_3: Sutte hi “cittānuparivattino dhammā”tiādinā nayena bahudhā vedanādīnaṃ viññāṇapaccayatā siddhā.
anya-e0102n:1110_0: Cittajena hi rūpena, idha diṭṭhena sijjhati;
anya-e0102n:1112_0: Citte hi pasanne appasanne vā tadanurūpāni rūpāni uppajjamānāni diṭṭhāni.
anya-e0102n:1112_1: Diṭṭhena ca adiṭṭhassa anumānaṃ hotīti iminā idha diṭṭhena cittajarūpena adiṭṭhassāpi paṭisandhirūpassa viññāṇaṃ paccayo hotīti jānitabbametaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1112_2: Kammasamuṭṭhānassāpi hi tassa cittasamuṭṭhānasseva viññāṇapaccayatā paṭṭhāne āgatāti.
anya-e0102n:1118_2: rūpaṃ pana sasantatipariyāpannaṃ niyamato cattāri bhūtāni cha vatthūni jīvitindriyanti evaṃ bhūtavatthādikaṃ matanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1118_3: Taṃ pana nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca nāmarūpanti evaṃ katekasesaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti
anya-e0102n:1118_4: evaṃ katekasesasseva saḷāyatanassa paccayoti veditabbaṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:1119_3: Tassa tassa hi nāmassa rūpassa ca bhāve taṃ taṃ āyatanaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1119_5: Sā panassa tabbhāvabhāvitā paccayanayasmiṃ yeva āvibhavissati. Tasmā,
anya-e0102n:1120_0: Paṭisandhiyā pavatte vā, hoti yaṃ yassa paccayo;
anya-e0102n:1121_0: Yathā ca paccayo hoti, tathā neyyaṃ vibhāvinā.
anya-e0102n:1124_0: Paccayo sattadhā chadhā, hoti taṃ avakaṃsato.
anya-e0102n:1125_1: Paṭisandhiyaṃ tāva avakaṃsato sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttavipākaatthiavigatapaccayehi sattadhā nāmaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1125_3: kiñci āhārapaccayenāti evaṃ aññathāpi paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1126_1: itaraṃ pana avakaṃsato vuttappakāresu paccayesu vipākapaccayavajjehi chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1126_3: kiñci āhārapaccayenāti evaṃ aññathāpi paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1129_0: Āruppato hi aññasmimpi pañcavokārabhave taṃ vipākanāmaṃ hadayavatthuno sahāyaṃ hutvā chaṭṭhassa manāyatanassa yathā āruppe vuttaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1129_2: Itaresaṃ pana taṃ pañcannaṃ cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ catumahābhūtasahāyaṃ hutvā sahajātanissayavipākavippayuttaatthiavigatavasena chahākārehi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1129_4: kiñci āhārapaccayenāti evaṃ aññathāpi paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1130_0: Pavattepi tathā hoti, pākaṃ pākassa paccayo;
anya-e0102n:1132_1: tatheva vipākanāmaṃ vipākassa chaṭṭhāyatanassa avakaṃsato sattadhā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1132_2: Avipākaṃ pana avipākassa chaṭṭhassa avakaṃsatova tato vipākapaccayaṃ apanetvā chadhā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1135_0: Tattheva hi pavatte sesānaṃ cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ cakkhupasādādivatthukaṃ itarampi vipākanāmaṃ
anya-e0102n:1135_4: Tasmā kusalādibhedampi tesaṃ catudhā paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1135_5: Evaṃ tāva nāmameva paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte vā yassa yassa āyatanassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1136_0: Rūpaṃ panettha āruppe, bhave bhavati paccayo;
anya-e0102n:1138_0: Rūpato sandhiyaṃ vatthu, chadhā chaṭṭhassa paccayo;
anya-e0102n:1140_0: Rūpato hi paṭisandhiyaṃ vatthurūpaṃ chaṭṭhassa manāyatanassa sahajātaaññamaññanissayavippayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi chadhā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1140_1: Cattāri pana bhūtāni avisesato paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca yaṃ yaṃ āyatanaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:1140_2: tassa tassa vasena pañcannampi cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ sahajātanissayaatthiavigatapaccayehi catudhā paccayā honti.
anya-e0102n:1142_0: Tāneva chadhā chaṭṭhassa, vatthu tasseva pañcadhā.
anya-e0102n:1143_0: Etesaṃ pana cakkhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca atthi avigataindriyavasena rūpajīvitaṃ tidhā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1143_1: Āhāro ca atthiavigatāhāravasena tividhā paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1143_2: so ca kho ye sattā āhārūpajīvino,
anya-e0102n:1143_5: Tāni pana pañca cakkhāyatanādīni chaṭṭhassa cakkhu sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇasaṅkhātassa manāyatanassa
anya-e0102n:1143_8: Ṭhapetvā pana pañcaviññāṇāni tasseva avasesamanāyatanassa vatthurūpaṃ nissayapurejātavippayuttaatthiavigatavasena pañcadhā paccayo hoti pavatteyeva,
anya-e0102n:1143_10: Evaṃ rūpameva paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte vā yassa yassa āyatanassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1144_0: Nāmarūpaṃ panubhayaṃ, hoti yaṃ yassa paccayo;
anya-e0102n:1145_0: Yathā ca tampi sabbattha, viññātabbaṃ vibhāvinā.
anya-e0102n:1146_1: Paṭisandhiyaṃ tāva pañcavokārabhave khandhattayavatthurūpasaṅkhātaṃ nāmarūpaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanassa sahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākasampayuttavippayuttaatthiavigatapaccayādīhi
anya-e0102n:1146_4: Vuttanayānusārena pana sakkā sabbaṃ yojetunti na ettha vitthāro dassitoti.
anya-e0102n:1152_5: manosamphassoti ime cakkhusamphassādayo cha eva phassā bhavanti.
anya-e0102n:1152_9: lokiyavipākaviññāṇasampayuttā ca bāvīsatīti evaṃ sabbepi saṅkhārapaccayā vuttaviññāṇamiva bāttiṃsa honti.
anya-e0102n:1153_0: Yaṃ panetassa bāttiṃsavidhassāpi phassassa paccayo saḷāyatanaṃ, tattha,
anya-e0102n:1156_0: Tattha ye tāva “upādiṇṇakapavattikathā aya”nti sakasantatipariyāpannameva paccayaṃ paccayuppannañca dīpenti,
anya-e0102n:1156_2: aññattha sabbasaṅgahato saḷāyatanañca phassassa paccayoti ekadesasarūpekasesaṃ katvā chaṭṭhena saha ajjhattaṃ cakkhādiṃ saḷāyatananti icchanti.
anya-e0102n:1156_3: Tañhi chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatanantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:1157_2: te yaṃ yaṃ āyatanaṃ phassassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1157_3: taṃ sabbampi dīpentā bāhirampi pariggahetvā tadeva chaṭṭhena saha ajjhattaṃ bāhirehipi rūpāyatanādīhi saddhiṃ saḷāyatananti icchanti.
anya-e0102n:1157_4: Tampi hi chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti etesaṃ ekasese kate saḷāyatanantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:1158_10: Yathā cakkhusamphasso cakkhāyatanā rūpāyatanā cakkhuviññāṇasaṅkhātā manāyatanā avasesasampayuttadhammāyatanā
anya-e0102n:1161_0: Ekavacananiddesenāti saḷāyatanapaccayā phassoti iminā ekavacananiddesena anekehi āyatanehi eko phasso hotīti tādinā dīpitoti attho.
anya-e0102n:1162_0: Chadhā pañca tato ekaṃ, navadhā bāhirāni cha;
anya-e0102n:1164_1: cakkhāyatanādīni tāva pañca cakkhusamphassādibhedato pañcavidhassa phassassa nissayapurejātindriyavippayuttaatthiavigatavasena chadhā paccayā honti.
anya-e0102n:1164_2: Tato paraṃ ekaṃ vipākamanāyatanaṃ anekabhedassa vipākamanosamphassassa sahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākāhāraindriyasampayuttaatthiavigatavasena
anya-e0102n:1164_4: Bāhiresu pana rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhusamphassassa ārammaṇapurejātaatthiavigatavasena catudhā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1164_6: Manosamphassassa pana tāni ca dhammāyatanañca tathā ca ārammaṇapaccayamatteneva cāti evaṃ bāhirāni cha yathāsambhavametassa paccayatte vibhāvayeti.
anya-e0102n:1170_0: Etassapi padassa vibhaṅge “cakkhusamphassajā vedanā. Sota… ghāna… jivhā… kāya…
anya-e0102n:1170_1: manosamphassajā vedanā”ti evaṃ dvārato saḷeva vedanā vuttā,
anya-e0102n:1170_2: tā pana pabhedena ekūnanavutiyā cittehi sampayuttattā ekūnanavuti matā.
anya-e0102n:1174_0: Sesānaṃ ekadhā phasso, manodvārepi so tathā.
anya-e0102n:1175_0: Tattha hi pañcadvāre cakkhupasādādivatthukānaṃ pañcannaṃ vedanānaṃ cakkhusamphassādiko phasso sahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākaāhārasampayuttaatthiavigatavasena
anya-e0102n:1175_2: Sesānaṃ pana ekekasmiṃ dvāre sampaṭicchanasantīraṇatadārammaṇavasena pavattānaṃ kāmāvacaravipākavedanānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1175_3: so cakkhusamphassādiko phasso upanissayavasena ekadhāva paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1176_0: Manodvārepi so tathāti manodvārepi hi tadārammaṇavasena pavattānaṃ kāmāvacaravipākavedanānaṃ so sahajātamanosamphassasaṅkhāto
anya-e0102n:1176_3: Yā pana tā manodvāre tadārammaṇavasena pavattā kāmāvacaravedanā,
anya-e0102n:1176_4: tāsaṃ manodvārāvajjanasampayutto manosamphasso upanissayavasena ekadhāva paccayo hotīti.
anya-e0102n:1182_0: Imasmiṃ hi pade seṭṭhiputto brāhmaṇaputtoti pitito nāmavasena putto viya “rūpataṇhā. Sadda… gandha… rasa…
anya-e0102n:1182_2: dhammataṇhā”ti ārammaṇato nāmavasena vibhaṅge cha taṇhā dīpitā.
anya-e0102n:1183_0: Tāsu pana taṇhāsu ekekā taṇhā pavattiākārato kāmataṇhā,
anya-e0102n:1183_3: Rūpataṇhāyeva hi yadā cakkhussa āpāthamāgataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ kāmassādavasena assādayamānā pavattati,
anya-e0102n:1183_5: Yadā tadevārammaṇaṃ “dhuvaṃ sassata”nti pavattāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ pavattati,
anya-e0102n:1183_8: Yadā pana tadevārammaṇaṃ “ucchijjati vinassatī”ti pavattāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ pavattati,
anya-e0102n:1184_6: kāmataṇhādivasena vā tissova taṇhā hontīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1185_0: Yasmā panime sattā puttaṃ assādetvā putte mamattena dhātiyā viya rūpādiārammaṇavasena uppajjamānaṃ vedanaṃ
anya-e0102n:1185_4: Tasmā sabbāpesā vedanāpaccayā taṇhā hotīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1188_0: Ekadhāti upanissayapaccayeneva paccayo hoti. Yasmā vā,
anya-e0102n:1189_0: Dukkhī sukhaṃ patthayati, sukhī bhiyyopi icchati;
anya-e0102n:1191_0: Taṇhāya paccayā tasmā, honti tissopi vedanā;
anya-e0102n:1194_0: Hoti tasmā na sā hoti, brāhmaṇassa vusīmatoti.
anya-e0102n:1200_10: Tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānañcāti diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1200_12: “Sassato attā ca loko cā”tiādīsu hi purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyati.
anya-e0102n:1200_15: Gosīlagovatādīni hi “evaṃ suddhī”ti abhinivesato sayameva upādānāni.
anya-e0102n:1200_21: Attavādamattameva vā attāti upādiyanti etenāti attavādupādānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1201_0: Dhammasaṅkhepavitthāre pana kāmupādānaṃ tāva “tattha katamaṃ kāmupādānaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1201_1: Yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasneho kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1201_2: idaṃ vuccati kāmupādāna”nti āgatattā saṅkhepato taṇhādaḷhattaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0102n:1201_4: Keci panāhu “appattavisayapatthanā taṇhā andhakāre corassa hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya,
anya-e0102n:1202_0: Vitthārato pana pubbe rūpādīsu vuttaaṭṭhasatappabhedāyapi taṇhāya daḷhabhāvo kāmupādānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1202_8: Sīlabbatehi suddhīti parāmasanaṃ pana sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:1203_0: Kamatoti ettha pana tividho kamo uppattikkamo pahānakkamo desanākkamo ca.
anya-e0102n:1203_1: Tattha anamatagge saṃsāre imassa paṭhamaṃ uppattīti abhāvato kilesānaṃ nippariyāyena uppattikkamo na vuccati.
anya-e0102n:1203_2: Pariyāyena pana yebhuyyena ekasmiṃ bhave attaggāhapubbaṅgamo sassatucchedābhiniveso,
anya-e0102n:1203_3: tato “sassato ayaṃ attā”ti gaṇhato attavisuddhatthaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1203_4: “ucchijjatī”ti gaṇhato paralokanirapekkhassa kāmupādānanti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ attavādupādānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1203_5: tato diṭṭhisīlabbatakāmupādānānīti ayametesaṃ ekasmiṃ bhave uppattikkamo.
anya-e0102n:1205_0: Mahāvisayattā pana pākaṭattā ca etesu kāmupādānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1205_3: yebhuyyena ca ālayarāmattā pajāya pākaṭaṃ kāmupādānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1205_5: Kāmupādāna vā kāmānaṃ samadhigamatthaṃ kotūhalamaṅgalādibahulo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1205_8: Tasmiṃ dvaye gokiriyaṃ kukkurakiriyaṃ vā disvāpi veditabbato oḷārikanti sīlabbatupādānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1206_0: Taṇhā ca purimassettha, ekadhā hoti paccayo;
anya-e0102n:1207_0: Sattadhā aṭṭhadhā vāpi, hoti sesattayassa sā.
anya-e0102n:1208_0: Ettha ca evaṃ desite upādānacatukke purimassa kāmupādānassa kāmataṇhā upanissayavasena ekadhāva paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1208_3: upanissayena saha aṭṭhadhā vāpi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1208_4: Yadā ca sā upanissayavasena paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1213_0: Yaṃ yassa paccayo ceva, viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:1214_1: So kammabhavo upapattibhavo cāti duvidho hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:1214_7: Kammaṃ pana yathā sukhakāraṇattā “sukho buddhānaṃ uppādo”ti vutto,
anya-e0102n:1215_1: Dhammato pana kammabhavo tāva saṅkhepato cetanā ceva cetanāsampayuttā ca abhijjhādayo kammasaṅkhātā dhammā. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:1215_3: Puññābhisaṅkhāro apuññābhisaṅkhāro āneñjābhisaṅkhāro parittabhūmako vā mahābhūmako vā,
anya-e0102n:1215_9: Evaṃ parittabhūmako vā mahābhūmako vāti etena tāsaṃyeva cetanānaṃ mandabahuvipākatā vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1215_10: Sabbampi bhavagāmikammanti iminā pana cetanāsampayuttā abhijjhādayo vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1216_3: Kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo saññābhavo asaññābhavo nevasaññānāsaññābhavo,
anya-e0102n:1216_9: saññā vā ettha bhave atthīti saññābhavo.
anya-e0102n:1216_11: Oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvā sukhumāya ca bhāvā nevasaññā,
anya-e0102n:1216_14: Eko vā vokāro assa bhavassāti ekavokārabhavo.
anya-e0102n:1216_22: Ekavokārabhavādayo ekacatupañcakkhandhā upādiṇṇakkhandhehīti evamettha dhammatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:1217_3: evaṃ santepi purime atītakammavasena idha paṭisandhiyā paccayattā,
anya-e0102n:1217_4: ime paccuppannakammavasena āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayattāti punavacanaṃ sātthakameva,
anya-e0102n:1217_6: Kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā”ti evamādinā nayena cetanāva saṅkhārāti vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1217_11: “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ettha puññābhisaṅkhārādayova kusalākusalā dhammā vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1217_12: “Upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti idha pana upapattibhavassāpi saṅgahitattā kusalākusalābyākatā dhammā vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1217_13: Tasmā sabbathāpi sātthakamevidaṃ punavacananti evamettha sātthatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n:1218_1: Bhedasaṅgahāti upādānapaccayā bhavassa bhedato ceva saṅgahato ca.
anya-e0102n:1218_11: tadantogadhā ca saññābhavanevasaññānāsaññābhavacatuvokārabhavāti saddhiṃ antogadhehi cha bhavā.
anya-e0102n:1218_12: Yathā ca kāmupādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi cha bhavā.
anya-e0102n:1218_13: Tathā sesupādānapaccayāpīti evaṃ upādānapaccayā bhedato saddhiṃ antogadhehi catuvīsati bhavā.
anya-e0102n:1219_0: Saṅgahato pana kammabhavaṃ upapattibhavañca ekato katvā kāmupādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi eko kāmabhavo.
anya-e0102n:1219_3: Evaṃ upādānapaccayā saṅgahato saddhiṃ antogadhehi dvādasa bhavā.
anya-e0102n:1219_4: Apica avisesena upādānapaccayā kāmabhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo.
anya-e0102n:1219_7: Evaṃ upādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi dve kāmabhavā,
anya-e0102n:1219_9: dve arūpabhavāti aparena pariyāyena saṅgahato cha bhavā.
anya-e0102n:1219_10: Kammabhavaupapattibhavabhedaṃ vā anupagamma saddhiṃ antogadhehi kāmabhavādivasena tayo bhavā honti.
anya-e0102n:1219_11: Kāmabhavādibhedampi anupagamma kammabhavaupapattibhavavasena dve bhavā honti.
anya-e0102n:1219_12: Kammupapattibhedañcāpi anupagamma upādānapaccayā bhavoti bhavavasena ekova bhavo hotīti evamettha upādānapaccayassa
anya-e0102n:1220_1: Yaṃ yassa paccayo cevāti yañcettha upādānaṃ yassa paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1220_6: So idaṃ yuttaṃ idaṃ ayuttanti avicāretvā yassa kassaci upādānassa vasena yaṃkiñci bhavaṃ patthetvā yaṃkiñci kammaṃ karotiyeva.
anya-e0102n:1220_7: Tasmā yadekacce sīlabbatupādānena rūpārūpabhavā na hontīti vadanti,
anya-e0102n:1221_1: idhekacco anussavavasena vā diṭṭhānusārena vā “kāmā nāmete manussaloke ceva khattiyamahāsālakulādīsu,
anya-e0102n:1221_2: cha kāmāvacaradevaloke ca samiddhā”ti cintetvā tesaṃ adhigamatthaṃ asaddhammassavanādīhi vañcito “iminā
anya-e0102n:1221_3: kammena kāmā sampajjantī”ti maññamāno kāmupādānavasena kāyaduccaritādīnipi karoti,
anya-e0102n:1221_5: Sandiṭṭhike vā pana kāme patthayamāno paṭiladdhe ca gopayamāno kāmupādānavasena kāyaduccaritādīni karoti,
anya-e0102n:1222_0: Aparo pana saddhammassavanādīhi upabrūhitañāṇo “iminā kammena kāmā sampajjantī”ti maññamāno kāmupādānavasena kāyasucaritādīni karoti.
anya-e0102n:1222_1: So sucaritapāripūriyā devesu vā manussesu vā upapajjati.
anya-e0102n:1222_5: Iti kāmupādānaṃ sappabhedassa sāntogadhassa kāmabhavassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1223_0: Aparo “rūpārūpabhavesu tato samiddhatarā kāmā”ti sutvā parikappetvā vā kāmupādānavaseneva rūpārūpasamāpattiyo
anya-e0102n:1223_6: Iti kāmupādānaṃ sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ rūpārūpabhavānampi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1224_0: Aparo “ayaṃ attā nāma kāmāvacarasampattibhave vā rūpārūpabhavānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ ucchinne suucchinno
anya-e0102n:1224_1: hotī”ti ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ upādāya tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karoti,
anya-e0102n:1224_5: Iti diṭṭhupādānaṃ sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ tiṇṇampi kāmarūpārūpabhavānaṃ paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1225_0: Aparo “ayaṃ attā nāma kāmāvacarasampattibhave vā rūpārūpabhavānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ sukhī hoti vigatapariḷāho”ti
anya-e0102n:1225_5: Iti attavādupādānaṃ sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1226_0: Aparo “idaṃ sīlabbataṃ nāma kāmāvacarasampattibhave vā rūpārūpabhavānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ paripūrentassa
anya-e0102n:1226_1: sukhaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti sīlabbatupādānavasena tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karoti,
anya-e0102n:1226_5: Iti sīlabbatupādānaṃ sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1227_0: Kiṃ panettha kassa bhavassa kathaṃ paccayo hotīti ce?
anya-e0102n:1230_2: upapattibhavassa cetaṃ catubbidhampi upādānaṃ upanissayapaccayavasena ekadhāva paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1230_3: Kāmabhave attanā sampayuttākusalakammabhavassa sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatahetupaccayappabhedehi sahajātādīhi paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1233_1: Bhavapaccayā jātītiādīsu jātiādīnaṃ vinicchayo saccaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1233_5: So ca pana kammapaccayaupanissayapaccayavasena dvedhā paccayo hotīti.
anya-e0102n:1234_1: kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ bhavo jātiyā paccayoti ce?
anya-e0102n:1234_3: Bāhirānaṃ hi janakajananīsukkasoṇitāhārādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ samattepi sattānaṃ yamakānampi sataṃ hīnapaṇītatādiviseso dissati.
anya-e0102n:1234_4: So ca na ahetuko sabbadā ca sabbesañca abhāvato,
anya-e0102n:1234_5: na kammabhavato aññahetuko tadabhinibbattakasattānaṃ ajjhattasantāne aññassa kāraṇassa abhāvatoti kammabhavahetukova.
anya-e0102n:1234_7: Tenāha bhagavā “kammaṃ satte vibhajati yadidaṃ hīnappaṇītatāyā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1235_0: Yasmā ca asati jātiyā jarāmaraṇaṃ nāma,
anya-e0102n:1235_3: jarāmaraṇasaṅkhātadukkhadhammaphuṭṭhassa ca bālajanassa jarāmaraṇābhisambandhā vā tena tena dukkhadhammena
anya-e0102n:1235_4: phuṭṭhassa anabhisambandhā vā sokādayo ca dhammā honti.
anya-e0102n:1235_5: Tasmā ayampi jāti jarāmaraṇassa ceva sokādīnañca paccayo hotīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1235_6: Sā pana upanissayakoṭiyā ekadhāva paccayo hotīti.
anya-e0102n:1238_2: tasmā yā sā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti evametassa bhavacakkassa ādimhi vuttā, sā,
anya-e0102n:1242_5: paridevo ca nāma mūḷhassāti tesu tāva siddhesu siddhā hoti avijjā.
anya-e0102n:1243_0: Kathaṃ? Vatthukāmaviyoge tāva soko kāmāsavasamudayā hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:1248_0: “Tassa ‘ahaṃ rūpaṃ mama rūpa’nti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino rūpavipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1249_0: Yathā ca diṭṭhāsavasamudayā, evaṃ bhavāsavasamudayāpi. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:1250_0: “Yepi te devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā uccesu vimānesu ciraṭṭhitikā,
anya-e0102n:1250_1: tepi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhayaṃ santāsaṃ saṃvegamāpajjantī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1250_2: Pañca pubbanimittāni disvā maraṇabhayena santajjitānaṃ devānaṃ viya.
anya-e0102n:1251_0: Yathā ca bhavāsavasamudayā, evaṃ avijjāsavasamudayāpi. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:1252_0: “Sa kho so, bhikkhave, bālo tividhaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1253_0: Iti yasmā āsavasamudayā ete dhammā honti,
anya-e0102n:1253_1: tasmā ete sijjhamānā avijjāya hetubhūte āsave sādhenti.
anya-e0102n:1253_2: Āsavesu ca siddhesu paccayabhāve bhāvato avijjāpi siddhāva hotīti.
anya-e0102n:1253_3: Evaṃ tāvettha sokādīhi avijjā siddhā hotīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1254_0: Yasmā pana evaṃ paccayabhāve bhāvato avijjāya siddhāya puna avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā,
anya-e0102n:1254_1: saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇanti evaṃ hetuphalaparamparāya pariyosānaṃ natthi.
anya-e0102n:1254_2: Tasmā taṃ hetuphalasambandhavasena pavattaṃ dvādasaṅgaṃ bhavacakkaṃ aviditādīti siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1255_0: Evaṃ sati avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti idaṃ ādimattakathanaṃ virujjhatīti ce.
anya-e0102n:1255_4: Avijjāggahaṇena hi avasesakilesavaṭṭañca kammādīni ca bālaṃ palibodhenti.
anya-e0102n:1255_6: Avijjāsamucchede pana kate tehi vimokkho hoti.
anya-e0102n:1256_0: Tayidaṃ yasmā avijjādīhi kāraṇehi saṅkhārādīnaṃ pavatti,
anya-e0102n:1256_1: tasmā tato aññena “brahmā mahābrahmā seṭṭho sajitā”ti evaṃ parikappitena brahmādinā vā saṃsārassa kārakena,
anya-e0102n:1256_2: “so kho pana me ayaṃ attā vado vedeyyo”ti evaṃ parikappitena attanā vā sukhadukkhānaṃ vedakena rahitaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1260_0: Dve aṭṭha dve eva ca, sarūpato tesu aṅgāni.
anya-e0102n:1261_0: Tassa kho panetassa bhavacakkassa avijjā taṇhā cāti dve dhammā mūlanti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1262_4: Jāti ceva jarāmaraṇañca dve anāgatakālānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:1267_0: Tattha saṅkhārānañca paṭisandhiviññāṇassa ca antarā eko hetuphalasandhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:1267_1: Vedanāya ca taṇhāya ca antarā eko phalahetusandhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:1267_2: Bhavassa ca jātiyā ca antarā eko hetuphalasandhīti evamidaṃ hetuphalahetupubbakatisandhīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1268_0: Sandhīnaṃ ādipariyosānavavatthitā panassa cattāro saṅgahā honti.
anya-e0102n:1271_0: Etehi pana vīsatiyā ākārasaṅkhātehi arehi vīsatiākārāranti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1271_1: Tattha atīte hetavo pañcāti avijjā saṅkhārā cāti ime tāva dve vuttā eva.
anya-e0102n:1271_10: cetanā bhavoti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1272_2: Moho avijjāti yo tadā dukkhādīsu moho,
anya-e0102n:1272_5: Āyūhanā saṅkhārāti taṃ kammaṃ karoto yā purimacetanāyo,
anya-e0102n:1272_6: yathā “dānaṃ dassāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā māsampi saṃvaccharampi dānupakaraṇāni sajjentassa uppannā purimacetanāyo.
anya-e0102n:1272_7: Paṭiggāhakānaṃ pana hatthe dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpayato cetanā bhavoti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:1272_8: Ekāvajjanesu vā chasu javanesu cetanā āyūhanā saṅkhārā nāma.
anya-e0102n:1272_10: Yā kāci vā pana cetanā bhavo.
anya-e0102n:1272_12: Nikanti taṇhāti yā kammaṃ karontassa phale upapattibhave nikāmanā patthanā,
anya-e0102n:1272_14: Upagamanaṃ upādānanti yaṃ kammabhavassa paccayabhūtaṃ “idaṃ katvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne kāme sevissāmi
anya-e0102n:1272_15: ucchijjissāmī”tiādinā nayena pavattaṃ upagamanaṃ gahaṇaṃ parāmasanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1272_17: Cetanā bhavoti āyūhanāvasāne vuttā cetanā bhavoti evamattho veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:1273_0: Idāni phalapañcakanti viññāṇādivedanāvasānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:1273_6: ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ purekatassa kammassa paccayā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1273_7: Tattha paṭisandhi viññāṇanti yaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasena uppannattā paṭisandhīti vuccati,
anya-e0102n:1273_9: Okkanti nāmarūpanti yā gabbhe rūpārūpadhammānaṃ okkanti āgantvā pavisanaṃ viya,
anya-e0102n:1273_12: Phuṭṭho phassoti yo ārammaṇaṃ phuṭṭho phusanto uppanno,
anya-e0102n:1273_14: Vedayitaṃ vedanāti yaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇena vā saḷāyatanapaccayena vā phassena saha uppannaṃ vipākavedayitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1274_0: Idāni hetavo pañcāti taṇhādayo pāḷiyaṃ āgatā taṇhupādānabhavā.
anya-e0102n:1274_1: Bhave pana gahite tassa pubbabhāgā taṃsampayuttā vā saṅkhārā gahitāva honti.
anya-e0102n:1274_10: cetanā bhavoti ime pañca dhammā idha kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1274_11: Tattha idha paripakkattā āyatanānanti paripakkāyatanassa kammakaraṇakāle sammoho dassito.
anya-e0102n:1275_8: ime pañca dhammā āyatiṃ upapattibhavasmiṃ idha katassa kammassa paccayā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1276_0: Tivaṭṭamanavaṭṭhitaṃ bhamatīti ettha pana saṅkhārabhavā kammavaṭṭaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1276_2: viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanā vipākavaṭṭanti imehi tīhi vaṭṭehi tivaṭṭamidaṃ bhavacakkaṃ yāva kilesavaṭṭaṃ na upacchijjati,
anya-e0102n:1276_3: tāva anupacchinnapaccayattā anavaṭṭhitaṃ punappunaṃ parivattanato bhamatiyevāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1280_0: Tattha yasmā kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ avisesena samudayasaccanti saccavibhaṅge vuttaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1280_1: tasmā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti avijjāya saṅkhārā dutiyasaccappabhavaṃ dutiyasaccaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1280_8: Jātiyā jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭhamasaccappabhavaṃ paṭhamasaccanti evaṃ tāvidaṃ saccappabhavato viññātabbaṃ yathārahaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1281_1: Yasmā panettha avijjā vatthūsu ca satte sammoheti,
anya-e0102n:1281_21: Jātipi khandhe ca janeti tesaṃ abhinibbattibhāvena pavattattā,
anya-e0102n:1281_24: paccayo ca hoti bhavantarapātubhāvāya sokādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānattā.
anya-e0102n:1281_25: Tasmā sabbapadesu dvedhā pavattikiccatopi idaṃ viññātabbaṃ yathārahaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1282_1: Yasmā cettha avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti idaṃ kārakadassananivāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1282_4: Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanantiādi attā passati…pe… vijānāti, phusati, vedayati,
anya-e0102n:1283_1: Yasmā panettha salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena dhammānaṃ adassanato andho viya avijjā.
anya-e0102n:1283_13: Yasmā vā panettha avijjā appaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattibhāvena satte abhibhavati paṭalaṃ viya akkhīni.
anya-e0102n:1283_14: Tadabhibhūto ca bālo punabbhavikehi saṅkhārehi attānaṃ veṭheti kosakārakimi viya kosappadesehi.
anya-e0102n:1283_15: Saṅkhārapariggahitaṃ viññāṇaṃ gatīsu patiṭṭhaṃ labhati pariṇāyakapariggahito viya rājakumāro rajje.
anya-e0102n:1283_16: Upapattinimittaparikappanato viññāṇaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ anekappakāraṃ nāmarūpaṃ abhinibbatteti māyākāro viya māyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1283_17: Nāmarūpe patiṭṭhitaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti subhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito vanappagumbo viya.
anya-e0102n:1283_18: Āyatanaghaṭṭanato phasso jāyati araṇisahitābhimanthanato aggi viya.
anya-e0102n:1283_19: Phassena phuṭṭhassa vedanā pātubhavati agginā phuṭṭhassa dāho viya.
anya-e0102n:1283_20: Vedayamānassa taṇhā pavaḍḍhati loṇūdakaṃ pivato pipāsā viya.
anya-e0102n:1283_21: Tasito bhavesu abhilāsaṃ karoti pipāsito viya pānīye.
anya-e0102n:1283_23: upādānena bhavaṃ upādiyati āmisalobhena maccho baḷisaṃ viya.
anya-e0102n:1283_24: Bhave sati jāti hoti bīje sati aṅkuro viya.
anya-e0102n:1283_25: Jātassa avassaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ uppannassa rukkhassa patanaṃ viya.
anya-e0102n:1283_26: Tasmā evaṃ upamāhipetaṃ bhavacakkaṃ viññātabbaṃ yathārahaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1284_1: Yasmā ca bhagavatā atthatopi dhammatopi desanatopi paṭivedhatopi gambhīrabhāvaṃ sandhāya “gambhīro cāyaṃ, ānanda,
anya-e0102n:1285_0: Tattha yasmā na jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0102n:1285_1: na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hoti,
anya-e0102n:1285_2: itthañca jātito samudāgacchatīti evaṃ jātipaccayasamudāgataṭṭhassa duravabodhanīyato jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho gambhīro.
anya-e0102n:1285_5: Tasmā idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ atthagambhīranti ayaṃ tāvettha atthagambhīratā.
anya-e0102n:1286_0: Yasmā pana yenākārena yadavatthā ca avijjā tesaṃ tesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1286_1: tassa duravabodhanīyato avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho gambhīro.
anya-e0102n:1286_4: tasmā idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ dhammagambhīranti ayamettha dhammagambhīratā.
anya-e0102n:1287_0: Yasmā cassa tena tena kāraṇena tathā tathā pavattetabbattā desanāpi gambhīrā,
anya-e0102n:1287_1: na tattha sabbaññutaññāṇato aññaṃ ñāṇaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ labhati.
anya-e0102n:1287_5: katthaci vemajjhato paṭṭhāya anulomato vā paṭilomato vā,
anya-e0102n:1287_9: tasmā idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ desanāgambhīranti ayaṃ desanāgambhīratā.
anya-e0102n:1288_0: Yasmā cettha yo so avijjādīnaṃ sabhāvo,
anya-e0102n:1288_1: yena paṭividdhena avijjādayo sammā salakkhaṇato paṭividdhā honti,
anya-e0102n:1288_14: jātiyā jāti sañjāti okkanti nibbatti pātubhāvaṭṭho,
anya-e0102n:1290_1: saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇanti evaṃ bījassa aṅkurādibhāvena rukkhabhāvappatti viya santānānupacchedo ekattanayo nāma.
anya-e0102n:1290_2: Yaṃ sammā passanto hetuphalasambandhena santānassa anupacchedāvabodhato ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati.
anya-e0102n:1290_3: Micchā passanto hetuphalasambandhena pavattamānassa santānānupacchedassa ekattagahaṇato sassatadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyati.
anya-e0102n:1291_1: Yaṃ sammā passanto navanavānaṃ uppādadassanato sassatadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati.
anya-e0102n:1291_2: Micchā passanto ekasantānapatitassa bhinnasantānasseva nānattaggahaṇato ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyati.
anya-e0102n:1292_1: saṅkhārānaṃ vā viññāṇaṃ amhehīti evamādibyāpārābhāvo abyāpāranayo nāma.
anya-e0102n:1292_2: Yaṃ sammā passanto kārakassa abhāvāvabodhato attadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati.
anya-e0102n:1292_3: Micchā passanto yo asatipi byāpāre avijjādīnaṃ sabhāvaniyamasiddho hetubhāvo,
anya-e0102n:1293_0: Avijjādīhi pana kāraṇehi saṅkhārādīnaṃyeva sambhavo khīrādīhi dadhiādīnaṃ viya,
anya-e0102n:1293_2: Yaṃ sammā passanto paccayānurūpato phalāvabodhā ahetukadiṭṭhiṃ akiriyadiṭṭhiñca pajahati.
anya-e0102n:1293_3: Micchā passanto paccayānurūpaṃ phalappavattiṃ aggahetvā yato kutoci yassa kassaci asambhavaggahaṇato
anya-e0102n:1299_4: dhammassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamayaṃ pajā tantākulakajātā kulāgaṇṭhikajātā muñjapabbajabhūtā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1299_5: Tasmā attano vā paresaṃ vā hitāya ca sukhāya ca paṭipanno avasesakiccāni pahāya,
anya-e0102n:1308_1: Idāni yā “imesu bhūmibhūtesu dhammesu uggahaparipucchāvasena ñāṇaparicayaṃ katvā ‘sīlavisuddhi ceva cittavisuddhi
anya-e0102n:1308_2: cā’ti dve mūlabhūtā visuddhiyo sampādetabbā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1308_3: Tattha sīlavisuddhi nāma suparisuddhaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarādicatubbidhaṃ sīlaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1308_6: tāpi cittasīsena vuttasamādhiniddese sabbākārena vitthāritā eva.
anya-e0102n:1309_4: ñāṇadassanavisuddhīti imā pana pañca visuddhiyo sarīra”nti,
anya-e0102n:1310_1: Taṃ sampādetukāmena samathayānikena tāva ṭhapetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ avasesarūpārūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ aññatarato vuṭṭhāya vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni,
anya-e0102n:1310_3: Pariggahetvā sabbampetaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato namanaṭṭhena nāmanti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1311_0: Tato yathā nāma puriso antogehe sappaṃ disvā taṃ anubandhamāno tassa āsayaṃ passati,
anya-e0102n:1311_1: evameva ayampi yogāvacaro taṃ nāmaṃ upaparikkhanto “idaṃ nāmaṃ kiṃ nissāya pavattatī”ti pariyesamāno tassa nissayaṃ hadayarūpaṃ passati.
anya-e0102n:1312_1: Suddhavipassanāyāniko pana ayameva vā samathayāniko catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhātupariggahamukhānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1312_2: aññataramukhavasena saṅkhepato vā vitthārato vā catasso dhātuyo pariggaṇhāti.
anya-e0102n:1312_3: Athassa yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato āvibhūtāsu dhātūsu kammasamuṭṭhānamhi tāva kese “catasso dhātuyo, vaṇṇo, gandho, raso, ojā, jīvitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1312_8: cittasamuṭṭhānanti aparānipi catuvīsatīti evaṃ catusamuṭṭhānesu catuvīsatikoṭṭhāsesu catucattālīsa catucattālīsa rūpāni, sedo, assu, kheḷo,
anya-e0102n:1312_9: siṅghāṇikāti imesu pana catūsu utucittasamuṭṭhānesu dvinnaṃ ojaṭṭhamakānaṃ vasena soḷasa soḷasa rūpāni, udariyaṃ, karīsaṃ, pubbo,
anya-e0102n:1312_10: muttanti imesu catūsu utusamuṭṭhānesu utusamuṭṭhānasseva ojaṭṭhamakassa vasena aṭṭha aṭṭha rūpāni pākaṭāni hontīti.
anya-e0102n:1313_0: Ye pana imasmiṃ dvattiṃsākāre āvibhūte apare dasa ākārā āvibhavanti.
anya-e0102n:1313_1: Tattha asitādiparipācake tāva kammaje tejokoṭṭhāsamhi ojaṭṭhamakañceva jīvitañcāti nava rūpāni,
anya-e0102n:1313_2: tathā cittaje assāsapassāsakoṭṭhāsepi ojaṭṭhamakañceva saddo cāti nava,
anya-e0102n:1313_3: sesesu catusamuṭṭhānesu aṭṭhasu jīvitanavakañceva tīṇi ca ojaṭṭhamakānīti tettiṃsa rūpāni pākaṭāni honti.
anya-e0102n:1314_0: Tassevaṃ vitthārato dvācattālīsākāravasena imesu bhūtupādāyarūpesu pākaṭesu jātesu vatthudvāravasena pañca cakkhudasakādayo,
anya-e0102n:1314_2: So sabbānipi tāni ruppanalakkhaṇena ekato katvā “etaṃ rūpa”nti passati.
anya-e0102n:1315_0: Tassevaṃ pariggahitarūpassa dvāravasena arūpadhammā pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0102n:1315_5: avisesena ca tehi cittehi sahajāto phasso, vedanā, saññā, cetanā, jīvitaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1315_10: So sabbepi te arūpadhamme namanalakkhaṇena ekato katvā “etaṃ nāma”nti passati.
anya-e0102n:1316_2: Idha bhikkhu atthi imasmiṃ attabhāve cakkhudhātu…pe…
anya-e0102n:1316_3: manoviññāṇadhātūti dhātuyo āvajjitvā yaṃ loko setakaṇhamaṇḍalavicittaṃ āyatavitthataṃ akkhikūpake nhārusuttakena
anya-e0102n:1316_5: taṃ aggahetvā khandhaniddese upādārūpesu vuttappakāraṃ cakkhupasādaṃ “cakkhudhātū”ti vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1317_1: parivārakāni cattāri vaṇṇa- gandha- rasa- ojā- rūpāni,
anya-e0102n:1317_4: āhārasamuṭṭhānādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ojaṭṭhamakānaṃ vasena catuvīsati anupādinnarūpānīti evaṃ sesāni tepaṇṇāsa rūpāni honti,
anya-e0102n:1317_7: Kāyadhātuyaṃ pana avasesāni tecattālīsa rūpāni honti.
anya-e0102n:1317_8: Keci pana utucittasamuṭṭhānāni saddena saha nava nava katvā pañcacattālīsāti vadanti.
anya-e0102n:1318_1: tesañca visayā rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbā pañcāti dasa rūpāni dasa dhātuyo honti.
anya-e0102n:1318_3: Cakkhuṃ pana nissāya rūpaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ cittaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātu nāmāti evaṃ dvepañcaviññāṇāni pañca viññāṇadhātuyo honti.
anya-e0102n:1318_5: aṭṭhasaṭṭhi manoviññāṇadhātucittāni manoviññāṇadhātūti sabbānipi ekāsīti lokiyacittāni satta viññāṇadhātuyo.
anya-e0102n:1318_6: Taṃsampayuttā phassādayo dhammadhātūti evamettha aḍḍhekādasa dhātuyo rūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1318_7: aḍḍhaṭṭhamā dhātuyo nāmanti evameko aṭṭhārasadhātuvasena nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1319_2: Cakkhudhātuyaṃ vuttanayeneva ṭhapetvā tepaṇṇāsa rūpāni cakkhupasādamattaṃ “cakkhāyatana”nti vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1319_6: taṃsampayuttā phassādayo sesarūpañca “dhammāyatana”nti evamettha aḍḍhekādasa āyatanāni rūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1319_7: diyaḍḍhaāyatanāni nāmanti evameko dvādasāyatanavasena nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1320_1: Aparo tato saṃkhittataraṃ khandhavasena vavatthapeti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1320_2: Idha bhikkhu imasmiṃ sarīre catusamuṭṭhānā catasso dhātuyo,
anya-e0102n:1320_7: dvisamuṭṭhāno saddoti imāni sattarasa rūpāni sammasanupagāni nipphannāni rūparūpāni.
anya-e0102n:1320_13: aniccatāti imāni pana dasa rūpāni na sammasanupagāni,
