anya-e0102n:1320_17: Apica kho rūpānaṃ ākāravikāraantaraparicchedamattato rūpanti saṅkhaṃ gatāni.
anya-e0102n:1320_18: Iti sabbāni petāni sattavīsati rūpāni rūpakkhandho,
anya-e0102n:1320_19: ekāsītiyā lokiyacittehi saddhiṃ uppannā vedanā vedanākkhandho,
anya-e0102n:1320_24: cattāro arūpino khandhā nāmanti evameko pañcakkhandhavasena nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1321_1: Aparo “yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti evaṃ saṃkhitteneva
anya-e0102n:1321_3: tathā manāyatanañceva dhammāyatanekadesañca nāmanti pariggahetvā “iti idañca nāmaṃ idañca rūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1321_4: idaṃ vuccati nāmarūpa”nti saṅkhepato nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1322_1: Sace panassa tena tena mukhena rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ pariggaṇhato sukhumattā arūpaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:1322_2: tena dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā rūpameva punappunaṃ sammasitabbaṃ manasikātabbaṃ pariggahetabbaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1322_3: Yathā yathā hissa rūpaṃ suvikkhālitaṃ hoti nijjaṭaṃ suparisuddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1322_4: tathā tathā tadārammaṇā arūpadhammā sayameva pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0102n:1323_0: Yathā hi cakkhumato purisassa aparisuddhe ādāse mukhanimittaṃ olokentassa nimittaṃ na paññāyati,
anya-e0102n:1323_1: so “nimittaṃ na paññāyatī”ti na ādāsaṃ chaḍḍeti,
anya-e0102n:1323_3: Tassa parisuddhe ādāse nimittaṃ sayameva pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1323_4: Yathā ca telatthiko tilapiṭṭhaṃ doṇiyaṃ ākiritvā udakena paripphosetvā ekavāraṃ dvevāraṃ pīḷanamattena tele anikkhamante na tilapiṭṭhaṃ chaḍḍeti,
anya-e0102n:1323_5: atha kho naṃ punappunaṃ uṇhodakena paripphosetvā madditvā pīḷeti.
anya-e0102n:1323_7: Yathā vā pana udakaṃ pasādetukāmo katakaṭṭhiṃ gahetvā antoghaṭe hatthaṃ otāretvā ekadvevāre ghaṃsanamattena
anya-e0102n:1323_12: evamevaṃ tena bhikkhunā dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā rūpameva punappunaṃ sammasitabbaṃ manasikātabbaṃ pariggahetabbaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1324_0: Yathā yathā hissa rūpaṃ suvikkhālitaṃ hoti nijjaṭaṃ suparisuddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1324_2: kaddamupari udakaṃ viya cittaṃ pasannaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1324_4: Evaṃ aññāhipi ucchucoragoṇadadhimacchādīhi upamāhi ayamattho pakāsetabbo.
anya-e0102n:1326_1: Evaṃ suvisuddharūpapariggahassa panassa arūpadhammā tīhi ākārehi upaṭṭhahanti phassavasena vā vedanāvasena vā viññāṇavasena vā. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1326_2: Ekassa tāva “pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā”tiādinā nayena dhātuyo pariggaṇhantassa paṭhamābhinipāto phasso,
anya-e0102n:1327_2: taṃsampayutto phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandho,
anya-e0102n:1328_3: phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandhoti upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1328_5: assāsapassāse pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā”ti ārammaṇapaṭivijānanaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho,
anya-e0102n:1328_8: phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandhoti upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1329_0: Eteneva upāyena “kammasamuṭṭhāne kese pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā”tiādinā nayena dvācattālīsāya dhātukoṭṭhāsesu catunnaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena,
anya-e0102n:1329_1: sesesu ca cakkhudhātuādīsu rūpapariggahamukhesu sabbaṃ nayabhedaṃ anugantvā yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0102n:1330_1: Yasmā ca evaṃ suvisuddharūpapariggahasseva tassa arūpadhammā tīhākārehi pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0102n:1330_4: Sace hi ekasmiṃ vā rūpadhamme upaṭṭhite dvīsu vā rūpaṃ pahāya arūpapariggahaṃ ārabhati kammaṭṭhānato parihāyati,
anya-e0102n:1330_6: Suvisuddharūpapariggahassa pana arūpapariggahāya yogaṃ karoto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0102n:1331_0: So evaṃ phassādīnaṃ vasena upaṭṭhite cattāro arūpino khandhe nāmanti,
anya-e0102n:1331_3: Iti aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo dvādasāyatanāni pañcakkhandhāti sabbepi tebhūmake dhamme khaggena samuggaṃ vivaramāno
anya-e0102n:1331_4: viya yamakatālakandaṃ phālayamāno viya ca nāmañca rūpañcāti dvedhā vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1331_5: Nāmarūpamattato uddhaṃ añño satto vā puggalo vā devo vā brahmā vā natthīti niṭṭhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:1333_1: So evaṃ yāthāvasarasato nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā suṭṭhutaraṃ “satto puggalo”ti imissā lokasamaññāya pahānatthāya
anya-e0102n:1333_2: sattasammohassa samatikkamatthāya asammohabhūmiyaṃ cittaṃ ṭhapanatthāya sambahulasuttantavasena “nāmarūpamattamevidaṃ,  na satto,
anya-e0102n:1333_3: na puggalo atthī”ti etamatthaṃ saṃsandetvā vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1335_0: Evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammutī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n:1336_2: kaṭṭhañca paṭicca valliñca paṭicca mattikañca paṭicca tiṇañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito agārantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0102n:1336_4: aṭṭhiñca paṭicca nhāruñca paṭicca maṃsañca paṭicca cammañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1338_0: “Dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti ca;
anya-e0102n:1339_0: Nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṃ dukkhā nirujjhatī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n:1341_3: Tasmā yathā akkhacakkapañjaraīsādīsu aṅgasambhāresu ekenākārena saṇṭhitesu rathoti vohāramattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1341_4: paramatthato ekekasmiṃ aṅge upaparikkhiyamāne ratho nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:1341_5: Yathā ca kaṭṭhādīsu gehasambhāresu ekenākārena ākāsaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitesu gehanti vohāramattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1341_7: Yathā ca aṅguliaṅguṭṭhādīsu ekenākārena ṭhitesu muṭṭhīti vohāramattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1341_11: Khandhasākhāpalāsādīsu ekenākārena ṭhitesu rukkhoti vohāramattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1341_12: paramatthato ekekasmiṃ avayave upaparikkhiyamāne rukkho nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:1341_15: paramatthato ekekasmiṃ dhamme upaparikkhiyamāne “asmīti vā ahanti vā”ti gāhassa vatthubhūto satto nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:1341_17: Evaṃ passato hi dassanaṃ yathābhūtadassanaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n:1342_1: Yo panetaṃ yathābhūtadassanaṃ pahāya “satto atthī”ti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0102n:1342_2: So tassa vināsaṃ anujāneyya avināsaṃ vā.
anya-e0102n:1342_5: Khīranvayassa dadhino viya tadanvayassa aññassa abhāvato.
anya-e0102n:1344_6: Tesaṃ bhavanirodhāya dhamme desiyamāne cittaṃ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati. Evaṃ kho,
anya-e0102n:1345_3: Bhaveneva kho paneke aṭṭīyamānā harāyamānā jigucchamānā vibhavaṃ abhinandanti,
anya-e0102n:1345_4: yato kira bho ayaṃ attā kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati,
anya-e0102n:1346_5: bhūtaṃ bhūtato disvā bhūtassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti. Evaṃ kho,
anya-e0102n:1347_1: Tasmā yathā dāruyantaṃ suññaṃ nijjīvaṃ nirīhakaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1347_2: atha ca pana dārurajjukasamāyogavasena gacchatipi tiṭṭhatipi.
anya-e0102n:1347_5: atha ca pana aññamaññasamāyogavasena gacchatipi tiṭṭhatipi.
anya-e0102n:1349_0: Na hettha satto manujo ca vijjati;
anya-e0102n:1352_2: yathā hi dvīsu naḷakalāpīsu aññamaññaṃ nissāya ṭhapitāsu ekā ekissā upatthambho hoti,
anya-e0102n:1352_4: evamevaṃ pañcavokārabhave nāmarūpaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya pavattati,
anya-e0102n:1355_1: Yathā ca daṇḍābhihataṃ bheriṃ nissāya sadde pavattamāne aññā bherī,
anya-e0102n:1355_6: evamevaṃ vatthudvārārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya nāme pavattamāne aññaṃ rūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1355_11: apica kho bheriṃ paṭicca saddo viya rūpaṃ paṭicca nāmaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0102n:1372_1: Apicettha nāmaṃ nittejaṃ na sakena tejena pavattituṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:1372_6: Rūpampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena pavattituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0102n:1372_11: atha kho nāmaṃ nissāya rūpaṃ pavattati,
anya-e0102n:1372_13: nāmassa khāditukāmatāya pivitukāmatāya byāharitukāmatāya iriyāpathaṃ kappetukāmatāya sati rūpaṃ khādati, pivati,
anya-e0102n:1373_0: Imassa panatthassa vibhāvanatthāya imaṃ upamaṃ udāharanti –
anya-e0102n:1373_1: yathā jaccandho ca pīṭhasappī ca disāpakkamitukāmā assu,
anya-e0102n:1373_4: natthi ca me cakkhūni yehi samavisamaṃ passeyya”nti.
anya-e0102n:1373_7: natthi ca me pādāni yehi abhikkameyyaṃ vā paṭikkameyyaṃ vā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1373_8: So tuṭṭhahaṭṭho jaccandho pīṭhasappiṃ aṃsakūṭaṃ āropesi.
anya-e0102n:1373_9: Pīṭhasappī jaccandhassa aṃsakūṭe nisīditvā evamāha “vāmaṃ muñca dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇha,
anya-e0102n:1373_11: Tattha jaccandhopi nittejo dubbalo na sakena tejena sakena balena gacchati,
anya-e0102n:1373_12: pīṭhasappīpi nittejo dubbalo na sakena tejena sakena balena gacchati,
anya-e0102n:1373_13: na ca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya gamanaṃ nappavattati,
anya-e0102n:1373_14: evamevaṃ nāmampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:1373_16: Rūpampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:1373_18: na ca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya uppatti vā pavatti vā na hoti.
anya-e0102n:1384_0: “Yathā ca manusse nissāya, nāvā gacchati aṇṇave;
anya-e0102n:1386_0: “Ubho nissāya gacchanti, manussā nāvā ca aṇṇave;
anya-e0102n:1388_0: Evaṃ nānānayehi nāmarūpaṃ vavatthāpayato sattasaññaṃ abhibhavitvā asammohabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ yāthāvadassanaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1395_1: Etasseva pana nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṇena tīsu addhāsu kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:1396_0: Taṃ sampādetukāmo bhikkhu yathā nāma kusalo bhisakko rogaṃ disvā tassa samuṭṭhānaṃ pariyesati.
anya-e0102n:1396_1: Yathā vā pana anukampako puriso daharaṃ kumāraṃ mandaṃ uttānaseyyakaṃ rathikāya nipannaṃ disvā “kassa
anya-e0102n:1396_2: nu kho ayaṃ puttako”ti tassa mātāpitaro āvajjati,
anya-e0102n:1397_0: So āditova iti paṭisañcikkhati “na tāvidhaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ahetukaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1398_1: So evaṃ nāmarūpassa hetupaccaye āvajjetvā imassa tāva rūpakāyassa evaṃ hetupaccaye pariggaṇhāti –
anya-e0102n:1398_2: “ayaṃ kāyo nibbattamāno neva uppalapadumapuṇḍarīkasogandhikādīnaṃ abbhantare nibbattati,
anya-e0102n:1398_4: atha kho āmāsayapakkāsayānaṃ antare udarapaṭalaṃ pacchato piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ purato katvā antaantaguṇaparivārito
anya-e0102n:1398_7: Tassevaṃ nibbattamānassa ‘avijjā taṇhā upādānaṃ kamma’nti ime cattāro dhammā nibbattakattā hetu,
anya-e0102n:1398_8: āhāro upatthambhakattā paccayoti pañca dhammā hetupaccayā honti.
anya-e0102n:1398_9: Tesupi avijjādayo tayo imassa kāyassa mātā viya dārakassa upanissayā honti.
anya-e0102n:1398_13: puna “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādinā nayena nāmakāyassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:1399_0: So evaṃ paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā yathā idaṃ etarahi,
anya-e0102n:1400_1: Tassevaṃ samanupassato yā sā pubbantaṃ ārabbha “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1400_5: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”nti pañcavidhā vicikicchā vuttā,
anya-e0102n:1400_6: yāpi aparantaṃ ārabbha “bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1400_10: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhāna”nti pañcavidhā vicikicchā vuttā,
anya-e0102n:1400_11: yāpi paccuppannaṃ ārabbha “etarahi vā pana paccuppannaṃ addhānaṃ ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī hoti –
anya-e0102n:1400_16: ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato,
anya-e0102n:1400_17: so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatī”ti chabbidhā vicikicchā vuttā,
anya-e0102n:1401_1: Aparo sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇavasena duvidhaṃ nāmassa paccayaṃ passati,
anya-e0102n:1401_3: Duvidho hi nāmassa paccayo sādhāraṇo asādhāraṇo ca.
anya-e0102n:1401_5: rūpādīni cha ārammaṇāni nāmassa sādhāraṇo paccayo,
anya-e0102n:1402_0: Rūpassa pana kammaṃ cittaṃ utu āhāroti ayaṃ kammādiko catubbidho paccayo.
anya-e0102n:1402_1: Tattha kammaṃ atītameva kammasamuṭṭhānassa rūpassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1403_0: So evaṃ paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā yathā idaṃ etarahi,
anya-e0102n:1403_3: Tassevaṃ samanupassato vuttanayeneva tīsupi addhāsu vicikicchā pahīyati.
anya-e0102n:1404_1: Aparo tesaṃyeva nāmarūpasaṅkhātānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ jarāpattiṃ jiṇṇānañca bhaṅgaṃ disvā idaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ nāma jātiyā sati hoti,
anya-e0102n:1404_11: saṅkhārā avijjāya satīti evaṃ paṭilomapaṭiccasamuppādavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:1405_1: Aparo “iti kho avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti pubbe vitthāretvā dassitaanulomapaṭiccasamuppādavaseneva nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:1406_5: cetanā bhavoti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā,
anya-e0102n:1406_10: vedayitaṃ vedanāti ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ purekatassa kammassa paccayā.
anya-e0102n:1406_12: cetanā bhavoti ime pañca dhammā idha kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti evaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena
anya-e0102n:1407_6: Tesu ekajavanavīthiyaṃ sattasu cittesu kusalā vā akusalā vā paṭhamajavanacetanā diṭṭhidhammavedanīyakammaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:1407_10: natthi kammavipāko”ti imassa tikassa vasena ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n:1407_13: Tathā asakkontaṃ vuttanayeneva ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n:1407_14: Ubhinnaṃ antare pañca javanacetanā aparāpariyavedanīyakammaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:1407_17: Sati saṃsārappavattiyā ahosikammaṃ nāma na hoti.
anya-e0102n:1408_6: Tattha kusalaṃ vā hotu akusalaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:1408_7: garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ mātughātādikammaṃ vā mahaggatakammaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:1408_9: Tathā bahulābahulesupi yaṃ bahulaṃ hoti susīlyaṃ vā dussīlyaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:1408_14: Etehi pana tīhi muttaṃ punappunaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ nāma hoti,
anya-e0102n:1409_5: Tattha janakaṃ nāma kusalampi hoti akusalampi.
anya-e0102n:1409_7: Upatthambhakaṃ pana vipākaṃ janetuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:1409_8: aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjamānakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti,
anya-e0102n:1409_10: Upapīḷakaṃ aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjamānakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti bādhati,
anya-e0102n:1409_12: Upaghātakaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalampi akusalampi samānaṃ aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ ghātetvā tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:1409_13: Evaṃ pana kammena kate okāse taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma vuccati.
anya-e0102n:1410_0: Iti imesaṃ dvādasannaṃ kammānaṃ kammantarañceva vipākantarañca buddhānaṃ kammavipākañāṇasseva yāthāvasarasato pākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1410_2: Vipassakena pana kammantarañca vipākantarañca ekadesato jānitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1411_1: Iti imaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ kammaṃ kammavaṭṭe pakkhipitvā evaṃ eko kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:1411_2: So evaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā “yathā idaṃ etarahi,
anya-e0102n:1411_3: evaṃ atītepi addhāne kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena paccayato pavattittha,
anya-e0102n:1413_0: Kammā punabbhavo hoti, evaṃ loko pavattatīti. –
anya-e0102n:1414_1: Tassevaṃ samanupassato yā sā pubbantādayo ārabbha “ahosiṃ nu kho aha”ntiādinā nayena vuttā soḷasavidhā vicikicchā,
anya-e0102n:1414_4: So neva kāraṇato uddhaṃ kārakaṃ passati,
anya-e0102n:1414_7: vipākappavattiyā sati “paṭisaṃvedako”ti samaññāmattena paṇḍitā voharanticcevassa sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1425_0: Taṇhāsotena vuyhantā, na te dukkhā pamuccare.
anya-e0102n:1428_0: “Kammaṃ natthi vipākamhi, pāko kamme na vijjati;
anya-e0102n:1429_0: Aññamaññaṃ ubho suññā, na ca kammaṃ vinā phalaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1430_0: “Yathā na sūriye aggi, na maṇimhi na gomaye;
anya-e0102n:1431_0: Na tesaṃ bahi so atthi, sambhārehi ca jāyati.
anya-e0102n:1433_0: Bahiddhāpi na kammassa, na kammaṃ tattha vijjati.
anya-e0102n:1434_0: “Phalena suññaṃ taṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ kamme na vijjati;
anya-e0102n:1435_0: Kammañca kho upādāya, tato nibbattate phalaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1438_1: Tassevaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ katvā tīsu addhāsu pahīnavicikicchassa
anya-e0102n:1439_3: atītakammapaccayā pana imasmiṃ bhave aññe nibbattā,
anya-e0102n:1439_4: atītabhavato imaṃ bhavaṃ āgato ekadhammopi natthi,
anya-e0102n:1439_5: imasmimpi bhave kammapaccayena nibbattā khandhā nirujjhissanti,
anya-e0102n:1439_7: imamhā bhavā punabbhavaṃ ekadhammopi na gamissati.
anya-e0102n:1439_8: Apica kho yathā na ācariyamukhato sajjhāyo antevāsikassa mukhaṃ pavisati,
anya-e0102n:1439_9: na ca tappaccayā tassa mukhe sajjhāyo na vattati,
anya-e0102n:1439_10: na dūtena mantodakaṃ pītaṃ rogino udaraṃ pavisati,
anya-e0102n:1439_11: na ca tassa tappaccayā rogo na vūpasammati,
anya-e0102n:1439_12: na mukhe maṇḍanavidhānaṃ ādāsatalādīsu mukhanimittaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0102n:1439_13: na ca tattha tappaccayā maṇḍanavidhānaṃ na paññāyati,
anya-e0102n:1439_14: na ekissā vaṭṭiyā dīpasikhā aññaṃ vaṭṭiṃ saṅkamati,
anya-e0102n:1439_15: na ca tattha tappaccayā dīpasikhā na nibbattati,
anya-e0102n:1439_17: ito vā punabbhavaṃ koci dhammo saṅkamati,
anya-e0102n:1439_19: idha vā khandhāyatanadhātupaccayā punabbhave khandhāyatanadhātuyo na nibbattantīti.
anya-e0102n:1441_0: Na ceva āgataṃ nāpi, na nibbattaṃ anantaraṃ.
anya-e0102n:1443_0: Purimaṃ bhijjate cittaṃ, pacchimaṃ jāyate tato.
anya-e0102n:1444_0: Tesaṃ antarikā natthi, vīci tesaṃ na vijjati;
anya-e0102n:1445_0: Na cito gacchati kiñci, paṭisandhi ca jāyatīti.
anya-e0102n:1446_1: Evaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena viditasabbadhammassa sabbākārena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahañāṇaṃ thāmagataṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1446_6: Evaṃ nānānayehi nāmarūpapaccayapariggahaṇena tīsu addhāsu kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1447_2: Ubhopete dhammā paccayasamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n:1448_0: “Aniccato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati,
anya-e0102n:1448_2: kathaṃ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato sudiṭṭhā honti,
anya-e0102n:1448_5: anattato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati…pe…
anya-e0102n:1449_2: Evaṃ tadanvayena sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato sudiṭṭhā honti.
anya-e0102n:1449_4: Dukkhato manasikaronto pavattaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati…pe…
anya-e0102n:1449_5: anattato manasikaronto nimittañca pavattañca yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati,
anya-e0102n:1449_7: Evaṃ tadanvayena sabbe dhammā anattato sudiṭṭhā honti.
anya-e0102n:1450_0: “Yañca yathābhūtañāṇaṃ yañca sammādassanaṃ yā ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇā,
anya-e0102n:1450_1: ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā ca,
anya-e0102n:1450_3: Yañca yathābhūtañāṇaṃ yañca sammādassanaṃ yā ca kaṅkhāvitaraṇā,
anya-e0102n:1451_0: Iminā pana ñāṇena samannāgato vipassako buddhasāsane laddhassāso laddhapatiṭṭho niyatagatiko cūḷasotāpanno nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n:1452_0: Tasmā bhikkhu sadā sato, nāmarūpassa sabbaso;
anya-e0102n:1460_2: ayaṃ na maggoti evaṃ maggañca amaggañca ñatvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ pana maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:1461_0: Taṃ sampādetukāmena kalāpasammasanasaṅkhātāya nayavipassanāya tāva yogo karaṇīyo. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:1461_2: Āraddhavipassakassa hi obhāsādīsu sambhūtesu maggāmaggañāṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1461_5: Apica yasmā tīraṇapariññāya vattamānāya maggāmaggañāṇaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:1461_7: tasmāpi taṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ sampādetukāmena kalāpasammasane tāva yogo kātabbo.
anya-e0102n:1462_2: tisso hi lokiyapariññā ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññā ca.
anya-e0102n:1462_7: vedayitalakkhaṇā vedanā”ti evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena pavattā paññā ñātapariññā nāma.
anya-e0102n:1462_9: vedanā aniccā”tiādinā nayena tesaṃyeva dhammānaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā pavattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanā paññā tīraṇapariññā nāma.
anya-e0102n:1462_10: Tesuyeva pana dhammesu niccasaññādipajahanavasena pavattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanā paññā pahānapariññā nāma.
anya-e0102n:1463_0: Tattha saṅkhāraparicchedato paṭṭhāya yāva paccayapariggahā ñātapariññāya bhūmi.
anya-e0102n:1463_1: Etasmiṃ hi antare dhammānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva ādhipaccaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1463_2: Kalāpasammasanato pana paṭṭhāya yāva udayabbayānupassanā tīraṇapariññāya bhūmi.
anya-e0102n:1463_3: Etasmiṃ hi antare sāmaññalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva ādhipaccaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1463_4: Bhaṅgānupassanaṃ ādiṃ katvā upari pahānapariññāya bhūmi.
anya-e0102n:1463_5: Tato paṭṭhāya hi aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati,
anya-e0102n:1463_11: paṭinissajjanto ādānaṃ pajahatīti evaṃ niccasaññādipahānasādhikānaṃ sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ ādhipaccaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1463_12: Iti imāsu tīsu pariññāsu saṅkhāraparicchedassa ceva paccayapariggahassa ca sādhitattā iminā yoginā ñātapariññāva adhigatā hoti,
anya-e0102n:1463_14: Tena vuttaṃ “yasmā tīraṇapariññāya vattamānāya maggāmaggañāṇaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:1463_16: tasmāpi taṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ sampādetukāmena kalāpasammasane tāva yogo kātabbo”ti.
anya-e0102n:1465_0: “Kathaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1467_2: anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ. Vedanaṃ… viññāṇaṃ…
anya-e0102n:1468_0: “Rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ
anya-e0102n:1468_1: nirodhadhammanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ. Vedanaṃ… viññāṇaṃ… cakkhuṃ…
anya-e0102n:1468_3: nirodhadhammanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1469_1: asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1469_4: asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1469_7: asati avijjāya natthi saṅkhārāti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1469_10: asati avijjāya natthi saṅkhārāti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1470_2: Tena vuccati atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n:1471_1: jarāmaraṇanti iminā peyyālena dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattā dhammā,
anya-e0102n:1471_24: dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānīti ime dhammarāsayo saṃkhittāti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1473_9: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:1473_11: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:1476_0: “Pathavīdhātu…pe… viññāṇadhātu… pathavīkasiṇaṃ…pe… viññāṇakasiṇaṃ… kesā…pe… muttaṃ… matthaluṅgaṃ….
anya-e0102n:1480_0: Taṃ tattha evaṃ vitthārena vuttattā idha sabbaṃ peyyālena saṃkhittaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1480_1: Evaṃ saṃkhitte panettha ye lokuttarā dhammā āgatā,
anya-e0102n:1480_2: te asammasanupagattā imasmiṃ adhikāre na gahetabbā.
anya-e0102n:1480_4: tesu ye yassa pākaṭā honti sukhena pariggahaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0102n:1481_7: Ettāvatā ayaṃ bhikkhu “yaṃkiñci rūpa”nti evaṃ aniyamaniddiṭṭhaṃ sabbampi rūpaṃ atītattikena ceva catūhi
anya-e0102n:1481_8: ca ajjhattādidukehīti ekādasahi okāsehi paricchinditvā sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato vavatthapeti,
anya-e0102n:1482_0: Kathaṃ? Parato vuttanayena. Vuttañhetaṃ – “rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1484_2: na tato paraṃ bhavaṃ gamissatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n:1485_0: Yaṃ paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ, tampi idheva khīyati, na ito gacchatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n:1486_0: Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ, tampi ajjhattameva khīyati, na bahiddhābhāvaṃ gacchatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n:1487_5: na dūrabhāvaṃ gacchatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1488_0: Idaṃ sabbampi “aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti etassa vasena ekaṃ sammasanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1489_3: taṃ bhayāvahaṃ hoti sīhopamasutte devānaṃ viya.
anya-e0102n:1489_4: Iti idampi “dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhenā”ti etassa vasena ekaṃ sammasanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1490_2: Asārakaṭṭhenāti “attā nivāsī kārako vedako sayaṃvasī”ti evaṃ parikappitassa attasārassa abhāvena.
anya-e0102n:1490_4: taṃ attanopi aniccataṃ vā udayabbayapīḷanaṃ vā vāretuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:1490_10: Iti idampi “anattā asārakaṭṭhenā”ti etassa vasena ekaṃ sammasanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1491_4: nānākārehi vā manasikārappavattidassanatthaṃ “rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ
anya-e0102n:1491_5: khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhamma”nti puna pāḷi vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1493_1: So tasseva pañcasu khandhesu aniccadukkhānattasammasanassa thirabhāvatthāya,
anya-e0102n:1493_2: yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā “katamehi cattārīsāya ākārehi anulomikaṃ khantiṃ paṭilabhati,
anya-e0102n:1493_3: katamehi cattārīsāya ākārehi sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamatī”ti etassa vibhaṅge –
anya-e0102n:1494_0: “Pañcakkhandhe aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato, parato, palokato, ītito,
anya-e0102n:1496_1: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodho niccaṃ nibbānanti passanto sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamatī”tiādinā nayena,
anya-e0102n:1498_29: Byādhijarāmaraṇehi ceva lābhālābhādīhi ca lokadhammehi pacalitatāya calato.
anya-e0102n:1498_30: Upakkamena ceva sarasena ca pabhaṅgupagamanasīlatāya pabhaṅguto.
anya-e0102n:1498_40: appakampi hi loke tucchanti vuccati. Sāmi- nivāsi- kāraka-
anya-e0102n:1498_45: atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti gacchati pavattatīti ādīnavo,
anya-e0102n:1498_48: Jarāya ceva maraṇena cāti dvedhā pariṇāmapakatitāya vipariṇāmadhammato.
anya-e0102n:1498_62: Taṇhādiṭṭhiduccaritasaṃkilesānaṃ visayadhammatāya saṃkilesikadhammatoti evaṃ pabhedato vuttassa aniccādisammasanassa vasena sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1499_7: maraṇadhammatoti ekekasmiṃ khandhe dasa dasa katvā paññāsa aniccānupassanāni. Parato, rittato, tucchato, suññato,
anya-e0102n:1499_8: anattatoti ekekasmiṃ khandhe pañca pañca katvā pañcavīsati anattānupassanāni.
anya-e0102n:1499_10: rogatotiādīni ekekasmiṃ khandhe pañcavīsati pañcavīsati katvā pañcavīsatisataṃ dukkhānupassanānīti.
anya-e0102n:1500_0: Iccassa iminā dvisatabhedena aniccādisammasanena pañcakkhandhe sammasato taṃ nayavipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ aniccadukkhānattasammasanaṃ thiraṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1502_1: Yassa pana evaṃ nayavipassanāya yogaṃ karotopi nayavipassanā na sampajjati,
anya-e0102n:1502_9: kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhataṃ upaṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1502_11: antarā ca abyosānenā”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ navannaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena indriyāni tikkhāni katvā pathavīkasiṇaniddese
anya-e0102n:1502_12: vuttanayena satta asappāyāni vajjetvā satta sappāyāni sevamānena kālena rūpaṃ sammasitabbaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1504_2: idaṃ rūpaṃ nāma kammādivasena catūhi kāraṇehi nibbattati.
anya-e0102n:1504_3: Tattha sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ rūpaṃ nibbattamānaṃ paṭhamaṃ kammato nibbattati.
anya-e0102n:1504_4: Paṭisandhikkhaṇeyeva hi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ tāva tisantativasena vatthu- kāya-
anya-e0102n:1505_7: Rūpe dharanteyeva hi soḷasavāre bhavaṅgacittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1505_14: Paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya dutiyaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1505_15: Tena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya tatiyaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1505_17: Āsannamaraṇassa pana ekameva ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya soḷasa cittāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n:1506_0: Paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ rūpaṃ paṭisandhicittato uddhaṃ soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1506_1: Ṭhānakkhaṇe uppannaṃ sattarasamassa uppādakkhaṇena saddhiṃ nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1506_2: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ sattarasamassa ṭhānakkhaṇaṃ patvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1506_5: Opapātikānampi sattasantativasena sattati rūpāni evameva pavattanti.
anya-e0102n:1507_13: Kammapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma kammasamuṭṭhānarūpesu ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1507_14: tatrāpi ojā ṭhānaṃ patvā aññanti evaṃ catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭeti.
anya-e0102n:1507_15: Kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma kammajatejodhātu ṭhānappattā utusamuṭṭhānaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1507_16: tatrāpi utu aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakanti evaṃ catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭeti.
anya-e0102n:1511_3: kusalakiriyato dve abhiññācittānīti dvattiṃsa cittāni rūpaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1511_20: cattāri āruppavipākānīti soḷasa cittāni neva rūpaṃ janayanti,
anya-e0102n:1511_28: tasmā taṃ tadā purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n:1512_7: Cittapaccayaṃ nāma “pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ catusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1512_8: Cittapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma cittasamuṭṭhānarūpesu ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1512_10: Cittapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma cittasamuṭṭhāno utu ṭhānappatto aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1513_7: Āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma upādiṇṇaṃ kammajarūpaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā tattha patiṭṭhāya ṭhānappattāya ojāya samuṭṭhāpitaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1513_11: Āhārapaccayaṃ nāma “kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ catusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1513_12: Āhārapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma āhārasamuṭṭhānesu rūpesu ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1513_13: tatrāpi ojā aññanti evaṃ dasadvādasavāre pavattiṃ ghaṭeti.
anya-e0102n:1513_15: Dibbā pana ojā ekamāsaṃ dvemāsampi upatthambheti.
anya-e0102n:1513_16: Mātarā paribhuttāhāropi dārakassa sarīraṃ pharitvā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n:1513_20: tatrāpi ojā aññaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti evaṃ catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭeti.
anya-e0102n:1513_21: Āhārapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma āhārasamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu ṭhānappattā utusamuṭṭhānaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n:1513_22: Tatrāyaṃ āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānānaṃ janako hutvā paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1513_23: sesānaṃ nissayāhāraatthiavigatavasenāti evaṃ āhārajarūpassa nibbatti passitabbā.
anya-e0102n:1514_7: uṇhautu sītautūti evaṃ panesa duvidho hoti.
anya-e0102n:1514_8: Utusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma catusamuṭṭhāno utu upādiṇṇakaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā ṭhānappatto sarīre rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0102n:1514_13: Utupaccayaṃ nāma utu catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānaṃ pavattiyā ca vināsassa ca paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1514_14: Utupaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma utusamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu ṭhānappattā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1514_15: tatrāpi utu aññanti evaṃ dīghampi addhānaṃ anupādiṇṇapakkhe ṭhatvāpi utusamuṭṭhānaṃ pavattatiyeva.
anya-e0102n:1514_16: Utupaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma utusamuṭṭhānā ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0102n:1514_17: tatrāpi ojā aññanti evaṃ dasadvādasavāre pavattiṃ ghaṭeti.
anya-e0102n:1514_18: Tatrāyaṃ utu utusamuṭṭhānānaṃ janako hutvā paccayo hoti,
anya-e0102n:1514_19: sesānaṃ nissayaatthiavigatavasenāti evaṃ utujarūpassa nibbatti passitabbā.
anya-e0102n:1514_20: Evañhi rūpassa nibbattiṃ passanto kālena rūpaṃ sammasati nāma.
anya-e0102n:1516_2: evaṃ arūpaṃ sammasantenapi arūpassa nibbatti passitabbā.
anya-e0102n:1517_1: idañhi arūpaṃ nāma purimabhave āyūhitakammavasena paṭisandhiyaṃ tāva ekūnavīsaticittuppādappabhedaṃ nibbattati.
anya-e0102n:1518_0: Pavatte pana asambhinnattā cakkhussa āpāthagatattā rūpānaṃ ālokasannissitaṃ manasikārahetukaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nibbattati saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi.
anya-e0102n:1518_1: Cakkhupasādassa hi ṭhitikkhaṇe ṭhitippattameva rūpaṃ cakkhuṃ ghaṭṭeti.
anya-e0102n:1518_2: Tasmiṃ ghaṭṭite dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅgaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1518_3: Tato tasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1518_4: Tadanantaraṃ tadeva rūpaṃ passamānaṃ kusalavipākaṃ akusalavipākaṃ vā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1518_7: Tato tadeva rūpaṃ vavatthāpayamānā kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu upekkhāsahagatā.
anya-e0102n:1518_8: Tato paraṃ kāmāvacarakusalākusalakiriyacittesu ekaṃ vā upekkhāsahagatāhetukaṃ cittaṃ pañca satta vā javanāni.
anya-e0102n:1518_9: Tato kāmāvacarasattānaṃ ekādasasu tadārammaṇacittesu javanānurūpaṃ yaṃkiñci tadārammaṇanti.
anya-e0102n:1518_12: Evaṃ chasu dvāresu arūpassa nibbatti passitabbā.
anya-e0102n:1518_13: Evañhi arūpassa nibbattiṃ passanto kālena arūpaṃ sammasati nāma.
anya-e0102n:1519_0: Evaṃ kālena rūpaṃ kālena arūpaṃ sammasitvāpi tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā anukkamena paṭipajjamāno eko paññābhāvanaṃ sampādeti.
anya-e0102n:1521_1: Aparo rūpasattakaarūpasattakavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1521_8: dhammatārūpatoti imehi ākārehi āropetvā sammasanto rūpasattakavasena āropetvā sammasati nāma.
anya-e0102n:1523_0: Āhārato ca ututo, kammato cāpi cittato;
anya-e0102n:1525_2: Iti yogāvacaro imehi ādānanikkhepehi ekaṃ vassasataṃ paricchinditvā saṅkhāresu tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1525_8: Yasmā pana uppannā saṅkhārā ṭhitiṃ pāpuṇanti,
anya-e0102n:1525_14: Yasmā ca “uppannā saṅkhārā ṭhitiṃ mā pāpuṇantu,
anya-e0102n:1525_16: jarappattā mā bhijjantū”ti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu kassaci vasavattibhāvo natthi,
anya-e0102n:1526_1: Evaṃ ādānanikkhepanavasena vassasataparicchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā tato paraṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1526_2: Tattha vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamo nāma vayavasena vuḍḍhassa vaḍḍhitassa rūpassa atthaṅgamo.
anya-e0102n:1527_1: So tameva vassasataṃ paṭhamavayena majjhimavayena pacchimavayenāti tīhi vayehi paricchindati.
anya-e0102n:1527_2: Tattha ādito tettiṃsa vassāni paṭhamavayo nāma.
anya-e0102n:1527_6: “paṭhamavaye pavattaṃ rūpaṃ majjhimavayaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1527_12: Majjhimavaye pavattarūpampi pacchimavayaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1527_14: Pacchimavaye tettiṃsa vassāni pavattarūpampi maraṇato paraṃ gamanasamatthaṃ nāma natthi,
anya-e0102n:1527_15: tasmā tampi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1528_1: Evaṃ paṭhamavayādivasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna “mandadasakaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1528_10: sayanadasaka”nti imesaṃ dasannaṃ dasakānaṃ vasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1529_0: Tattha dasakesu tāva vassasatajīvino puggalassa paṭhamāni dasa vassāni mandadasakaṃ nāma,
anya-e0102n:1529_1: tadā hi so mando hoti capalo kumārako.
anya-e0102n:1529_7: tadā hissa balañca thāmo ca vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0102n:1529_10: pakatiyā kira dubbalapaññassāpi tasmiṃ kāle appamattakā paññā uppajjatiyeva.
anya-e0102n:1529_14: tadā hissa attabhāvo purato pabbhāro hoti.
anya-e0102n:1529_16: tadā hissa attabhāvo naṅgalakoṭi viya vaṅko hoti.
anya-e0102n:1530_0: Tatrāyaṃ yogī etesaṃ dasakānaṃ vasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetuṃ iti paṭisañcikkhati –
anya-e0102n:1530_4: navamadasake pavattarūpaṃ dasamadasakaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1530_5: Dasamadasake pavattarūpaṃ punabbhavaṃ appatvā idheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1530_6: tasmā tampi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1531_1: Evaṃ dasakavasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna tadeva vassasataṃ pañcapañcavassavasena
anya-e0102n:1531_2: vīsatikoṭṭhāse katvā vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1531_4: “paṭhame vassapañcake pavattarūpaṃ dutiyaṃ vassapañcakaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1531_7: ekūnavīsatime vassapañcake pavattarūpaṃ vīsatimaṃ vassapañcakaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1531_8: Vīsatime vassapañcake pavattarūpaṃ maraṇato paraṃ gamanasamatthaṃ nāma natthi,
anya-e0102n:1532_0: Evaṃ vīsatikoṭṭhāsavasena vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna pañcavīsati koṭṭhāse katvā catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vassānaṃ vasena āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1532_1: Tato tettiṃsa koṭṭhāse katvā tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ vasena,
anya-e0102n:1532_2: paññāsa koṭṭhāse katvā dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ vassānaṃ vasena,
anya-e0102n:1532_4: Tato ekaṃ vassaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse katvā vassānahemantagimhesu tīsu utūsu ekekautuvasena tasmiṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1533_1: “Vassāne catumāsaṃ pavattarūpaṃ hemantaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1533_2: Hemante pavattarūpaṃ gimhaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1533_3: Gimhe pavattarūpaṃ puna vassānaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1533_5: Evaṃ āropetvā puna ekaṃ vassaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā –
anya-e0102n:1533_6: “vassāne dvemāsaṃ pavattarūpaṃ saradaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1533_11: Gimhe pavattarūpaṃ puna vassānaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1533_12: tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ tasmiṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1534_2: Juṇhe pavattarūpaṃ kāḷaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1534_6: Divasaṃ pavattarūpampi rattiṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1534_8: Tato tadeva rattindivaṃ pubbaṇhādivasena cha koṭṭhāse katvā –
anya-e0102n:1534_13: Majjhimayāme pavattarūpaṃ pacchimayāmaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1534_14: Pacchimayāme pavattarūpaṃ puna pubbaṇhaṃ appatvā tattheva niruddhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1535_6: Samiñjane pavattarūpaṃ pasāraṇaṃ appatvā tattheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1536_0: Tato ekapadavāraṃ uddharaṇa atiharaṇavītiharaṇavossajjanasannikkhepanasannirumbhanavasena cha koṭṭhāse karoti.
anya-e0102n:1537_0: Tattha uddharaṇaṃ nāma pādassa bhūmito ukkhipanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1537_2: Vītiharaṇaṃ nāma khāṇukaṇṭakadīghajātiādīsu kiñcideva disvā ito cito ca pādasañcāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1537_5: Sannirumbhanaṃ nāma puna pāduddharaṇakāle pādassa pathaviyā saddhiṃ abhinippīḷanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1537_6: Tattha uddharaṇe pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
anya-e0102n:1537_9: Vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
anya-e0102n:1537_12: Evaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā tesaṃ vasena tasmiṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1538_4: sabbe te dhammā atiharaṇaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhanti,
anya-e0102n:1538_9: Sannikkhepane pavattā sannirumbhanaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhanti.
anya-e0102n:1538_10: Iti tattha tattha uppannā itaraṃ itaraṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ appatvā tattha tattheva pabbaṃ pabbaṃ sandhi sandhi
anya-e0102n:1538_11: odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā viya taṭataṭāyantā saṅkhārā bhijjanti.
anya-e0102n:1538_13: Tassevaṃ pabbapabbagate saṅkhāre vipassato rūpasammasanaṃ sukhumaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1539_2: Eko kira dārutiṇukkādīsu kataparicayo adiṭṭhapubbapadīpo paccantavāsiko nagaramāgamma antarāpaṇe jalamānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1539_3: padīpaṃ disvā ekaṃ purisaṃ pucchi ambho “kiṃ nāmetaṃ evaṃ manāpa”nti?
anya-e0102n:1539_5: padīpo nāmesa telakkhayena vaṭṭikkhayena ca gatamaggopissa na paññāyissatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1539_7: imissā hi vaṭṭiyā anupubbena ḍayhamānāya tatiyabhāge tatiyabhāge jālā itarītaraṃ padesaṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1539_9: imissā hi aṅgulaṅgulantare aḍḍhaṅgulaḍḍhaṅgulantare tantumhi tantumhi aṃsumhi aṃsumhi jālā itarītaraṃ aṃsuṃ appatvāva nirujjhissati.
anya-e0102n:1539_10: Aṃsuṃ pana muñcitvā na sakkā jālaṃ paññāpetu”nti.
anya-e0102n:1540_0: Tattha “telakkhayena vaṭṭikkhayena ca padīpassa gatamaggopi na paññāyissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya yogino
anya-e0102n:1540_2: “Vaṭṭiyā tatiyabhāge tatiyabhāge jālā itarītaraṃ padesaṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya
anya-e0102n:1540_4: “Aṅgulaṅgulantare jālā itarītaraṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya yogino dasavassa pañcavassa
anya-e0102n:1540_5: catuvassa tivassa dvivassa ekavassa paricchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1540_6: “Aḍḍhaṅgulaḍḍhaṅgulantare jālā itarītaraṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya yogino ekekautuvasena ekaṃ vassaṃ tidhā,
anya-e0102n:1540_9: “Tantumhi tantumhi jālā itarītaraṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya yogino kāḷajuṇhavasena,
anya-e0102n:1540_11: ekarattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pubbaṇhādivasena ca paricchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1540_12: “Aṃsumhi aṃsumhi jālā itarītaraṃ appatvāva nirujjhissatī”ti purisassa ñāṇaṃ viya yogino abhikkamādivasena
anya-e0102n:1540_13: ceva uddharaṇādīsu ca ekekakoṭṭhāsavasena paricchinne rūpe tilakkhaṇāropananti.
anya-e0102n:1541_1: So evaṃ nānākārehi vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna tadeva rūpaṃ visaṅkharitvā āhāramayādivasena
anya-e0102n:1541_2: cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā ekekakoṭṭhāse tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1541_3: Tatrāssa āhāramayaṃ rūpaṃ chātasuhitavasena pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1541_4: Chātakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ hi jhattaṃ hoti kilantaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1541_6: aṅgārapacchiyaṃ nilīnakāko viya ca dubbaṇṇaṃ dussaṇṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1541_7: Suhitakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ dhātaṃ pīṇitaṃ mudu siniddhaṃ phassavantaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1541_8: So taṃ pariggahetvā “chātakāle pavattarūpaṃ suhitakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1541_9: Suhitakāle samuṭṭhitampi chātakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1541_10: tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1542_2: Uṇhakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ hi jhattaṃ hoti kilantaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1542_3: Sītautunā samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ dhātaṃ pīṇitaṃ siniddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1542_4: So taṃ pariggahetvā “uṇhakāle pavattarūpaṃ sītakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1542_5: Sītakāle pavattarūpaṃ uṇhakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1542_6: tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1543_3: upatthambhakāni pana tesaṃ utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānāni catuvīsatīti catupaṇṇāsa honti.
anya-e0102n:1543_5: Kāyadvāre kāyabhāvadasakavasena ceva utusamuṭṭhānādivasena ca catucattālīsa.
anya-e0102n:1543_6: Manodvāre hadayavatthukāyabhāvadasakavasena ceva utusamuṭṭhānādivasena ca catupaṇṇāsameva.
anya-e0102n:1544_0: So sabbampi taṃ rūpaṃ pariggahetvā “cakkhudvāre pavattarūpaṃ sotadvāraṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1544_4: Kāyadvāre pavattarūpaṃ manodvāraṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1544_5: tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1545_2: somanassitakāle uppannaṃ hi rūpaṃ siniddhaṃ mudu pīṇitaṃ phassavantaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1545_3: Domanassitakāle uppannaṃ jhattaṃ kilantaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1545_4: So taṃ pariggahetvā “somanassitakāle pavattarūpaṃ domanassitakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1545_5: Domanassitakāle pavattarūpaṃ somanassitakālaṃ appatvā ettheva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1545_6: tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti evaṃ tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1546_0: Tassevaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ pariggahetvā tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropayato ayamattho pākaṭo hoti –
anya-e0102n:1547_0: Jīvitaṃ attabhāvo ca, sukhadukkhā ca kevalā;
anya-e0102n:1549_0: Cullāsīti sahassāni, kappaṃ tiṭṭhanti ye marū;
anya-e0102n:1550_0: Na tveva tepi tiṭṭhanti, dvīhi cittehi samohitā.
anya-e0102n:1551_0: Ye niruddhā marantassa, tiṭṭhamānassa vā idha;
anya-e0102n:1553_0: Anantarā ca ye bhaggā, ye ca bhaggā anāgate;
anya-e0102n:1563_1: Evaṃ āhāramayādīsu tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā puna dhammatārūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.
anya-e0102n:1564_7: Tato nīlapaṇṇavaṇṇakālato paṭṭhāya sabhāgarūpasantatimanuppabandhāpayamānaṃ saṃvaccharamattena paṇḍupalāsaṃ hutvā vaṇṭato chijjitvā patati.
anya-e0102n:1565_0: So taṃ pariggahetvā “tanurattakāle pavattarūpaṃ ghanarattakālaṃ appatvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1565_7: Paṇḍupalāsakāle pavattaṃ vaṇṭato chijjitvā patanakālaṃ appatvāva nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n:1565_8: tasmā taṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropeti,
anya-e0102n:1565_9: evaṃ tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā iminā nayena sabbampi dhammatārūpaṃ sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1566_0: Evaṃ tāva rūpasattakavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1569_3: “ye ime ‘kesā aniccā dukkhā anattā’ti sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā,
anya-e0102n:1569_5: matthaluṅgaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā,
anya-e0102n:1569_6: sabbe te itarītaraṃ appatvā pabbaṃpabbaṃ odhiodhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā viya taṭataṭāyantā vinaṭṭhā,
anya-e0102n:1570_0: Ariyavaṃsakathāyaṃ pana “heṭṭhā rūpasattake sattasu ṭhānesu ‘rūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti pavattaṃ
anya-e0102n:1570_1: cittaṃ aparena cittena ‘aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti sammasanto ‘kalāpato sammasatī’ti” vuttaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1571_1: Yamakatoti idha bhikkhu ādānanikkheparūpaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasitvā tampi cittaṃ aparena cittena “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1571_5: dhammatārūpaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasitvā tampi cittaṃ aparena cittena “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasati.
anya-e0102n:1572_1: Khaṇikatoti idha bhikkhu ādānanikkheparūpaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasitvā taṃ paṭhamacittaṃ dutiyacittena,
anya-e0102n:1572_8: dhammatārūpaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasitvā taṃ paṭhamacittaṃ dutiyacittena,
anya-e0102n:1572_12: Evaṃ rūpapariggāhakacittato paṭṭhāya cattāri cattāri cittāni sammasanto khaṇikato sammasati nāma.

anya-e0102n:1640_1: Kusalo pana paṇḍito byatto buddhisampanno yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu uppannesu “ayaṃ kho me obhāso uppanno,
anya-e0102n:1640_2: so kho panāyaṃ anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo”ti iti vā taṃ paññāya paricchindati upaparikkhati.
anya-e0102n:1640_9: uppādavayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkho”ti sabbaṃ arūpasattake vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1641_6: Evaṃ samanupassanto obhāsādīsu na kampati na vedhati.
anya-e0102n:1643_0: Dhammuddhaccakusalo hoti, na ca vikkhepaṃ gacchatī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n:1644_0: So evaṃ vikkhepaṃ agacchanto taṃ samatiṃsavidhaṃ upakkilesajaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā obhāsādayo dhammā na maggo.
anya-e0102n:1644_1: Upakkilesavimuttaṃ pana vīthipaṭipannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggoti maggañca amaggañca vavatthapeti.
anya-e0102n:1644_3: ayaṃ na maggo”ti maggañca amaggañca ñatvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1645_0: Ettāvatā ca pana tena tiṇṇaṃ saccānaṃ vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0102n:1645_1: Diṭṭhivisuddhiyaṃ tāva nāmarūpassa vavatthāpanena dukkhasaccassa vavatthānaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0102n:1645_3: Imissaṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃ sammāmaggassa avadhāraṇena maggasaccassa vavatthānaṃ katanti,
anya-e0102n:1645_4: evaṃ lokiyeneva tāva ñāṇena tiṇṇaṃ saccānaṃ vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1652_1: Aṭṭhannaṃ pana ñāṇānaṃ vasena sikhāppattā vipassanā,
anya-e0102n:1652_12: Tasmā taṃ sampādetukāmena upakkilesavimuttaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā etesu ñāṇesu yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0102n:1653_3: Udayabbayañāṇaṃ hi heṭṭhā dasahi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ hutvā yāthāvasarasato tilakkhaṇaṃ sallakkhetuṃ nāsakkhi.
anya-e0102n:1654_1: Lakkhaṇāni pana kissa amanasikārā kena paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhahanti?
anya-e0102n:1654_2: Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ tāva udayabbayānaṃ amanasikārā santatiyā paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1654_3: Dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanassa amanasikārā iriyāpathehi paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1654_4: Anattalakkhaṇaṃ nānādhātuvinibbhogassa amanasikārā ghanena paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1654_5: Udayabbayampana pariggahetvā santatiyā vikopitāya aniccalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1654_6: Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṃ manasikatvā iriyāpathe ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1654_7: Nānādhātuyo vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhoge kate anattalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1655_8: Uppādavayaññathattaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ hutvā abhāvasaṅkhāto vā ākāravikāro.
anya-e0102n:1656_0: “Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato pana tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ dukkhaṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:1657_0: “Yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti pana vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ anattā. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:1658_0: Tayidaṃ sabbampi ayaṃ yogāvacaro upakkilesavimuttena vīthipaṭipannavipassanāsaṅkhātena udayabbayānupassanāñāṇena yāthāvasarasato sallakkheti.
anya-e0102n:1661_1: Tassevaṃ sallakkhetvā punappunaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti rūpārūpadhamme tulayato tīrayato taṃ ñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ hutvā vahati,
anya-e0102n:1661_3: ñāṇe tikkhe vahante saṅkhāresu lahuṃ upaṭṭhahantesu uppādaṃ vā ṭhitiṃ vā pavattaṃ vā nimittaṃ vā na sampāpuṇāti.
anya-e0102n:1661_5: Tassa “evaṃ uppajjitvā evaṃ nāma saṅkhāragataṃ nirujjhatī”ti passato etasmiṃ ṭhāne bhaṅgānupassanaṃ nāma vipassanāñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1662_2: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhā tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassati.
anya-e0102n:1672_0: Tayo upaṭṭhāne kusalatā, nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1673_2: tena vuccati ‘ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā bhaṅgānupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇa”’nti.
anya-e0102n:1674_1: Tattha ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhāti yaṃkiñci ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāya jānitvā,
anya-e0102n:1674_4: ārammaṇaṃ khayato vayato paṭisaṅkhāya uppannassa ñāṇassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassane yā paññā,
anya-e0102n:1674_6: Taṃ kathaṃ hotīti ayaṃ tāva kathetukamyatāpucchāya attho.
anya-e0102n:1675_0: Tattha rūpārammaṇatā cittaṃ uppajjitvā bhijjatīti rūpārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ uppajjitvā bhijjati.
anya-e0102n:1675_1: Atha vā rūpārammaṇabhāve cittaṃ uppajjitvā bhijjatīti attho.
anya-e0102n:1675_2: Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāti taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāya jānitvā,
anya-e0102n:1675_4: Tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassatīti yena cittena taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ khayato vayato diṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1675_5: tassa cittassa aparena cittena bhaṅgaṃ anupassatīti attho.
anya-e0102n:1676_0: Ettha ca anupassatīti anu anu passati,
anya-e0102n:1676_1: anekehi ākārehi punappunaṃ passatīti attho. Tenāha –
anya-e0102n:1677_0: Tattha yasmā bhaṅgo nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭi,
anya-e0102n:1677_1: tasmā so bhaṅgānupassako yogāvacaro sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccato anupassati,
anya-e0102n:1677_4: dukkhassa ca anattattā tadeva dukkhato anupassati,
anya-e0102n:1678_4: Tasmā etasmiṃ bhaṅgānupassanānusārena “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti diṭṭhe saṅkhāragate nibbindati,
anya-e0102n:1678_8: So evaṃ arajjanto lokikeneva tāva ñāṇena rāgaṃ nirodheti,
anya-e0102n:1679_0: Atha vā so evaṃ viratto yathā diṭṭhaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ,
anya-e0102n:1680_3: Ayampi aniccādianupassanā tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato,
anya-e0102n:1680_4: saṅkhatadosadassanena ca tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cāti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:1680_5: Tasmā tāya samannāgato bhikkhu yathāvuttena nayena kilese pariccajati,
anya-e0102n:1681_1: Idānissa tehi ñāṇehi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1681_2: taṃ dassetuṃ “aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1682_1: Gāthāsu pana vatthusaṅkamanāti rūpassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā puna yena cittena bhaṅgo diṭṭho,
anya-e0102n:1682_3: Paññāya ca vivaṭṭanāti udayaṃ pahāya vaye santiṭṭhanā.
anya-e0102n:1682_4: Āvajjanābalañcevāti rūpassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā puna bhaṅgārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgadassanatthaṃ anantarameva āvajjanasamatthatā.
anya-e0102n:1683_1: Ārammaṇaanvayena ubho ekavavatthanāti paccakkhato diṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa anvayena anugamanena yathā idaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1683_3: anāgatepi bhijjissatīti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ ekasabhāveneva vavatthāpananti attho.
anya-e0102n:1689_0: Nirodhe adhimuttatāti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ bhaṅgavasena ekavavatthānaṃ katvā tasmiññeva bhaṅgasaṅkhāte nirodhe
anya-e0102n:1689_1: adhimuttatā taggarutā tanninnatā tappoṇatā tappabbhāratāti attho.
anya-e0102n:1689_2: Vayalakkhaṇavipassanāti esā vayalakkhaṇavipassanā nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1690_2: Bhaṅgañca anupassatīti tassārammaṇassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā tadārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassati.
anya-e0102n:1690_3: Suññato ca upaṭṭhānanti tassevaṃ bhaṅgaṃ anupassato “saṅkhārāva bhijjanti,
anya-e0102n:1690_5: na añño koci atthī”ti suññato upaṭṭhānaṃ ijjhati.
anya-e0102n:1696_0: Adhipaññāvipassanāti yā ca ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā yā ca bhaṅgānupassanā yañca suññato upaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1697_1: Kusalo tīsu anupassanāsūti aniccānupassanādīsu tīsu cheko bhikkhu.
anya-e0102n:1697_2: Catasso ca vipassanāsūti nibbidādīsu ca catūsu vipassanāsu.
anya-e0102n:1697_3: Tayo upaṭṭhāne kusalatāti khayato vayato suññatoti imasmiñca tividhe upaṭṭhāne kusalatāya.
anya-e0102n:1697_4: Nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatīti sassatadiṭṭhiādīsu nānappakārāsu diṭṭhīsu na vedhati.
anya-e0102n:1698_2: abhinnameva bhijjatī”ti pavattamanasikāro dubbalabhājanassa viya bhijjamānassa,
anya-e0102n:1698_4: tilānaṃ viya bhajjiyamānānaṃ sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṭṭhitipavattanimittaṃ vissajjetvā bhedameva passati.
anya-e0102n:1698_5: So yathā nāma cakkhumā puriso pokkharaṇītīre vā nadītīre vā ṭhito thūlaphusitake deve vassante udakapiṭṭhe
anya-e0102n:1698_6: mahantamahantāni udakabubbuḷakāni uppajjitvā uppajjitvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bhijjamānāni passeyya,
anya-e0102n:1698_7: evameva sabbe saṅkhārā bhijjanti bhijjantīti passati.
anya-e0102n:1698_8: Evarūpaṃ hi yogāvacaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0102n:1700_0: Evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passatī”ti. ;
anya-e0102n:1701_1: Tassevaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā bhijjanti bhijjantī”ti abhiṇhaṃ passato aṭṭhānisaṃsaparivāraṃ bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ balappattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1709_1: Tassevaṃ sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ khayavayabhedanirodhārammaṇaṃ bhaṅgānupassanaṃ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa
anya-e0102n:1709_2: sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu pabhedakā saṅkhārā sukhena jīvitukāmassa bhīrukapurisassa sīhabyagghadīpiacchataracchayakkharakkhasacaṇḍagoṇacaṇḍakukkurapabhinnamadacaṇḍahatthighoraāsīvisaasanivicakkasusānaraṇabhūmijalitaaṅgārakāsuādayo
anya-e0102n:1709_6: anāgate nibbattanakasaṅkhārāpi evameva nirujjhissantī”ti passato etasmiṃ ṭhāne bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ nāma uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1710_1: ekissā kira itthiyā tayo puttā rājaparādhikā,
anya-e0102n:1710_4: Athassā jeṭṭhaputtassa sīsaṃ chinditvā majjhimassa chindituṃ ārabhiṃsu.
anya-e0102n:1710_5: Sā jeṭṭhassa sīsaṃ chinnaṃ majjhimassa ca chijjamānaṃ disvā kaniṭṭhamhi ālayaṃ vissajji “ayampi etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1710_6: Tattha tassā itthiyā jeṭṭhaputtassa chinnasīsadassanaṃ viya yogino atītasaṅkhārānaṃ nirodhadassanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1710_8: “ayampi etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī”ti kaniṭṭhaputtamhi ālayavissajjanaṃ viya “anāgatepi nibbattanakasaṅkhārā
anya-e0102n:1710_10: Tassevaṃ passato etasmiṃ ṭhāne uppajjati bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1711_1: ekā kira pūtipajā itthī dasa dārake vijāyi.
anya-e0102n:1711_5: Sā nava dārake mate dasamañca mīyamānaṃ disvā kucchigate ālayaṃ vissajji “ayampi etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1711_6: Tattha tassā itthiyā navannaṃ dārakānaṃ maraṇānussaraṇaṃ viya yogino atītasaṅkhārānaṃ nirodhadassanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1711_7: hatthagatassa mīyamānabhāvadassanaṃ viya yogino paccuppannānaṃ nirodhadassanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1711_9: Tassevaṃ passato etasmiṃ khaṇe uppajjati bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1712_6: Tasmā yathā nāma cakkhumā puriso nagaradvāre tisso aṅgārakāsuyo olokayamāno sayaṃ na bhāyati,
anya-e0102n:1712_9: Yathā vā pana cakkhumā puriso khadirasūlaṃ ayosūlaṃ suvaṇṇasūlanti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitaṃ sūlattayaṃ olokayamāno sayaṃ na bhāyati,
anya-e0102n:1712_10: kevalaṃ hissa “ye ye imesu sūlesu nipatissanti,
anya-e0102n:1712_14: sūlattayasadisesu ca tīsu bhavesu “atītā saṅkhārā niruddhā,
anya-e0102n:1712_17: Yasmā panassa kevalaṃ sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsagatā saṅkhārā byasanāpannā sappaṭibhayā hutvā bhayato upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0102n:1713_0: Evaṃ bhayato upaṭṭhāne panassa ayaṃ pāḷi –
anya-e0102n:1714_4: Anattato manasikaroto nimittañca pavattañca bhayato upaṭṭhātī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1715_2: Aniccato manasikaronto hi saṅkhārānaṃ maraṇameva passati,
anya-e0102n:1715_5: Dukkhato manasikaronto hi sukhasammatāyapi pavattiyā abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanabhāvameva passati,
anya-e0102n:1715_7: Anattato manasikaronto pana ubhayampetaṃ suññagāmaṃ viya marīcigandhabbanagarādīni viya ca rittaṃ tucchaṃ suññaṃ assāmikaṃ apariṇāyakaṃ passati.
anya-e0102n:1715_8: Tenassa nimittañca pavattañca ubhayaṃ bhayato upaṭṭhātīti.
anya-e0102n:1718_1: Tassa taṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu neva tāṇaṃ, na leṇaṃ, na gati,
anya-e0102n:1718_3: Sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsagatesu saṅkhāresu ekasaṅkhārepi patthanā vā parāmāso vā na hoti.
anya-e0102n:1718_10: nava ca sattāvāsā ekādasahi aggīhi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā viya ca,
anya-e0102n:1718_11: sabbe saṅkhārā gaṇḍabhūtā rogabhūtā sallabhūtā aghabhūtā ābādhabhūtā viya ca nirassādā nirasā mahāādīnavarāsibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0102n:1719_1: Sukhena jīvitukāmassa bhīrukapurisassa ramaṇīyākārasaṇṭhitampi savāḷakamiva vanagahanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1719_9: Yathā hi so puriso etāni savāḷakavanagahanādīni āgamma bhīto saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto samantato ādīnavameva passati,
anya-e0102n:1719_10: evamevāyaṃ yogāvacaro bhaṅgānupassanāvasena sabbasaṅkhāresu bhayato upaṭṭhitesu samantato nirasaṃ nirassādaṃ ādīnavameva passati.
anya-e0102n:1719_11: Tassevaṃ passato ādīnavañāṇaṃ nāma uppannaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1720_1: Uppādo bhayanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1720_15: upāyāso bhayanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1721_2: upāyāso dukkhanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1722_2: upāyāso sāmisanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1723_2: upāyāso saṅkhārāti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1730_0: Dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ kusalatā, nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1731_0: “Taṃ ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ. Pajānanaṭṭhena paññā. Tena vuccati “bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n:1732_6: Gatīti yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti.
anya-e0102n:1732_8: Upapattīti “samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā”ti evaṃ vuttā vipākappavatti.
anya-e0102n:1732_11: Ettha ca uppādādayo pañceva ādīnavañāṇassa vatthuvasena vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1732_13: Nibbatti jātīti idañhi dvayaṃ uppādassa ceva paṭisandhiyā ca vevacanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1734_0: Āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ, ñāṇaṃ ādīnave ida”nti ca.
anya-e0102n:1736_0: Anuppādo khemanti santipade ñāṇantiādi pana ādīnavañāṇassa paṭipakkhañāṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1736_1: Bhayatupaṭṭhānena vā ādīnavaṃ disvā ubbiggahadayānaṃ abhayampi atthi khemaṃ nirādīnavanti assāsajananatthampi etaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1736_2: Yasmā vā panassa uppādādayo bhayato sūpaṭṭhitā honti,
anya-e0102n:1736_4: tasmā bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena siddhassa ādīnavañāṇassa ānisaṃsadassanatthampetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1737_5: Tasmā “uppādo dukkhanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1737_6: Evaṃ santepi bhayākārena dukkhākārena sāmisākārenāti evaṃ ākāranānattato pavattivasenevettha nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1738_0: Dasañāṇe pajānātīti ādīnavañāṇaṃ pajānanto uppādādivatthukāni pañca,
anya-e0102n:1738_1: anuppādādivatthukāni pañcāti dasa ñāṇāni pajānāti paṭivijjhati sacchikaroti.
anya-e0102n:1738_2: Dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ kusalatāti ādīnavañāṇassa ceva santipadañāṇassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ kusalatāya.
anya-e0102n:1738_3: Nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatīti paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānādivasena pavattāsu diṭṭhīsu na vedhati.
anya-e0102n:1741_1: So evaṃ sabbasaṅkhāre ādīnavato passanto sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsagate sabhedake saṅkhāragate nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati nābhiramati.
