anya-e0102n:1814_1: ayaṃ arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma.
anya-e0102n:1814_2: Esa nayo arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā ca rūpā ca vuṭṭhānepi.
anya-e0102n:1815_2: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti evaṃ abhinivisitvā evameva vuṭṭhānakāle pana ekappahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti nāma.
anya-e0102n:1816_2: Yasmā pana na aniccato sammasanamatteneva vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1816_5: Tassevaṃ paṭipannassa aniccato sammasanakāle vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1816_6: ayaṃ aniccato abhinivisitvā aniccato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
anya-e0102n:1817_0: Sace panassa dukkhato anattato sammasanakāle vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1817_3: Esa nayo dukkhato anattato abhinivisitvā sesavuṭṭhānesupi.
anya-e0102n:1819_1: Idāni saddhiṃ purimapacchimañāṇehi imissā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya āvibhāvatthaṃ dvādasa upamā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1820_0: “Vaggulī kaṇhasappo ca, gharaṃ go yakkhi dārako;
anya-e0102n:1821_0: Khuddaṃ pipāsaṃ sītuṇhaṃ, andhakāraṃ visena cā”ti.
anya-e0102n:1822_0: Imā ca upamā bhayatupaṭṭhānato pabhuti yattha katthaci ñāṇe ṭhatvā āharituṃ vaṭṭeyyuṃ.
anya-e0102n:1822_1: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne āhariyamānāsu bhayatupaṭṭhānato yāva phalañāṇaṃ sabbaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1823_1: Vaggulīti ekā kira vaggulī “ettha pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā labhissāmī”ti pañcasākhe madhukarukkhe nilīyitvā
anya-e0102n:1823_2: ekaṃ sākhaṃ parāmasitvā na tattha kiñci pupphaṃ phalaṃ vā gayhupagaṃ addasa.
anya-e0102n:1823_8: natthettha kiñci gayhupaga”nti tasmiṃ rukkhe ālayaṃ vissajjetvā ujukāya sākhāya āruyha viṭapantarena
anya-e0102n:1823_9: sīsaṃ nīharitvā uddhaṃ ulloketvā ākāse uppatitvā aññasmiṃ phalarukkhe nilīyati.
anya-e0102n:1824_2: tattha vagguliyā nilīyanaṃ viya yogino khandhapañcake abhiniveso,
anya-e0102n:1824_3: tassā ekekaṃ sākhaṃ parāmasitvā kiñci gayhupagaṃ adisvā avasesasākhāparāmasanaṃ viya yogino rūpakkhandhaṃ
anya-e0102n:1824_4: sammasitvā tattha kiñci gayhupagaṃ adisvā avasesakkhandhasammasanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1824_5: tassā “aphalo vatāyaṃ rukkho”ti rukkhe ālayavissajjanaṃ viya yogino pañcasupi khandhesu aniccalakkhaṇādidassanavasena
anya-e0102n:1824_7: tassā ujukāya sākhāya upari ārohanaṃ viya yogino anulomaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1824_8: sīsaṃ nīharitvā uddhaṃ ullokanaṃ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1825_3: muñcitvā āgatamaggaṃ olokentassa ṭhānaṃ viya maggañāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1825_4: gantvā abhayaṭṭhāne ṭhānaṃ viya phalañāṇanti ayaṃ viseso.
anya-e0102n:1826_1: Gharanti gharasāmike kira sāyaṃ bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ āruyha niddaṃ okkante gharaṃ ādittaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1826_2: so pabujjhitvā aggiṃ disvā “bhīto sādhu vatassa sace aḍayhamāno nikkhameyya”nti olokayamāno maggaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā vegena khemaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ṭhito.
anya-e0102n:1826_3: Tattha gharasāmikassa bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ āruyha niddokkamanaṃ viya bālaputhujjanassa khandhapañcake “ahaṃ mamā”ti gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1826_4: Pabujjhitvā aggiṃ disvā bhītakālo viya sammāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjitvā lakkhaṇaṃ disvā bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1827_1: Goti ekassa kira kassakassa rattibhāge niddaṃ okkantassa vajaṃ bhinditvā goṇā palātā,
anya-e0102n:1827_2: so paccūsasamaye tattha gantvā olokento tesaṃ palātabhāvaṃ ñatvā anupadaṃ gantvā rañño goṇe addasa.
anya-e0102n:1827_3: Te “mayhaṃ goṇā”ti sallakkhetvā āharanto pabhātakāle “na ime mayhaṃ goṇā,
anya-e0102n:1827_4: rañño goṇā”ti sañjānitvā “yāva maṃ ‘coro aya’nti gahetvā rājapurisā na anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti,
anya-e0102n:1827_5: tāvadeva palāyissāmī”ti bhīto goṇe pahāya vegena palāyitvā nibbhayaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n:1827_6: Tattha “mayhaṃ goṇā”ti rājagoṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ viya bālaputhujjanassa “ahaṃ mamā”ti khandhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1827_7: pabhāte “rājagoṇā”ti sañjānanaṃ viya yogino tilakkhaṇavasena khandhānaṃ “aniccā dukkhā anattā”ti sañjānanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1828_1: Yakkhīti eko kira puriso yakkhiniyā saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappesi,
anya-e0102n:1828_2: sā rattibhāge “sutto aya”nti mantvā āmakasusānaṃ gantvā manussamaṃsaṃ khādati.
anya-e0102n:1828_3: So “kuhiṃ esā gacchatī”ti anubandhitvā manussamaṃsaṃ khādamānaṃ disvā tassā amanussibhāvaṃ ñatvā “yāva maṃ na khādati,
anya-e0102n:1828_4: tāva palāyissāmī”ti bhīto vegena palāyitvā khemaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n:1828_5: Tattha yakkhiniyā saddhiṃ saṃvāso viya khandhānaṃ “ahaṃ mamā”ti gahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1828_6: susāne manussamaṃsaṃ khādamānaṃ disvā “yakkhinī aya”nti jānanaṃ viya khandhānaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ disvā aniccādibhāvajānanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1829_2: sā uparipāsāde nisinnāva antaravīthiyaṃ dārakasaddaṃ sutvā “putto nu kho me kenaci viheṭhiyatī”ti vegasā
anya-e0102n:1829_4: Sā “paraputto aya”nti sañjānitvā ottappamānā ito cito ca oloketvā “mā heva maṃ koci ‘dārakacorī aya’nti
anya-e0102n:1829_5: vadeyyā”ti dārakaṃ tattheva oropetvā puna vegasā pāsādaṃ āruyha nisīdi.
anya-e0102n:1829_6: Tattha attano puttasaññāya paraputtassa gahaṇaṃ viya “ahaṃ mamā”ti pañcakkhandhagahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1829_10: ito cito ca olokanaṃ viya muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1830_2: andhakāraṃ visena cāti imā pana cha upamā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya ṭhitassa lokuttaradhammābhimukhaninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1830_3: Yathā hi khuddāya abhibhūto sujighacchito puriso sādurasaṃ bhojanaṃ pattheti,
anya-e0102n:1830_4: evamevāyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭajighacchāya phuṭṭho yogāvacaro amatarasaṃ kāyagatāsatibhojanaṃ pattheti.
anya-e0102n:1831_0: Yathā ca pipāsito puriso parisussamānakaṇṭhamukho anekaṅgasambhāraṃ pānakaṃ pattheti,
anya-e0102n:1831_1: evamevāyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭapipāsāya phuṭṭho yogāvacaro ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggapānakaṃ pattheti.
anya-e0102n:1832_0: Yathā pana sītasamphuṭṭho puriso uṇhaṃ pattheti,
anya-e0102n:1832_1: evamevāyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe taṇhāsinehasītena phuṭṭho yogāvacaro kilesasantāpakaṃ maggatejaṃ pattheti.
anya-e0102n:1833_0: Yathā ca uṇhasamphuṭṭho puriso sītaṃ pattheti,
anya-e0102n:1833_1: evamevāyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe ekādasaggisantāpasantatto yogāvacaro ekādasaggivūpasamaṃ nibbānaṃ pattheti.
anya-e0102n:1834_0: Yathā pana andhakārapareto puriso ālokaṃ pattheti,
anya-e0102n:1834_1: evamevāyaṃ avijjandhakārena onaddhapariyonaddho yogāvacaro ñāṇālokaṃ maggabhāvanaṃ pattheti.
anya-e0102n:1835_0: Yathā ca visasamphuṭṭho puriso visaghātanaṃ bhesajjaṃ pattheti,
anya-e0102n:1835_1: evamevāyaṃ kilesavisasamphuṭṭho yogāvacaro kilesavisanimmathanaṃ amatosadhaṃ nibbānaṃ pattheti.
anya-e0102n:1835_4: navasu sattāvāsesu cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati.
anya-e0102n:1835_6: Seyyathāpi nāma padumapalāse īsakapoṇe”ti sabbaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1836_0: 797. Ettāvatā ca panesa patilīnacaro nāma hoti, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
anya-e0102n:1841_0: Evamidaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ yogino patilīnacarabhāvaṃ niyametvā uttari ariyamaggassāpi bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgapaṭipadāvimokkhavisesaṃ niyameti.
anya-e0102n:1841_1: Keci hi therā bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgānaṃ visesaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ niyametīti vadanti.
anya-e0102n:1841_2: Keci vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamentīti vadanti.
anya-e0102n:1841_4: Tesampi vādesu ayaṃ pubbabhāgavuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāva niyametīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1842_4: paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā uppāditamaggopi paṭhamajjhānikāva honti.
anya-e0102n:1842_5: Sabbesu satta bojjhaṅgāni aṭṭha maggaṅgāni pañca jhānaṅgāni honti.
anya-e0102n:1842_6: Tesaṃ hi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hutvā vuṭṭhānakāle saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ patvā somanassasahagatā hoti.
anya-e0102n:1842_7: Pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggesu yathākkameneva jhānaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikañca hoti.
anya-e0102n:1842_10: Ayaṃ viseso pādakajjhānaniyamena ceva vipassanāniyamena ca hoti.
anya-e0102n:1842_11: Tesampi hi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hoti.
anya-e0102n:1842_13: Pañcamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā nibbattitamagge pana upekkhācittekaggatāvasena dve jhānaṅgāni bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgāni cha satta ceva.
anya-e0102n:1842_15: Imasmiṃ hi naye pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatā vā upekkhāsahagatā vā hoti.
anya-e0102n:1842_17: Arūpajjhānāni pādakaṃ katvā uppāditamaggepi eseva nayo.
anya-e0102n:1842_18: Evaṃ pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya yekeci saṅkhāre sammasitvā nibbattitamaggassa āsannapadese vuṭṭhitasamāpatti
anya-e0102n:1842_19: attano sadisabhāvaṃ karoti bhūmivaṇṇo viya godhāvaṇṇassa.
anya-e0102n:1843_1: Dutiyattheravāde pana yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ye ye samāpattidhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito hoti,
anya-e0102n:1844_1: Tatiyattheravāde attano attano ajjhāsayānurūpena yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ye ye jhānadhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito,
anya-e0102n:1844_3: Pādakajjhānaṃ pana sammasitajjhānaṃ vā vinā ajjhāsayamatteneva taṃ na ijjhati.
anya-e0102n:1844_6: Evaṃ tāva saṅkhārupekkhā bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgāni niyametīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1845_1: Sace panāyaṃ ādito kilese vikkhambhayamānā dukkhena sappayogena sasaṅkhārena vikkhambhetuṃ asakkhi,
anya-e0102n:1845_4: Kilese pana vikkhambhetvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ maggapātubhāvaṃ saṇikaṃ kurumānā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n:1845_6: Iti ayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano attano maggassa nāmaṃ deti.
anya-e0102n:1846_0: Sā panāyaṃ paṭipadā kassaci bhikkhuno nānā hoti,
anya-e0102n:1846_2: Buddhānaṃ pana cattāropi maggā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññāva ahesuṃ.
anya-e0102n:1846_4: Mahāmoggallānattherassa pana paṭhamamaggo sukhāpaṭipado khippābhiñño ahosi.
anya-e0102n:1846_7: evaṃ adhipatayopi kassaci bhikkhuno catūsu maggesu nānā honti.
anya-e0102n:1847_1: Apica maggo nāma pañcahi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati sarasena vā paccanīkena vā saguṇena vā ārammaṇena vā āgamanena vā.
anya-e0102n:1847_2: Sace hi saṅkhārupekkhā aniccato saṅkhāre sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:1848_0: Yasmā panesa aniccānupassanāya saṅkhārānaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā niccanimittadhuvanimittasassatanimittāni pajahanto āgato,
anya-e0102n:1848_2: Dukkhānupassanāya pana sukhasaññaṃ pahāya paṇidhiṃ patthanaṃ sukkhāpetvā āgatattā appaṇihito.
anya-e0102n:1848_3: Anattānupassanāya attasattapuggalasaññaṃ pahāya saṅkhārānaṃ suññato diṭṭhattā suññatoti idaṃ paccanīkato nāmaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:1849_2: rāgapaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvato appaṇihitoti idamassa saguṇato nāmaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1850_0: Svāyaṃ suññaṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitañca nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotītipi suññato animitto appaṇihitoti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:1851_8: Idaṃ pana nāmaṃ na abhidhammapariyāyena labbhati,
anya-e0102n:1851_10: Tatra hi gotrabhuñāṇaṃ animittaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā animittanāmakaṃ hutvā sayaṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā maggassa nāmaṃ detīti vadanti.
anya-e0102n:1851_13: Dukkhānupassanā saṅkhāresu paṇidhiṃ sukkhāpetvā āgatattā appaṇihitā nāma,
anya-e0102n:1851_16: Evaṃ vipassanā attano nāmaṃ maggassa deti,
anya-e0102n:1854_1: Tassa taṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa adhimokkhasaddhā balavatarā nibbattati,
anya-e0102n:1854_6: Tassa “dāni maggo uppajjissatī”ti saṅkhārupekkhā saṅkhāre aniccāti vā dukkhāti vā anattāti vā sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati.
anya-e0102n:1854_7: Bhavaṅgānantaraṃ saṅkhārupekkhāya katanayeneva saṅkhāre aniccāti vā dukkhāti vā anattāti vā ārammaṇaṃ kurumānaṃ uppajjati manodvārāvajjanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1854_8: Tato bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetvā uppannassa tassa kiriyacittassānantaraṃ avīcikaṃ cittasantatiṃ anuppabandhamānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1854_9: tatheva saṅkhāre ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati paṭhamaṃ javanacittaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1854_11: Tadanantaraṃ tatheva saṅkhāre ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati dutiyaṃ javanacittaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1854_13: Tadanantarampi tatheva saṅkhāre ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati tatiyaṃ javanacittaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1855_0: Avisesena pana tividhampetaṃ āsevanantipi parikammantipi upacārantipi anulomantipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0102n:1855_3: Tañhi purimānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ vipassanāñāṇānaṃ tathakiccatāya ca anulometi,
anya-e0102n:1855_6: “udayabbayavantānaṃyeva vata dhammānaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ uppādavaye addasā”ti ca,
anya-e0102n:1855_13: “upekkhitabbaṃyeva vata saṅkhārupekkhāya upekkhita”nti ca atthato vadamānaṃ viya imesañca aṭṭhannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ tathakiccatāya anulometi,
anya-e0102n:1855_14: upari ca sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ tāya paṭipattiyā pattabbattā.
anya-e0102n:1856_0: Yathā hi dhammiko rājā vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisinno vohārikamahāmattānaṃ vinicchayaṃ sutvā agatigamanaṃ pahāya
anya-e0102n:1856_1: majjhatto hutvā “evaṃ hotū”ti anumodamāno tesañca vinicchayassa anulometi,
anya-e0102n:1856_7: Tattha yathā rājā “evaṃ hotū”ti vadamāno vohārikānañca vinicchayassa,
anya-e0102n:1856_9: evamidaṃ aniccādivasena saṅkhāre ārabbha uppajjamānaṃ aṭṭhannañca ñāṇānaṃ tathakiccatāya anulometi,
anya-e0102n:1859_1: Idañca pana anulomañāṇaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇāya vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya pariyosānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1859_2: Sabbena sabbaṃ pana gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya pariyosānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1859_3: Idāni tassāyeva vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya asammohatthaṃ ayaṃ suttasaṃsandanā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n:1861_2: nissāya atammayataṃ āgamma yāyaṃ upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā,
anya-e0102n:1861_3: taṃ pajahatha taṃ samatikkamathā”ti evaṃ atammayatāti vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1862_0: Alagaddasuttante “nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā vimuccatī”ti evaṃ nibbidāti vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1863_2: pacchā nibbāne ñāṇa”nti evaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1866_0: Paṭisambhidāmagge “yā ca muñcitukamyatā yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā,
anya-e0102n:1866_1: ime dhammā ekatthā byañjanameva nāna”nti evaṃ tīhi nāmehi vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1867_0: Paṭṭhāne “anulomaṃ gotrabhussa, anulomaṃ vodānassā”ti evaṃ tīhi nāmehi vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1868_1: paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti evaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīti vuttā.
anya-e0102n:1879_2: taṃ maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāniyattā neva paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ na ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ bhajati,
anya-e0102n:1879_4: Vipassanāsote patitattā pana vipassanāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0102n:1879_5: Sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo arahattamaggoti imesu pana catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n:1880_0: Tattha paṭhamamaggañāṇaṃ tāva sampādetukāmena aññaṃ kiñci kātabbaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n:1880_3: Evaṃ uppannaanulomañāṇassa panassa tehi tīhipi anulomañāṇehi attano balānurūpena thūlathūle saccapaṭicchādake
anya-e0102n:1880_4: tamamhi antaradhāpite sabbasaṅkhāragatesu cittaṃ na pakkhandati,
anya-e0102n:1880_10: Padumapalāsato udakaṃ viya patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati.
anya-e0102n:1880_11: Sabbaṃ nimittārammaṇampi sabbaṃ pavattārammaṇampi palibodhato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1880_12: Athassa sabbasmiṃ nimittapavattārammaṇe palibodhato upaṭṭhite anulomañāṇassa āsevanante animittaṃ appavattaṃ
anya-e0102n:1880_13: visaṅkhāraṃ nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kurumānaṃ puthujjanagottaṃ puthujjanasaṅkhaṃ puthujjanabhūmiṃ
anya-e0102n:1880_14: atikkamamānaṃ ariyagottaṃ ariyasaṅkhaṃ ariyabhūmiṃ okkamamānaṃ nibbānārammaṇe paṭhamāvaṭṭanapaṭhamābhogapaṭhamasamannāhārabhūtaṃ
anya-e0102n:1880_16: sikhāppattaṃ vipassanāya muddhabhūtaṃ apunarāvaṭṭakaṃ uppajjati gotrabhuñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1882_8: Uppādaṃ abhibhuyyitvā anuppādaṃ pakkhandatīti gotrabhū”ti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1883_1: Tatrāyaṃ ekāvajjanena ekavīthiyaṃ pavattamānānampi anulomagotrabhūnaṃ nānārammaṇe pavattanākāradīpikā upamā –
anya-e0102n:1883_2: yathā hi mahāmātikaṃ laṅghitvā paratīre patiṭṭhātukāmo puriso vegena dhāvitvā mātikāya orimatīre rukkhasākhāya
anya-e0102n:1883_3: bandhitvā olambitaṃ rajjuṃ vā yaṭṭhiṃ vā gahetvā ullaṅghitvā paratīraninnapoṇapabbhārakāyo hutvā paratīrassa
anya-e0102n:1883_4: uparibhāgaṃ patto taṃ muñcitvā vedhamāno paratīre patitvā saṇikaṃ patiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:1883_5: evamevāyaṃ yogāvacaropi bhavayonigatiṭṭhitinivāsānaṃ paratīrabhūte nibbāne patiṭṭhātukāmo udayabbayānupassanādinā
anya-e0102n:1883_6: vegena dhāvitvā attabhāvarukkhasākhāya bandhitvā olambitaṃ rūparajjuṃ vā vedanādīsu aññataradaṇḍaṃ vā
anya-e0102n:1883_7: aniccanti vā dukkhanti vā anattāti vāti anulomāvajjanena gahetvā taṃ amuñcamānova paṭhamena anulomacittena
anya-e0102n:1883_8: ullaṅghitvā dutiyena paratīraninnapoṇapabbhārakāyo viya nibbānaninnapoṇapabbhāramānaso hutvā tatiyena
anya-e0102n:1883_9: paratīrassa uparibhāgaṃ patto viya idāni pattabbassa nibbānassa āsanno hutvā tassa cittassa nirodhena
anya-e0102n:1883_10: taṃ saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ muñcitvā gotrabhucittena visaṅkhāre paratīrabhūte nibbāne patati.
anya-e0102n:1883_11: Ekārammaṇe pana aladdhāsevanatāya vedhamāno so puriso viya na tāva suppatiṭṭhito hoti,
anya-e0102n:1884_1: Tattha anulomaṃ saccapaṭicchādakaṃ kilesatamaṃ vinodetuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:1884_6: eko kira cakkhumā puriso “nakkhattayogaṃ jānissāmī”ti rattibhāge nikkhamitvā candaṃ passituṃ uddhaṃ ullokesi,
anya-e0102n:1884_7: tassa valāhakehi paṭicchannattā cando na paññāyittha.
anya-e0102n:1884_8: Atheko vāto uṭṭhahitvā thūlathūle valāhake viddhaṃseti.
anya-e0102n:1884_11: Tato so puriso vigatavalāhake nabhe candaṃ disvā nakkhattayogaṃ aññāsi.
anya-e0102n:1885_0: Tattha tayo valāhakā viya saccapaṭicchādakathūlamajjhimasukhumaṃ kilesandhakāraṃ,
anya-e0102n:1885_4: ekekassa vātassa yathākkamena valāhakaviddhaṃsanaṃ viya ekekassa anulomacittassa saccapaṭicchādakatamavinodanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1885_5: vigatavalāhake nabhe tassa purisassa visuddhacandadassanaṃ viya vigate saccapaṭicchādake tame gotrabhuñāṇassa visuddhanibbānadassanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1886_0: Yatheva hi tayo vātā candapaṭicchādake valāhakeyeva viddhaṃsetuṃ sakkonti,
anya-e0102n:1886_2: evaṃ anulomāni saccapaṭicchādakaṃ tamaññeva vinodetuṃ sakkonti,
anya-e0102n:1886_4: Yathā so puriso candameva daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:1886_9: Tañhi anāvajjanampi samānaṃ āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā “evaṃ nibbattāhī”ti maggassa saññaṃ datvā viya nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n:1886_10: Maggopi tena dinnasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva avīcisantativasena taṃ ñāṇaṃ anuppabandhamāno anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ
anya-e0102n:1886_11: lobhakkhandhaṃ dosakkhandhaṃ mohakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhamānova padālayamānova nibbattati.
anya-e0102n:1887_2: eko kira issāso aṭṭhausabhamatte padese phalakasataṃ ṭhapāpetvā vatthena mukhaṃ veṭhetvā saraṃ sannahitvā cakkayante aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n:1887_3: Añño puriso cakkayantaṃ āvijjhitvā yadā issāsassa phalakaṃ abhimukhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1887_5: Issāso daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva saraṃ khipitvā phalakasataṃ nibbijjhati.
anya-e0102n:1887_8: Issāsassa daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva phalakasatanibbijjhanaṃ viya maggañāṇassa gotrabhuñāṇena dinnasaññaṃ
anya-e0102n:1887_9: amuñcitvāva nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā anibbiddhapubbānaṃ apadālitapubbānaṃ lobhadosamohakkhandhānaṃ nibbijjhanapadālanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1888_1: Na kevalañcesa maggo lobhakkhandhādīnaṃ nibbijjhanameva karoti,
anya-e0102n:1888_8: aññesañca anekasatānaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ paṭilābhāya saṃvattatīti evaṃ anekānisaṃsadāyakena sotāpattimaggena sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ sotāpattimagge ñāṇanti.
anya-e0102n:1891_1: Imassa pana ñāṇassa anantaraṃ tasseva vipākabhūtāni dve tīṇi vā phalacittāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n:1891_2: Anantaravipākattāyeva hi lokuttarakusalānaṃ “samādhimānantarikaññamāhū”ti ca “dandhaṃ ānantarikaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāyā”ti ca ādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1891_3: Keci pana ekaṃ dve tīṇi cattāri vā phalacittānīti vadanti,
anya-e0102n:1892_1: Tasmā sabbantimena paricchedena dvīhi anulomacittehi bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1892_5: tassa tatiyaṃ gotrabhu catutthaṃ maggacittaṃ tīṇi phalacittāni honti.
anya-e0102n:1892_7: tassa catutthaṃ gotrabhu pañcamaṃ maggacittaṃ dve phalacittāni honti.
anya-e0102n:1892_8: Tena vuttaṃ “dve tīṇi vā phalacittāni uppajjantī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1893_1: tassa pañcamaṃ gotrabhu chaṭṭhaṃ maggacittaṃ ekaṃ phalacittanti vadanti,
anya-e0102n:1893_2: taṃ pana yasmā catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vā appeti,
anya-e0102n:1894_1: Ettāvatā ca panesa sotāpanno nāma dutiyo ariyapuggalo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1894_2: Bhusaṃ pamattopi hutvā sattakkhattuṃ devesu ca manussesu ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantassa karaṇasamattho hoti.
anya-e0102n:1894_4: tato bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā maggapaccavekkhaṇatthāya uppajjati manodvārāvajjanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1894_6: Puna bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā teneva nayena phalādīnaṃ paccavekkhaṇatthāya āvajjanādīni uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n:1895_0: So hi “iminā vatāhaṃ maggena āgato”ti maggaṃ paccavekkhati,
anya-e0102n:1895_1: tato “ayaṃ me ānisaṃso laddho”ti phalaṃ paccavekkhati.
anya-e0102n:1895_2: Tato “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīnakilese paccavekkhati.
anya-e0102n:1895_3: Tato “ime nāma me kilesā avasiṭṭhā”ti uparimaggattayavajjhe kilese paccavekkhati.
anya-e0102n:1895_4: Avasāne ca “ayaṃ me dhammo ārammaṇato paṭividdho”ti amataṃ nibbānaṃ paccavekkhati.
anya-e0102n:1895_5: Iti sotāpannassa ariyasāvakassa pañca paccavekkhaṇāni honti.
anya-e0102n:1896_1: Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇañhi sekkhānampi hoti vā na vā.
anya-e0102n:1896_2: Tassa hi paccavekkhaṇassa abhāveneva mahānāmo bhagavantaṃ pucchi “kosu nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīno,
anya-e0102n:1896_3: yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”ti sabbaṃ vitthārato veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1898_1: Evaṃ paccavekkhitvā pana so sotāpanno ariyasāvako tasmiññeva vā āsane nisinno,
anya-e0102n:1898_2: aparena vā samayena kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvāya dutiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyā yogaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:1898_3: So indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā tadeva rūpavedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇabhedaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti ñāṇena parimaddati,
anya-e0102n:1898_6: Tassevaṃ paṭipannassa vuttanayeneva saṅkhārupekkhāvasāne ekāvajjanena anulomagotrabhuñāṇesu uppannesu gotrabhuanantaraṃ sakadāgāmimaggo uppajjati.
anya-e0102n:1901_1: Imassāpi ñāṇassa anantaraṃ vuttanayeneva phalacittāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:1901_2: Ettāvatā cesa sakadāgāmī nāma catuttho ariyapuggalo hoti sakiṃdeva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantakaraṇasamattho.
anya-e0102n:1902_0: Evaṃ paccavekkhitvā ca so sakadāgāmī ariyasāvako tasmiññeva vā āsane nisinno aparena vā samayena kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ
anya-e0102n:1902_1: anavasesappahānāya tatiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyā yogaṃ karoti,
anya-e0102n:1902_2: so indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā tadeva saṅkhāragataṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti ñāṇena parimaddati,
anya-e0102n:1902_5: Tassevaṃ paṭipannassa vuttanayeneva saṅkhārupekkhāvasāne ekāvajjanena anulomagotrabhuñāṇesu uppannesu gotrabhuanantaraṃ anāgāmimaggo uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:1905_1: Imassapi ñāṇassa anantaraṃ vuttanayeneva phalacittāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:1905_2: Ettāvatā cesa anāgāmī nāma chaṭṭho ariyapuggalo hoti opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī anāvattidhammo paṭisandhivasena imaṃ lokaṃ puna anāgantā.
anya-e0102n:1906_0: Evaṃ paccavekkhitvā ca so anāgāmī ariyasāvako tasmiññeva vā āsane nisinno,
anya-e0102n:1906_1: aparena vā samayena rūpārūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjānaṃ anavasesappahānāya catutthāya bhūmiyā pattiyā yogaṃ karoti,
anya-e0102n:1906_2: so indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā tadeva saṅkhāragataṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti ñāṇena parimaddati,
anya-e0102n:1906_5: Tassevaṃ paṭipannassa vuttanayeneva saṅkhārupekkhāvasāne ekāvajjanena anulomagotrabhuñāṇesu uppannesu gotrabhuanantaraṃ arahattamaggo uppajjati,
anya-e0102n:1909_1: Imassapi ñāṇassa anantaraṃ vuttanayeneva phalacittāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n:1909_2: Ettāvatā cesa arahā nāma aṭṭhamo ariyapuggalo hoti mahākhīṇāsavo antimadehadhārī ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho
anya-e0102n:1909_3: parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammādaññā vimutto sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyoti.
anya-e0102n:1910_0: Iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ “sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo arahattamaggoti imesu pana catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāmā”ti,
anya-e0102n:1910_1: taṃ imāni iminā anukkamena pattabbāni cattāri ñāṇāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1914_0: Ye yena pahātabbā, dhammā tesaṃ pahānañca.
anya-e0102n:1917_9: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti hi ime sattatiṃsa dhammā bujjhanaṭṭhena bodhoti laddhanāmassa ariyamaggassa pakkhe bhavattā bodhipakkhiyā nāma.
anya-e0102n:1918_1: Tesu tesu ārammaṇesu okkhanditvā pakkhanditvā upaṭṭhānato paṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1918_5: saññāpahānakiccasādhanavasena ca pavattito catudhā bhedo hoti.
anya-e0102n:1919_4: Sobhanaṃ vā taṃ kilesavirūpattavirahato padhānañca hitasukhanipphādakattena seṭṭhabhāvāvahanato padhānabhāvakāraṇato cāti sammappadhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1919_6: Tayidaṃ uppannānuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ pahānānuppattikiccaṃ anuppannuppannānañca kusalānaṃ uppattiṭṭhitikiccaṃ sādhayatīti catubbidhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:1920_2: Tassā sampayuttāya pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena phalabhūtāya pubbabhāgakāraṇaṭṭhena ca iddhiyā pādoti iddhipādo.
anya-e0102n:1920_7: Lokiyā pana “chandañce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ,
anya-e0102n:1920_9: Ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhī”tiādivacanato chandādiadhipativasena paṭiladdhadhammāpi honti.
anya-e0102n:1922_1: Bujjhanakasattassa pana aṅgabhāvena satiādayo satta bojjhaṅgā.
anya-e0102n:1922_2: Niyyānikaṭṭhena ca sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha maggaṅgā honti.
anya-e0102n:1922_3: Tena vuttaṃ “satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti.
anya-e0102n:1923_1: Iti ime sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā pubbabhāge lokiyavipassanāya vattamānāya cuddasavidhena kāyaṃ pariggaṇhato ca kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1923_5: Imasmiṃ attabhāve anuppannapubbaṃ parassa uppannaṃ akusalaṃ disvā “yathā paṭipannassetaṃ uppannaṃ,
anya-e0102n:1923_6: na tathā paṭipajjissāmi evaṃ me etaṃ nuppajjissatī”ti,
anya-e0102n:1923_8: Attano samudācārappattaṃ akusalaṃ disvā tassa pahānāya vāyamanakāle dutiyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1923_9: Imasmiṃ attabhāve anuppannapubbaṃ jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā uppādetuṃ vāyamantassa tatiyaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1923_13: Micchāvācāya viramaṇakāle sammāvācāti evaṃ nānācittesu labbhanti.
anya-e0102n:1923_14: Imesaṃ pana catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ uppattikāle ekacitte labbhanti.
anya-e0102n:1923_15: Phalakkhaṇe ṭhapetvā cattāro sammappadhāne avasesā tettiṃsa labbhanti.
anya-e0102n:1924_1: Evaṃ ekacitte labbhamānesu cetesu ekāva nibbānārammaṇā sati kāyādīsu subhasaññādippahānakiccasādhanavasena cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:1924_2: Ekameva ca vīriyaṃ anuppannānaṃ anuppādādikiccasādhanavasena cattāro sammappadhānāti vuccati.
anya-e0102n:1926_0: Nava ekavidhā eko, dvedhātha catu pañcadhā;
anya-e0102n:1927_0: Aṭṭhadhā navadhā ceva, iti chaddhā bhavanti te.
anya-e0102n:1928_2: ājīvoti ime nava chandiddhipādādivasena ekavidhāva honti,
anya-e0102n:1928_6: Atha catu pañcadhāti athañño eko catudhā,
anya-e0102n:1928_11: Paññā tesañca catunnaṃ iddhipādakoṭṭhāsassa ca vasena pañcadhā.
anya-e0102n:1928_12: Aṭṭhadhā navadhā cevāti aparo eko aṭṭhadhā,
anya-e0102n:1935_2: Lokiyavipassanā hi nimittārammaṇattā ceva pavattikāraṇassa ca samudayassa asamucchindanato neva nimittā na pavattā vuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1935_3: Gotrabhuñāṇaṃ samudayassa asamucchindanato pavattā na vuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:1935_4: Nibbānārammaṇato pana nimittā vuṭṭhātīti ekato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1935_8: Imāni pana cattāripi ñāṇāni animittārammaṇattā nimittato vuṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0102n:1935_9: samudayassa samucchindanato pavattā vuṭṭhahantīti dubhato vuṭṭhānāni honti.
anya-e0102n:1938_3: Tena vuccati dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:1938_13: Tena vuccati ‘dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇa’nti.
anya-e0102n:1939_1: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi oḷārikā kāmarāgasaṃyojanā paṭighasaṃyojanā oḷārikā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti…pe….
anya-e0102n:1940_1: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi anusahagatā kāmarāgasaṃyojanā paṭighasaṃyojanā anusahagatā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti…pe….
anya-e0102n:1941_1: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi rūparāgā arūparāgā mānā uddhaccā avijjāya mānānusayā bhavarāgānusayā avijjānusayā vuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:1941_4: Tena vuccati ‘dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇa”’nti.
anya-e0102n:1942_1: Lokiyānañca aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ bhāvanākāle samathabalaṃ adhikaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:1942_3: Ariyamaggakkhaṇe pana yuganaddhā te dhammā pavattanti aññamaññaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n:1942_4: Tasmā imesu catūsupi ñāṇesu ubhayabalasamāyogo hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:1943_0: “Uddhaccasahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro,
anya-e0102n:1943_1: avijjāsahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhagocarā.
anya-e0102n:1943_5: Tena vuccati vuṭṭhānaṭṭhena samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī”ti.
anya-e0102n:1946_2: tesaṃ pahānañcāti imesu pana catūsu ñāṇesu ye dhammā yena ñāṇena pahātabbā,
anya-e0102n:1947_0: Tattha saṃyojanānīti khandhehi khandhānaṃ phalena kammassa dukkhena vā sattānaṃ saṃyojakattā rūparāgādayo dasa dhammā vuccanti.

anya-e0102n:2020_0: Yaṃ vā pana aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāya.
anya-e0102n:2021_1: Tattha yathā aniccānupassanādīhi sattahi niccasaññādīnaṃ pahānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:2022_0: Khayānupassanāti pana ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti evaṃ khayaṃ passato ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2026_0: Evaṃ vuttā paccakkhato ceva anvayato ca saṅkhārānaṃ bhaṅgaṃ disvā tasmiññeva bhaṅgasaṅkhāte nirodhe adhimuttatā,
anya-e0102n:2026_3: “te evaṃ vayadhammā”ti vipassato āyūhane cittaṃ na namati.
anya-e0102n:2027_0: Vipariṇāmānupassanāti rūpasattakādivasena taṃ taṃ paricchedaṃ atikkamma aññathāpavattidassanaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2027_1: Uppannassa vā jarāya ceva maraṇena ca dvīhākārehi vipariṇāmadassanaṃ,
anya-e0102n:2028_0: Animittānupassanāti aniccānupassanāva, tāya niccanimittassa pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2030_0: Suññatānupassanāti anattānupassanāva, tāya “atthi attā”ti abhinivesassa pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2034_0: Evaṃ vuttā rūpādiārammaṇaṃ jānitvā tassa ca ārammaṇassa tadārammaṇassa ca cittassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā “saṅkhārāva bhijjanti,
anya-e0102n:2034_2: na añño koci atthī”ti bhaṅgavasena suññataṃ gahetvā pavattā vipassanā.
anya-e0102n:2034_3: Sā adhipaññā ca dhammesu ca vipassanāti katvā adhipaññādhammavipassanāti vuccati,
anya-e0102n:2034_4: tāya niccasārābhāvassa ca attasārābhāvassa ca suṭṭhu diṭṭhattā sārādānābhinivesassa pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2035_1: tena “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādivasena ceva,
anya-e0102n:2035_2: “issarato loko sambhotī”tiādivasena ca pavattassa sammohābhinivesassa pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2036_1: tena “kiñci allīyitabbaṃ na dissatī”ti ālayābhinivesassa pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2037_0: Paṭisaṅkhānupassanāti muñcanassa upāyakaraṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ, tena appaṭisaṅkhāya pahānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2038_1: Tadā hissa cittaṃ īsakapoṇe padumapalāse udakabindu viya sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā patilīyati,
anya-e0102n:2038_5: kāmasaṃyogādikassa kilesābhinivesassa kilesappavattiyā pahānaṃ hotīti attho.
anya-e0102n:2038_7: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “tadaṅgappahānañca diṭṭhigatānaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayato”ti saṅkhepeneva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2039_1: Yaṃ pana asanivicakkābhihatassa rukkhassa viya ariyamaggañāṇena saṃyojanādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ yathā na puna pavatti,
anya-e0102n:2039_4: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “samucchedappahānañca lokuttaraṃ khayagāmimaggaṃ bhāvayato”ti.
anya-e0102n:2039_5: Iti imesu tīsu pahānesu samucchedappahānameva idha adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2039_6: Yasmā pana tassa yogino pubbabhāge vikkhambhanatadaṅgappahānānipi tadatthāneva,
anya-e0102n:2039_7: tasmā pahānattayampi iminā pariyāyena maggañāṇassa kiccanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2039_8: Paṭirājānaṃ vadhitvā rajjaṃ pattena hi yampi tato pubbe kataṃ,
anya-e0102n:2040_1: Sacchikiriyāpīti lokiyasacchikiriyā lokuttarasacchikiriyāti dvedhā bhinnāpi lokuttarāya dassanabhāvanāvasena bhedato tividhā hoti.
anya-e0102n:2040_3: paṭhamajjhānaṃ sacchikataṃ mayā”tiādinā nayena āgatā paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ phassanā lokiyasacchikiriyā nāma.
anya-e0102n:2040_4: Phassanāti adhigantvā “idaṃ mayā adhigata”nti paccakkhato ñāṇaphassena phusanā.
anya-e0102n:2040_5: Imameva hi atthaṃ sandhāya “sacchikiriyā paññā phassanaṭṭhe ñāṇa”nti uddisitvā “ye ye dhammā sacchikatā honti,
anya-e0102n:2040_6: te te dhammā phassitā hontī”ti sacchikiriyaniddeso vutto.
anya-e0102n:2041_0: Apica attano santāne anuppādetvāpi ye dhammā kevalaṃ aparappaccayena ñāṇena ñātā,
anya-e0102n:2043_3: Tasmā dassanabhāvanāvasena nibbānassa sacchikiriyā imassa ñāṇassa kiccanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2044_1: Dve bhāvanā abhimatāti bhāvanā pana lokiyabhāvanā lokuttarabhāvanāti dveyeva abhimatā.
anya-e0102n:2044_7: Lokuttarāni hi sīlādīni catubbidhampetaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppādeti.
anya-e0102n:2044_8: Tesaṃ sahajātapaccayāditāya tehi ca santānaṃ vāsetīti lokuttarabhāvanāvassa kiccanti.
anya-e0102n:2049_0: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti. –
anya-e0102n:2050_0: Evaṃ sarūpeneva ābhatāya paññābhāvanāya vidhānadassanatthaṃ yaṃ vuttaṃ “mūlabhūtā dve visuddhiyo sampādetvā
anya-e0102n:2057_4: Tassā dīghenāpi addhunā na sukaraṃ vitthārato ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsetuṃ.
anya-e0102n:2059_1: Tattha yaṃ nāmarūpaparicchedato paṭṭhāya sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ vasena nānākilesaviddhaṃsanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0102n:2059_3: Yaṃ ariyamaggakkhaṇe saṃyojanādīnaṃ vasena nānākilesaviddhaṃsanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0102n:2068_2: na koci añño dhammo atthī”ti vadanti,
anya-e0102n:2069_3: “Mahaggato dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādīnipi cettha sādhakāni.
anya-e0102n:2071_0: 859. Tattha kā phalasamāpattīti yā ariyaphalassa nirodhe appanā.
anya-e0102n:2072_2: ke na samāpajjantīti sabbepi puthujjanā na samāpajjanti. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:2072_10: Attano attanoyeva pana phalaṃ samāpajjantīti idamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2073_15: Tasmā sabbepi ariyā attano attano phalaṃ samāpajjantīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2074_4: evaṃ ariyā “ariyaṃ lokuttarasukhaṃ anubhavissāmā”ti addhānapparicchedaṃ katvā icchiticchitakkhaṇe phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjanti.
anya-e0102n:2075_3: kathaṃ vuṭṭhānanti dvīhi tāva ākārehi assā samāpajjanaṃ hoti –
anya-e0102n:2075_4: nibbānato aññassa ārammaṇassa amanasikārā nibbānassa ca manasikārā. Yathāha – “dve kho, āvuso,
anya-e0102n:2075_5: paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā sabbanimittānañca amanasikāro,
anya-e0102n:2076_2: Phalasamāpattatthikena hi ariyasāvakena rahogatena paṭisallīnena udayabbayādivasena saṅkhārā vipassitabbā.
anya-e0102n:2076_3: Tassa pavattānupubbavipassanassa saṅkhārārammaṇagotrabhuñāṇānantarā phalasamāpattivasena nirodhe cittaṃ appeti.
anya-e0102n:2076_4: Phalasamāpattininnatāya cettha sekkhassāpi phalameva uppajjati, na maggo.
anya-e0102n:2077_0: Ye pana vadanti “sotāpanno ‘phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjissāmī’ti vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sakadāgāmī hoti.
anya-e0102n:2077_2: te vattabbā “evaṃ sati anāgāmī arahā bhavissati,
anya-e0102n:2077_9: Phalañcassa sace anena paṭhamajjhāniko maggo adhigato hoti.
anya-e0102n:2078_2: paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā ṭhitiyā sabbanimittānañca amanasikāro,
anya-e0102n:2078_4: pubbe ca abhisaṅkhāro”ti vacanato panassā tīhākārehi ṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2078_5: Tattha pubbe ca abhisaṅkhāroti samāpattito pubbe kālaparicchedo.
anya-e0102n:2078_6: “Asukasmiṃ nāma kāle vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti paricchinnattā hissā yāva so kālo nāgacchati,
anya-e0102n:2079_1: paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā vuṭṭhānāya sabbanimittānañca manasikāro,
anya-e0102n:2079_2: animittāya ca dhātuyā amanasikāro”ti vacanato panassā dvīhākārehi vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2079_4: Kāmañca na sabbānevetāni ekato manasikaroti sabbasaṅgāhikavasena panetaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2079_6: taṃ manasikaroto phalasamāpattivuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti evamassā vuṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2080_2: kassa ca phalaṃ anantaranti phalassa tāva phalameva vā anantaraṃ hoti,
anya-e0102n:2080_17: Tattha ṭhapetvā maggavīthiyaṃ uppannaṃ phalaṃ avasesaṃ sabbaṃ phalasamāpattivasena pavattaṃ nāma.
anya-e0102n:2086_0: Phalassa paññaṃ bhāvetvā, yasmā vindati paṇḍito.
anya-e0102n:2090_2: ayaṃ pana nirodhasamāpattiyā samāpajjanasamatthatāpi imissā paññābhāvanāya ānisaṃsoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:2091_10: matassa ca samāpannassa ca ko viseso,
anya-e0102n:2091_11: nirodhasamāpatti kiṃ saṅkhatā asaṅkhatā lokiyā lokuttarā nipphannā anipphannāti?
anya-e0102n:2092_1: Tattha kā nirodhasamāpattīti yā anupubbanirodhavasena cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ appavatti.
anya-e0102n:2092_13: navahi samādhicariyāhi vasībhāvatā paññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇa”nti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2092_14: Ayañca sampadā ṭhapetvā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino anāgāmikhīṇāsave aññesaṃ natthi.
anya-e0102n:2093_3: Na ettha kiñci amhehi vattabbaṃ atthi.
anya-e0102n:2093_4: Sabbamidaṃ etassa uddesassa niddese vuttameva. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n:2094_12: Uddhacce ca uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatīti samathabalaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2095_22: Avijjāya ca avijjāsahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatīti vipassanābalaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2096_0: “Tayo ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyāti katamesaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā?
anya-e0102n:2096_1: Dutiyajjhānaṃ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā honti.
anya-e0102n:2096_2: Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā honti.
anya-e0102n:2096_3: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā honti.
anya-e0102n:2097_1: Aniccānupassanā ñāṇacariyā. Dukkhā… anattā… nibbidā… virāgā… nirodhā…
anya-e0102n:2098_4: Paṭhamajjhānapaṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca…pe…
anya-e0102n:2098_5: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca.
anya-e0102n:2100_3: Yadi evaṃ sakadāgāmino dvādasahi sotāpannassa ca dasahi kiṃ na hotīti? Na hoti,
anya-e0102n:2100_7: tasmiṃ aparipūre dvīhi balehi samāpajjitabbaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ balavekallena samāpajjituṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e0102n:2100_13: Idañhi paṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe anāgāminova nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e0102n:2102_1: Kasmā samāpajjantīti saṅkhārānaṃ pavattibhede ukkaṇṭhitvā diṭṭheva dhamme acittakā hutvā “nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ viharissāmā”ti samāpajjanti.
anya-e0102n:2103_1: Kathañcassā samāpajjanaṃ hotīti samathavipassanāvasena ussakkitvā katapubbakiccassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nirodhayato,
anya-e0102n:2103_7: Yo pana ubhayavaseneva ussakkitvā pubbakiccaṃ katvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nirodheti,
anya-e0102n:2104_2: idha bhikkhu nirodhaṃ samāpajjitukāmo katabhattakicco sudhotahatthapādo vivitte okāse supaññattamhi āsane
anya-e0102n:2104_3: nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā,
anya-e0102n:2104_4: so paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati.
anya-e0102n:2105_4: Tattha saṅkhāraparigaṇhanakavipassanā mandā vā hotu tikkhā vā,
anya-e0102n:2105_8: Tasmā esa nātimandāya nātitikkhāya vipassanāya te saṅkhāre vipassati.
anya-e0102n:2106_0: Tato dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassati.
anya-e0102n:2106_2: tato viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassati.
anya-e0102n:2106_3: Tathā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya catubbidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ karoti –
anya-e0102n:2107_1: Tattha nānābaddhaavikopananti yaṃ iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0102n:2107_2: nānābaddhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ pattacīvaraṃ vā mañcapīṭhaṃ vā nivāsagehaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana kiñci parikkhārajātaṃ,
anya-e0102n:2108_0: Tatridaṃ adhiṭṭhānavidhānaṃ “idañca idañca imasmiṃ sattāhabbhantare mā agginā jhāyatu,
anya-e0102n:2108_5: Evaṃ adhiṭṭhite taṃ sattāhaṃ tassa na koci parissayo hoti.
anya-e0102n:2109_0: Anadhiṭṭhahato pana aggiādīhi vinassati mahānāgattherassa viya.
anya-e0102n:2109_1: Thero kira mātuupāsikāya gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
anya-e0102n:2109_4: Tasmiṃ nisinne āsanasālāya agginā gahitāya sesabhikkhū attano attano nisinnāsanaṃ gahetvā palāyiṃsu.
anya-e0102n:2109_6: Aggi tiṇaveṇukaṭṭhāni jhāpetvā theraṃ parikkhipitvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n:2109_7: Manussā ghaṭehi udakaṃ āharitvā nibbāpetvā chārikaṃ apanetvā paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā pupphāni vikiritvā namassamānā aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e0102n:2109_8: Thero paricchinnakālavasena vuṭṭhāya te disvā “pākaṭomhi jāto”ti vehāsaṃ uppatitvā piyaṅgudīpaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0102n:2110_0: Yaṃ ekābaddhaṃ hoti nivāsanapāvuraṇaṃ vā nisinnāsanaṃ vā,
anya-e0102n:2110_2: Samāpattivaseneva naṃ rakkhati āyasmato sañjīvassa viya.
anya-e0102n:2111_4: Ettha ca na paṭimānanaṃ etassa pubbakiccaṃ,
anya-e0102n:2111_6: Tasmā evaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ “sace mayi sattāhaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne saṅgho uttikammādīsu kiñcideva kammaṃ kattukāmo hoti,
anya-e0102n:2111_7: yāva maṃ koci bhikkhu āgantvā na pakkosati,
anya-e0102n:2111_9: Evaṃ katvā samāpanno hi tasmiṃ samaye vuṭṭhātiyeva.
anya-e0102n:2112_1: saṅgho ca sannipatitvā taṃ apassanto “asuko bhikkhu kuhi”nti “nirodhasamāpanno”ti vutte saṅgho kañci
anya-e0102n:2112_2: bhikkhuṃ peseti “gaccha naṃ saṅghassa vacanena pakkosāhī”ti.
anya-e0102n:2112_3: Athassa tena bhikkhunā savanūpacāre ṭhatvā “saṅgho taṃ āvuso paṭimānetī”ti vuttamatteva vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2112_4: Evaṃ garukā hi saṅghassa āṇā nāma.
anya-e0102n:2112_5: Tasmā taṃ āvajjitvā yathā sayameva vuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:2113_2: Tasmā tampi evaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ “sace mayi sattāhaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne satthā otiṇṇavatthusmiṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vā paññapeti,
anya-e0102n:2113_4: yāva maṃ koci āgantvā na pakkosati,
anya-e0102n:2113_6: Evaṃ katvā nisinno hi tasmiṃ samaye vuṭṭhātiyeva.
anya-e0102n:2114_1: satthā ca saṅghe sannipatite taṃ apassanto “asuko bhikkhu kuhi”nti “nirodhasamāpanno”ti vutte kañci bhikkhuṃ
anya-e0102n:2114_3: Athassa tena bhikkhunā savanūpacāre ṭhatvā “satthā āyasmantaṃ āmantetī”ti vuttamatteva vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2114_5: tasmā taṃ āvajjitvā yathā sayameva vuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:2115_3: Attano “āyusaṅkhārā sattāhaṃ pavattissanti na pavattissantī”ti āvajjitvāva samāpajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0102n:2115_4: Sace hi sattāhabbhantare nirujjhanake āyusaṅkhāre anāvajjitvāva samāpajjati,
anya-e0102n:2115_6: Antonirodhe maraṇassa natthitāya antarāva samāpattito vuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:2116_1: So evaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya imaṃ pubbakiccaṃ katvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjati.
anya-e0102n:2116_2: Athekaṃ vā dve vā cittavāre atikkamitvā acittako hoti,
anya-e0102n:2116_4: Kasmā panassa dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ uparicittāni na pavattantīti?
anya-e0102n:2116_6: Idañhi imassa bhikkhuno dve samathavipassanādhamme yuganaddhe katvā aṭṭha samāpattiārohanaṃ anupubbanirodhassa payogo,
anya-e0102n:2116_7: na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyāti nirodhassa payogattā dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ upari na pavattanti.
anya-e0102n:2117_0: Yo pana bhikkhu ākiñcaññāyatanato vuṭṭhāya idaṃ pubbakiccaṃ akatvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0102n:2117_1: so parato acittako bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0102n:2118_0: Eko kira puriso ekaṃ maggaṃ agatapubbo antarā udakakandaraṃ vā gambhīraṃ udakacikkhallaṃ atikkamitvā
anya-e0102n:2118_1: ṭhapitaṃ caṇḍātapasantattapāsāṇaṃ vā āgamma taṃ nivāsanapāvuraṇaṃ asaṇṭhapetvāva kandaraṃ orūḷho parikkhāratemanabhayena
anya-e0102n:2118_3: Pāsāṇaṃ akkamitvāpi santattapādo punadeva orabhāge patiṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:2118_4: Tattha yathā so puriso asaṇṭhapitanivāsanapāvuraṇattā kandaraṃ otiṇṇamattova,
anya-e0102n:2118_5: tattapāsāṇaṃ akkantamatto eva ca paṭinivattitvā oratova patiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n:2118_6: evaṃ yogāvacaropi pubbakiccassa akatattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpannamattova paṭinivattitvā ākiñcaññāyatane patiṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n:2119_0: Yathā pana pubbepi taṃ maggaṃ gatapubbapuriso taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgamma ekaṃ sāṭakaṃ daḷhaṃ nivāsetvā aparaṃ
anya-e0102n:2119_1: hatthena gahetvā kandaraṃ uttaritvā tattapāsāṇaṃ vā akkantamattakameva karitvā parato gacchati,
anya-e0102n:2119_2: evamevaṃ katapubbakicco bhikkhu nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvāva parato acittako hutvā nirodhaṃ phusitvā viharati.
anya-e0102n:2120_1: Kathaṃ ṭhānanti evaṃ samāpannāya panassā kālaparicchedavasena ceva antarāāyukkhayasaṅghapaṭimānanasatthupakkosanābhāvena ca ṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2121_2: arahato arahattaphaluppattiyāti evaṃ dvedhā vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0102n:2122_4: bhikkhuno vivekaninnaṃ cittaṃ hoti vivekapoṇaṃ vivekapabbhāra”nti.
anya-e0102n:2123_1: Matassa ca samāpannassa ca ko visesoti ayampi attho sutte vuttoyeva. Yathāha – “yvāyaṃ, āvuso,
anya-e0102n:2124_1: Nirodhasamāpatti saṅkhatātiādipucchāyaṃ pana saṅkhatātipi asaṅkhatātipi lokiyātipi lokuttarātipi na vattabbā. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n:2124_3: Yasmā panassā samāpajjantassa vasena samāpannā nāma hoti,
anya-e0102n:2131_2: ayaṃ pana āhuneyyabhāvādisiddhipi imissā lokuttarapaññābhāvanāya ānisaṃsoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n:2131_3: Avisesena hi catubbidhāyapi etissā bhāvitattā bhāvitapañño puggalo sadevakassa lokassa āhuneyyo hoti
anya-e0102n:2131_4: pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalīkaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa.
anya-e0102n:2132_1: Visesato panettha paṭhamamaggapaññaṃ tāva bhāvetvā mandāya vipassanāya āgato mudindriyopi sattakkhattuparamo nāma hoti,
anya-e0102n:2132_3: Majjhimāya vipassanāya āgato majjhimindriyo kolaṃkolo nāma hoti,
anya-e0102n:2132_4: dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:2132_5: Tikkhāya vipassanāya āgato tikkhindriyo ekabījī nāma hoti,
anya-e0102n:2132_6: ekaññeva mānusakaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:2133_2: sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
anya-e0102n:2134_8: Tattha antarāparinibbāyīti yattha katthaci suddhāvāsabhave upapajjitvā āyuvemajjhaṃ appatvāva parinibbāyati.
anya-e0102n:2134_13: tato uddhaṃ yāva akaniṭṭhabhavā āruyha tattha parinibbāyati.
anya-e0102n:2135_7: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “maggakkhaṇe panesa taṃ jaṭaṃ vijaṭeti nāma.
anya-e0102n:2135_8: Phalakkhaṇe vijaṭitajaṭo sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyo hotī”ti.
anya-e0102n:2137_0: Yasmā tasmā kareyyātha, ratiṃ tattha vicakkhaṇo.
anya-e0102n:2139_0: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0102n:2140_0: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti. –
anya-e0102n:2141_0: Imissā gāthāya sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desite visuddhimagge sānisaṃsā paññābhāvanā paridīpitā hotīti.
anya-e0102n:2148_0: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0102n:2149_0: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti. –
anya-e0102n:2179_0: Visuddhimaggo eso ca, antarāyaṃ vinā idha;
anya-e0102n:2183_1: Parama visuddha saddhā buddhi vīriya paṭimaṇḍitena sīlācārajjava maddavādiguṇasamudayasamuditena sakasamaya
anya-e0102n:2183_4: yuttamuttavādinā vādīvarena mahākavinā chaḷabhiññāpaṭisambhidādi bhedaguṇapaṭimaṇḍite uttarimanussadhamme
anya-e0102n:2183_5: appaṭihatabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā
anya-e0102n:2183_6: buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena mudantakhedakavattabbena kato visuddhimaggo nāma.
